entry.title: More than ten days before graduation
entry.content:
I had thoughts in my mind a while ago, but I haven’t had time to write it.
All kinds of gatherings, booking tickets, checking rental information, then level 6, and then rushing over to see the landlord that night, running in each district, checking the room paper
When the room paper is about to be settled, in the hotel, stroking the books, I can finally relax.

get together

This has always been my least favorite to participate. Schopenhauer’s “Either Vulgar or Lonely” is somewhat extreme, but it does have some truth.
In addition, it has something to do with my introversion. In the MBTI test, the introversion actually broke 85. I always like to stay quietly instead of crowded and noisy occasions.
And I don’t like photography very much. I don’t know if it’s a fragment from “Imprisoned Soul” I saw when I was a child: the photography will suck my soul away and fasten it on a small piece of paper, implanting the subconscious mind like Inception.
After graduating from middle school and high school, I left in a hurry. I remember that in the photos in the high school group, the water glasses on my table were all there, but the people were not there.
This time I graduated, but I took a lot of photos. Of course, most of them were mixed with Sister Orange and the big team

Youth, it’s really amazing, with so much innate aura, so many possibilities
I remember that freshman also goes to package night once a week, and goes to bed at 3~4 o’clock every day during winter vacation. After the junior year, it is obvious that the body is not good enough, and the senior year is even more obvious. Once in a hotel, I didn’t sleep until 3 o’clock. When I looked in the mirror the next day, I was surprised to find the legendary dark circles. Before, I wondered how the heroine in the novel said that she had dark circles. I never knew what it was. Secretly laughing that they can’t adjust, don’t understand health…

In the past, I have been recording the bits and pieces of the year through words. Now I think that the only result of doing this is to recall the youthful years of the year in an old-fashioned manner, the time of committing 2 and the mood of committing 2 back then. I don’t know what it looked like back then.

leave school

Pack up things and wait for my brother to get off work
When it was almost time, the group of people in the bedroom decisively went out to eat…
Cui Wei, my former classmate of No. 1 Middle School, helped me take the package, Viagra, thank you! When I called, I took out my phone to check the destination, and found that when I forgot to come down to look for you in the bedroom, you were gone
Although you run so fast, but still have to thank you

When I arrived at my brother’s house and saw their new house, I realized that I had to buy paper for Shenma. I had always wanted to rent…

Level 6

Just arrived at the examination room and sat down, a boy came over, claiming to be “Ming Ji”, who was originally a member of the Lige group
I thought he was a sophomore, surprised! Found that the left is all sophomores, sigh…
No wonder so many children’s shoes for seniors missed the exam. Fortunately, the monitor was with Orange. Persevering in sitting for the last time, the result doesn’t matter anymore

Hangzhou

More than ten days ago, I started to find information online, various materials, and mind map summary
On the night after the sixth grade test, I had a small gathering with them. Kawaii ate the most expensive noodles in my life, and then I boarded the train.
The 6.20 alarm was set, and the small flag called to let me pay attention to the magical horse, and said that I could hardly sleep at night. And really wake up basically once an hour
I went to WC at 5 o’clock in the morning and went back to sleep again. I suddenly woke up at 6 o’clock and drank some Nutrition Express. I found it on Google Maps and found that I was in Yuhang District!
Isn’t it 6.40? Then I heard “I got off in Hangzhou”, O__O”…

After getting off the train station, there is nothing shocking. It seems that the station in my hometown is beautiful.
google map, look for route 49, see the bus stop there, walk over, go around and find that there is nothing

k49 7:30 to the Union Building, go to Home, and learn that you can enter the room at 8 o’clock, store your school bags, and go downstairs to the company
I went in from AB and found that someone was practicing Taijiquan. Anyway, Dai Yingdu came, after watching for a while, he went up and talked about practicing Chen’s boxing. When asked about a sense of air, I said that my fingers swelled a bit when I opened it, and then I pulled other people’s thoughts, and I was said to be wrong o(╯□╰)o

Just in time for the rain, finding a house is generally running in the rain
But after I paid the deposit for Shenma, the house started and the rain stopped…

I’ve known that it’s very clean, and I feel so when I get off the train.
But it just feels so
Until I saw two girls walking barefoot on the road…
If you are in Hefei, blood dripping is a must…

Kawaii once said to buy sandals, but never felt
The net shoes were all soaked when I went out one morning
I saw the two girls at that time
Suddenly my mind changed, and later I discovered that many people wear slippers
It seems that the beach pants + flip-flops of the uncle-level programmers are not false.

I can’t use online banking on my computer to buy train tickets
This phenomenon occurs in Brother Hao’s house. At that time, he bought it smoothly after switching to his computer.
I thought it was a problem with IE9, resetting to reset the initial state, no
Helpless to reinstall the system
But it seems that the mirroring is wrong, and the blue screen is directly…
And the wooden belt system restores the USB flash drive, so I can’t help asking JS for the system drive
Originally, I thought that the company was originally IT, and the system disk was a must. I thought there was a small IT department inside.

Buying tickets for Jiaxing this time delayed me for most of the day. In the end, my sister bought them for me.
This kind of regional bank doesn’t work well if it goes out of the region. Of course, as long as I stay in Anhui peacefully, Huizhou Bank can comfortably say that I don’t blame it or blame it.

It’s strange to be out for the first time
In the afternoon, I was still taking Level 6 exams, I was in Hangzhou after I slept at night, and I am going to Jiaxing again today.
For places I haven’t been to, it always feels like an unexplored map in a real-time strategy game. It’s dark, and the map can only be lighted up when I pass.

Ran to many places to see the house paper
I would like to thank Ying Children’s Shoes and Wearing Children’s Shoes for helping me find room paper in Hangzhou, where I am unfamiliar. Especially when I was wearing children’s shoes, the room paper was already set, and I continued to accompany me on the road. With the constant urging of my girlfriend, I got to the penultimate room paper.

In the end, at a high price of 1100, I rented a room with a TV, a signal, a wooden floor, a screen window, a mattress, a table and chair, a living room and a living room far away from the company…

entry.title: FEEL Training
entry.content:
first day

On the first day of the training, executives took turns to introduce them.
First time I met a real CEO COO CTO CFO
It’s rather embarrassing to have lunch at noon, and it looks like a private room reserved for executives. As a result, all the executives went back, and a few people went in. Fortunately, some colleagues came one after another.
After signing the contract in the afternoon, I went to my place.
Next to the window, there is a big gap between the curtains. The scorching sun spreads on my LCD monitor without any obstacles, and I can’t see anything…
Of course, it turned out that I was not the worst. The worst was our boss, who was directly told by another colleague that he was here to bask in the sun…

Install the computer, remove the anti-virus tyrant, and configure it to your usual environment.
Of course, the company’s internet speed is too slow… Go back and copy some large software.
Then, I saw sister You. Mu thought of knowing me. After chatting for a while, the entire browser department had a small meeting.

Alas, this sentence is too witty. Everyone is technical, so silent, I am speechless.
I went back to the boss and assigned a task. After a while, I saw that it was past 6 o’clock. Isn’t it off work? Because there is no movement around Shenma? Asked in the group, it turned out that everyone was struggling with getting off work.
I had no choice but to stand still. At 20, I saw the instructor flashed. The mentor, I had to follow his footsteps, said hello to the boss, and ran back~

the next day

Randomly divided into teams, gave the team name and slogan
How to sum up their opinions when first encountered
In the end we decided on Bubble Fish / I am Bubble Fish, I love Bubble Fish as the team name and slogan
(On the third day I saw a cute clown fish, I brought it to play, and took a closer look at the “bubbling fish”, stupid, such a coincidence?)
Poster: Y+ for UI is a cow, a few bubbling fish are painted vividly, very Q

The various processes are intricate and complicated. I guess the one I can use is the administration department-there is only one drawer key.

In the end, the imitation was too much. I feel that it is not a problem of observation, but a misunderstanding of thinking. I have read a lot of thinking books, but I still see it.
Or where xi is good at this kind of problem, it is the first one to get it done.

Third day

Time is getting tighter and tighter. Yesterday there was still some free time. I ran back to configure the development environment, and it was gone today.
Let’s draw the SKY logo, everyone will
The original purpose is to let everyone know to abide by the norms

Then I gave some random pictures and typeset out a newspaper
I thought about buying Apple. Fortunately, our group didn’t start the discussion. After finding that other groups also used this, we decided to give up
There are some sensitive issues, Xiaodong said don’t mention it, then forget it

Sister Yang Yang posted 10 questions, which will be changed into a sketch to perform in the evening, and then the questions will be inserted.
Have a quick meal at noon and collect answers to questions
It didn’t take long for the afternoon training time
Claiming to be a brainwashing training, among which the YY video on the mobile Internet, I really want to be born a hundred years later
The group was assigned to perform innovatively, and we adopted Yuan’s opinion.
Even though Brother Yuan is a small MM, he is very open and passionate.
Zhao Yang is really talented as a host. He used a lot of nonsense to fill the scene during the whole process.
Xiaodong keeps saying that he can’t do well, but he did well on the spot
I’m the referee, it’s pure soy sauce~

Then we only have one hour to discuss the evening sketch
Brother Yuan has always been a more active thinking person. Later in the process of discussion, I finally found out that I was really not a post-90s, not a brain-disabled person.

Until the first group came on the field, we still did not determine the final ending, this is the place to pay attention to next.
The overall performance of the sketch is very good, just under the middle card.

At this time, I saw “Don’t live in other people’s world”. I went out and drank some water. I just ran into two school recruits who had been intern for a long time. One of them had a meal, said hello, and then I sat down and had a chat. The other kept asking me about the situation in Hefei and which university.
Of course it is China Other University. After saying it twice, they both looked confused, which caused my confidence to drop sharply, and my oral English still failed…
What surprised me was that Hang Dian was also a COU (just googled, and it was not. Of course, such NB schools don’t need this stuff, which is fundamentally different from mine).
I said that most of our schools find jobs locally, usually about 2k or so. He curled his lips. After I thought about it, he probably forgot about the low prices in Hefei.
Then JS came over and learned that Baidi’s library could borrow books on Friday.
After playing Wii, I went back to the classroom, dizzy, is the show over…

After everything was over, Sister Yang Yang said…
…
Well, sure enough time is tighter. Let’s roughly talk about the distribution of marketing planning. After all, it was so late and dissolved.

When I arrived at the gate, I ran into Brother Yuan and told me to take the parcel. Anyway, it’s already so late, and in the mansion garden, I’ll follow along and have a look.
Walking with this kind of girl paper makes me feel more dangerous.
After walking around for a long time, she finally found Yunda Point and learned that she had been taken away by someone she knew.
Now what happened to me, flash.

The first taxi never stopped! Sister, after getting on the second car, I told the driver that the front was refused? Seeing my face was silent, he also explained the previous one for a long time, to the effect that I would stop complaining. Alas, I’m actually tired, so just put it this way, how can I make a complaint?

I have to do laundry when I come back. There are so many trivial things…

Fourth day

Brother Hao can really say, just a few hours at a time, if my throat becomes hoarse prematurely
Later, I learned that I had been a lecturer and practiced before, no wonder
There is a thought storm, the use of iron clothes racks. The balance is not very good, you can use the score=total/10 algorithm to return to balance
Of course, the market is not fair. There are always monopolistic companies who have the final say. I told the group that you should not care about others too much.
Squatting, alas, Tai Chi only forgets this
Squatting is estimated to be less than two minutes, so it’s sour.
There is a small voice in my heart, I am an intellectual hero, who can’t recognize the position, and always try his best. If you fall, the team will be incomplete tomorrow.
I figured this out and jumped up immediately (I still have the strength to jump up…)
Before the board game in the evening, I ran into sister Yang Yang during dinner and helped her move something in the administration department.
Then ran to table tennis and rubbed two balls
The board game is a killing game, everyone plays well hi
Brother Yuan talks a lot, Barabara confused everyone
Help Y+ fix the wireless connection at night, wash and sleep

Fifth day

After the training today, I carefully mentioned it to the boss, sitting and doing nothing, there is nothing to do with it.
The boss said immediately that Seng had already prepared the task, but he didn’t say anything.
(It turned out to be like this, T.T)
…

Sixth day

West Lake Orientation
We set off at 6.50, and it takes about an hour and a half to get to the Broken Bridge.
I also met the captain on the bus, and Yanjiao was also on this bus…

The West Lake is too hot, the team bought some fans
Get the task and set off

The classic fragment of the legend of the new white lady, beautiful, beautiful, delicious food for foreign tourists to write “Hello, Hangzhou…” and other tasks
A large group of people greeted us, Yuan brother Yijia rushed up immediately
Well, the English is really intermittent, and I still rely on the tour guide to translate…
The dialogue between them can still be understood, but let me just say…
There was a short lady next to me, who seemed to be of the yellow race, and how old I was. She was struggling at the time, and finally finally said the first time to a foreigner for the first time and asked a comparatively 2 question “Where are you” from?”
US Australia or something
Then I don’t know what to say…It’s really dumb English…

The first task was blindfolded, the team stretched the 10-meter rope into a regular pentagon.

I started to use Xiaodong 1.78 as equal length and side length, leaving a lot of rope
In fact, the instructor didn’t make it clear, so there can be no more
Of course we all admit our own mistakes, and that neglect did not mention

At first I thought about measuring the angle by hand, 108.
Later I found that they are measuring the distance to the corners, which is more convenient and accurate

After we all think it is a regular pentagon, it ends
Before I took off the blindfold, I was still anxious. After all, I made it out of feeling.
After actually seeing the graphics, I took a sigh of relief. In my heart, I sighed that the cooperation is really amazing.
Finally we completed the first item with full marks

When I get to the museum, I strongly recommend going in and blowing on the air conditioner, cooldown, but some people are afraid that there is not enough time, and they may not be able to get out (囧), so everyone continues on the road

The second task guess the word

I haven’t reacted yet, Brother Yuan has already done both…
Ο \ _ \ _ Ο “…
My only contribution is: let them put the stuck one aside, continue to the next one, and finally use the elimination method to see if there is a breakthrough
In the end, we finished it in more than 3 minutes, but unfortunately we made two mistakes (we learned later that we have the highest correct rate and the shortest time)

The third task: Outsmart nuclear warheads

A square area with a side length of four meters, there is a cup inside. Use rope, rubber band, chopsticks, and straws to pour a bottle of water in and take out the cup. During the whole process, people cannot enter the area and ropes and other objects cannot fall to the ground.

My suggestion is to pierce two holes so that you only need to lift the bottle above the cup, although some water will spill out on the road
But they are afraid it will be slower
Later, I learned that the Qianjiang No. 7 group of Fanxi had used this method. Now think about it, this may be slower, but it can save time for tying the rope + pouring water.
Finally, we used the most traditional method, pouring water

Take out the cup
I want to wind it more, wind it in the opposite direction, and then pull it out. When I watch the video, another group of this method failed. Fortunately, they said it was unstable. Use a slip knot and rejected this plan.
Then I saw the captain fiddle with the chopsticks and rubber bands again, so I went over and asked him what he thought of it
Later, I guessed that I was seen by Brother Yuan holding the rubber band. She suddenly jumped over and yelled: “I know, I know”

Fold the N rubber bands together, pull them apart with four ropes, then wrap the quilt, loosen it, wait for the rubber bands to hoop the cup, lift it up slowly
Let’s listen! ! !
Then I immediately thought of some of the points to pay attention to. After all, the rubber bands have more elasticity. If the hoop cup is not matched well, the cup is more likely to fall.
Then it started
This time I am in charge of observing
Jepen seems to be a little nervous, the rope can’t relax, the cup shook
Our voices coordinated, and finally ended this last event with a full score

Catch the bus
Jepen said that the other groups have been completed and there is not enough time (without such incentives, there are still many groups that have not arrived after we went back)
We went back, but fortunately we didn’t go back…
Suddenly the bus came, and everyone rushed to the opposite side of the road (Xiaodong and I feel that life is still important, it is the slowest crossing the road)
The captain on the bus suddenly saw the phone number of a contact person at the last bus stop. I felt it necessary to say something, in case it was still there waiting for us.
After the call, I knew I had gone back…

your
I didn’t expect Sister Bobo to take the photo. It was really interesting
I saw myself standing there blindfolded, good 2 ah, let’s not say…
Yanjiao’s group used the method of squeezing a bottle to pour water into a cup two meters away in “Smart Nuclear Warhead”, and later wanted to climb trees
Some want to tie people up and hang them
Too NB

At last
I have no feeling for the ranking, as long as it is not the last
Of course we won the first place without a doubt
Go to grandma’s house in the evening, the first group meeting of the group, so happy
I saw Brother Yuan’s room paper

Thoughts
I have always been alone in the university. Although I know that teamwork is very important, I have never felt it. Last year’s interview said that the team was unfounded. In this training, I personally experienced the magic of teamwork, it’s really amazing…

The FEEL training is about to end. Although I’m tired every day, I really appreciate everyone of Bubble Fish, O(∩_∩)O Thank you

entry.title: Goodbye my university
entry.content:
I remember that when I first arrived in Hangzhou last time, I saw this beautiful city with lots of vegetation and seemed to express it once…
This kind of place that took four years and felt free for the first time in my life, it is not enough to meet again…
Of course, I don’t have any awesome experience worth writing about. I have passed it plainly, just express my feelings.

After I got down to Level 6 two days ago, I have finished this thing that has dragged on for 3.5 years.
I think college years, in my life, really passed

I remember one night, I dreamed of N many mosquitoes, which made me itchy. I thought to myself, this magical horse breaks my dream, it is more uncomfortable than a bone
Then I stood in the graveyard…
Although I warn myself not to be afraid, dream, just feel it, taste it.
Okay, I was persuaded, and then I wanted to run, where should I go?
Hmm, my parents are right next door, just run to them
Parents and home have always been our shelter from the wind after our injuries.

It’s a pity. Then I woke up and found myself alone. In the rented house, the next door was a stranger I had never met before.
Really left and grown up
Remember a sentence:

Independence means greater social responsibility, freedom means more tolerance, liberation means more self-management, and growing up means more effort.
I can’t help but think of the phrase “The great ability comes great responsibility.”

Although I have always yearned for independence and freedom, but when I really got here, at a certain moment, there was still a kind of “light sadness” as the boss described.

Turn to the topic
My university is more fun
When I entered school, it was the second school I always despised in high school
Seriously, after half a year, nothing has changed
I skipped classes in my sophomore year, and I got a major
When the junior never goes to class again, the whole school is a book

Level 6

Actually there is no such thing as passing or failing
And, after graduation, my personal feeling is that the certificates are all gone
However, it is a comfort to parents. (Originally, I thought that the last time my dad came, it was the last time he gave me RMB. This time, it seems that I can blackmail them again. O(∩_∩)O)
Moreover, it can be regarded as a draw to an end to his university career.

of course……
If they knew…

Remember J.K. Rowling said in a speech at the graduation ceremony of Harvard University:

I cannot remember telling my parents that I was studying Classics; they might well have found out for the first time on graduation day.

In college, I arrived late, retired early, skipped class, cheated, missed a course, retaken, and confessed my faults…
Counting it down, it seems that except for scholarships and bursaries, I haven’t gotten a fight, and everything else is basically satisfactory.

Of course, cheating has always been something I despise and even disgusting. I can stick to the principle of 60.
The most interesting thing is that he also practiced the “two armies at war, the heart is the best” in the “Sun Tzu Art of War” and finally “the soldier who fails to fight without fighting.”
So when fighting this, I really don’t know what the situation is. The principle is “If a person does not offend me, I will not offend; if a person offends me, it depends on the situation.”

Other things that seemed impossible in the junior year were gradually completed in the last period of time.

There are also regrets: the brand does not sound, job hunting and future development cannot be used as a stepping stone; strategic planning is not so perfect due to horizontal vision restrictions, etc.

Oh, yes, there is one that I should complete:
Go to China University of Science and Technology

Although my school (omitted), but the geographical location is unique
There are two medical schools and two large shopping malls nearby
It is very convenient to go shopping and go shopping
So every time I get together, others come to me

The most important thing is not far from the University of Science and Technology of China
It’s a pity that I didn’t use it, or never thought of it

Always feel good about myself
At the same time, it seems that there has always been a deep inferiority complex
I remember in the earliest days, I didn’t even dare to enter other schools
Keep your head down when passing by, passing by

When I was running around for a meager salary in my senior year, I had to face this fact.
Every day I run the job fairs of HKUST, all kinds of hard work

But I suddenly found out that most of them are almost the same (ordinary people), the same being cut off, the same being rejected
But the awesomeness is different. In my opinion, for a god-like company, the offer comes at your fingertips and it is no pity to reject it.

Isn’t there a saying that the strength of an individual has nothing to do with the group.
And in the group, the average IQ drops down.

…

I thought I would really leave in the future, and I never went home for more than a week
Decided to stop looking for an internship and stay with my parents quietly for a period of time
In the last two months, let me go out every day (Sang Xin)
Mom and Dad said that I stayed at home every day, didn’t go out, didn’t help with housework, and didn’t do anything, so I played games and went to bed in a daze.
In fact, during that time, I felt that I knew more than the previous three years
The most important thing is mental growth
I am very happy to see this magical world towards the end of the university
It’s a pity that it passed in a blink of an eye, and now I don’t have time to calm down and spend a long time studying.

Finally back to Hefei, nothing else, just to reply
We got together one last time, before I bid farewell to Hefei

Looking back at that time now, I am very moved
Not alone when I left

in case

I know that “if” is useless. It is repeatedly emphasized in mental books. It is a waste of time. It is better to focus on the present
Li Zongren said that if people live not from 1 to 80, but from 80 to 1 year old, 2/3 of people will become great men.

Just like in “The Gang of Men”, if time can be returned, I think it will be another ending

So, although I have no big regrets
But if I were to be in the last university, I would shorten the time and advance it half a year
After all, the higher the level, the tighter the time
Just went to college, suddenly liberated, madness is a must
The Warcraft game I have been playing crazy for a year, in fact, should be compressed to half a year, in the freshman year, I played crazy
Then get into programming, something more interesting than Warcraft
Get C in the sophomore year, look at the data structure
The junior finds a house and moves out of school. Go to the internship
Run a job fair two months before the senior year
Stay with your parents in the next time
Go out in the middle, fun, good-looking, pass the driver’s license
You can ask your parents to borrow funds (note that it is “borrowing”)

Of course, there is another possibility. If that guy was me now, it would be completely different today…
People’s cognition is always confined to the present, and looking back a few years later will only feel so naive and lack of thinking at the time.

Of course, of course, no if…

There is a path dependence theory in economics. It says that once people make a certain choice, it is like embarking on a path of no return. The force of inertia will make this choice constantly self-reinforcing and prevent you from walking easily. Get out.

Regardless of the original choice, it is a decision made by yourself, and you are responsible for yourself

After graduating, I suddenly felt that the possibility has dropped a lot. After all, there are certain things that have become established facts, and I cannot do it again.
Then suddenly I saw the old A in “Soldier Assault” and said

twenty two? I see you like 70! …If I were you, I would definitely participate. Do you know why? Because I’m only 30, such a fun thing, I haven’t done enough yet
Yeah, I’m only 22, what a good number 22, a stupid age

So, don’t work, be hated, love someone.

I hope that after a few years, I look back again,
It’s not “Anything that doesn’t work well now has a time when it’s not working hard.”
It is “a little bit of a dream that is built, and you in the future will be grateful for your hard work now!”

Thousands of words, I can’t say enough, but there is a time to end

Goodbye, my university.

September 17, 2012 0:00:52
At Hangzhou Xixi Wetland

PS：
The hearts are mixed together, crumpled into pieces

Write and delete, delete and write
Save the draft, intermittently several times
Still out of place

I want to cry, but I feel like I am no longer a child

How many four years in life
Still have enough free time, four years of worry-free food and clothing

After that, we must constantly compromise between ideal and reality
As we grow older, we have a deeper understanding of society, as the feeling of powerlessness and paleness increases day by day, and gradually disappears

However, what I saw is a comfort to myself:

I know that in this radiant, rapidly changing living space, everyone has their own choice. My idea is very simple. I don’t have to wear beautiful clothes, and I don’t need to use rouge powder. The most serious, simple and active life is for me. Fascinated by the truth.

entry.title: About the selected ones
entry.content:
Education in China belongs to atheism and believes in science
But science can’t explain it at present, where does the realization come from? Is it just the activity of brain matter? Why do other animals have no will, but only humans? Can will exist without matter? Is everything really empty when you die? What are we doing here?

The reality is cruel. If depth first is used, the prerequisite is “God Mode”
Otherwise, it is often broken, and there is no chance to come back because of the time arrow

Reading, studying, knowing more information, and then using breadth first

But first determine the purpose and ask yourself what the soul wants
It says in “A Dialogue with God”

The soul, body, and brain are separate, and the soul is independent of the existence of the other two. All suffering is caused by the inconsistent purpose of the two.

I think the soul mentioned here is free will

Free will

Actually more curious about free will
If Everett’s parallel universe hypothesis is true, then free will is a joke
Because no matter what choice you make, at the moment you choose, the world is divided into two, which is choice, and there is no choice.
Even birth and death
On a macro scale, there is no difference

However, for the individual, a choice is indeed made. Here is a quote:

“Why do we like coins, because at the moment they are thrown into space, the answer is already obvious.” Except for the obvious authoritative answer, the answer is often in oneself, but the physical, mental, and insight are still not strong enough to be unnecessary Reason/cognition, can purely follow the heart.

I believe in free will, at least, after you choose, this world will continue for you, and your choice will affect your journey in this world.

Therefore, how to choose can have an optimal solution

Optimal solution

The optimal solution is another problem
What is the optimal solution?
This is inseparable from one’s worldview, outlook on life, and values

There is an article on Fai Mo: Nine Steps to Determine Your Life Goal and Make a Plan to Reach it
But the key is that one’s world outlook, outlook on life, and values will also change…
The Ship of Theseus can illustrate this very well

The Ship of Theseus

  1. If you look at the different types of cells in the human body, the average age of the cells in the entire human body is about 7-10 years old. (That is to change all of them)
  2. If a ship travels long distances at sea, it will inevitably be damaged, so the skilled craftsmen on board regularly replace part of the ship to maintain the normal navigation of the ship. A few years later, all parts of the entire ship were replaced. Is this ship still the same ship when it started? If so, then if the discarded parts are collected and reassembled into a ship, what is the relationship between the two ships and the original ship when they set off? If not, when did this ship become different from the original?

This question is very fascinating. If you count it this way, it’s almost 3 rounds.

The above only talks about the physical situation, if you add the education, the environment, and the past experience

Therefore, at each stage, the pursuit is different
I admire those who have “one sword in ten years”
“Ten Thousand Hours of Genius Theory”, 3 hours a day is almost ten years

Ten years of sharpening a sword ]Source】
Tang Jiadao’s “Swordsman” poem: “Ten years to sharpen a sword, and frost blade has never tried. Today is like a king, who is injustice?” (Ten years? coincidence?)

Is there any way when this kind of purpose changes from time to time and cannot be rolled back?

how are you

Greedy algorithm is a simpler and faster design technique for some optimal solution problems. The characteristic of using the greedy method to design an algorithm is to proceed step by step. It is often based on the current situation to make an optimal choice according to an optimization measure, without considering all possible overall situations, it saves the need to find the optimal solution. All possible and must spend a lot of time, it adopts top-down, iterative method to make successive greedy choices, every time a greedy choice is made, the problem is reduced to a smaller sub-problem, and through each step Greedy selection can obtain an optimal solution to the problem. Although each step must ensure that a local optimal solution can be obtained, the resulting global solution is sometimes not necessarily optimal, so do not go back in the greedy method.

At last

A favorite sentence, which also happens to be about choice:

We are not just a random person meeting another, we are all through the mountains and rivers, slowly and long way to find each other, in our human growth river, this short moment of cause and fate, it is not accidental, it is ours select.

entry.title: the Grand Master
entry.content:
What we can do now is to find a quiet place, let ourselves think quietly, and understand how to do it, so that we can prevent precious things and important people from losing again, and understand how to do it. The same mistakes will not happen. Happen again. Learn from it, draw strength, continue to move forward firmly, find what you like, meet someone you truly love, and do the right thing. —— Xi Murong

In the first two weeks, I got up at 6 o’clock and went to bed at 11 o’clock every day. I felt very energetic. It’s not a problem to work 16 hours a day.
The side effects came out
I didn’t work overtime for these two days, I was nestled in my house without internet, and I deeply realized the terrible loneliness.
Become inexplicably irritable, unfortunately the mobile phone can be connected to the Internet, so harassment everywhere
The most common one is Gu Xiaobai’s “So boring, so boring” in “The Gang of Men”
Sorry for causing trouble to some people. As for when it will stabilize, I don’t know

007 and the Grand Master

In college, every once in a while, I would go to the theater to watch big movies
I didn’t have any money at that time, and I was only willing to go once because it was an international blockbuster + 3D
Work, but left these entertainments behind

I went to watch “007” the other night
Very worried

I came out and remembered the comment of verycd “Assassin’s Creed”:

After going in for a while, I felt a sense of desolation. Although the city is more prosperous and the characters are more gorgeous, but facing Ezio, who is more than half a century old, it is a desolate time. From the beginning of the second generation, the young and young hairy boy to this one. The old man with a gray face and beard climbing the wall has a lot of thoughts. A few days ago, it happened that I also celebrated my birthday. It feels that year after year is getting faster and more like this game, I am already old when I look at myself in a blink of an eye
A person’s life is vividly revealed in this assassin trilogy

“The Great Master” has many touches, so I won’t talk about them one by one.
The most touching point:
Ip Man went to break the cake in Haneda’s hand, and couldn’t handle it.
Mr. Accountant commented that Tai Chi Yang Luchan has the stunt of “the bird does not fly”. The bird stopped in Yang Luchan’s palm and it could not fly, because Yang Luchan’s tricks made the bird nowhere to focus. Was locked in an invisible cage.

I specifically checked this story, here

“The little sparrow was alive and kicking, but it looked like a sick leg in the palm of the martial arts master Yang Luchan. Although he kept flapping his wings, it was caught by magnetism, squeaking, and unable to fly. If you want to fly, your feet must be balanced on the point of effort, and you can use the rebound force to lift your wings to fly. Yang Luchan’s kung fu has reached the peak of perfection, and the palm can feel the momentary thrust of the sparrow’s legs, whenever a sparrow When he kicked his legs to fly, he sank his palms, and the bird’s kicking force was wiped out! Therefore, the little sparrow could only flutter his wings and struggle, and could not do without Yang Luchan’s palm.”

This story may be exaggerated, but whether it is true or not, it arouses my interest in continuing Tai Chi

In parks, middle-aged and elderly people usually practice the 24 styles of the national standard. It evolved from the Yang family and is actually Tai Chi.
There is a piece of history here, it’s more sensitive, so I won’t talk about it. You can adapt it by google Tai Chi yourself

Seeing such softness + weakness in my freshman year, I suddenly had no idea
Later, it was discovered that the Yang family was actually evolved from the Chen family, and the Chen family can be vocal when fighting. It is super suitable for young people, and my physical fitness has been poor.

However, from the initial fastness to the present slowness, I realized how powerful Yang’s “rigid and softness is contained, but hidden deep.”
My understanding is that Yang has already externalized and embodied Wangsijin, without seeing the slightest on the outside. Jin circling and flipping inside, and once you get your hands on it, it’s done…

I used to sit on the well and watch the sky again

It took me eighteen years to sit with you and drink coffee

Every time I see Xue Yuan, I count how much money I have taken and how much I have saved now, and every time it counts too much, it makes me think that I have realized my dream in a few years.

This is quite speechless, and only a little bit more. What’s the use? Life is a mess, wandering on the edge of pessimism and anxiety
In fact, what I want to say is, why are there so many more for no reason? How much do you need to pay for this
An article that impressed me a lot so far:
“It took me eighteen years to sit and drink coffee with you”

My university is china other university, which is already weak
At the stage of school recruitment, it was the first time to face the students from the other two schools, and felt helpless.

J.K. Rowling’s speech at the graduation ceremony of Harvard University:
The Fringe Benefits of Failure, and the Importance of Imagination (“The benefits of failure and the importance of imagination”)
There is a sentence:

Indeed, your conception of failure might not be too far from the average person’s idea of success, so high have you already flown academically.

Therefore, I have always envied those students from prestigious schools. I envy their starting point, which is already so high.
How many times does it take to catch up with them, and it’s just possible

Every stage has troubles at every stage
I don’t know if I see a little bit more, but because of this, it makes me miserable
Because of that, I know how big the gap is, and I feel helpless to my weak self.
Every thing, every direction, it takes time to do

I don’t want myself as a Weibo complained:

Too late to figure out what I want, the temples have begun to turn white; too late to be sure of their love, the other side is already married; too late to love the child, he has grown up and left you; too late to become famous, we are about to enter The grave is gone. We are afraid that everything is too late

Unfortunately, the second has already been fulfilled

Become the kind of person you hated most when you were young
When a person chooses to grow up, he often chooses not to be understood, because you have to take the path you choose, not the path they think you should choose.
I don’t know if at this stage, mom and dad don’t know what I’m thinking anymore
Actually I don’t know what I’m thinking, let alone others
And, a while ago, I found that I was becoming someone I didn’t like
Everything is cautious, not dare to expose who you are
As one sentence:

The loss of many people is against their aspirations when they were young. I think I am mature, skilled, shrewd, naive in the past, I finally see it through and want to wear it. So, we became the kind of people we hated most when we were young

not happy things
When I’m sad, no one cares about me
I feel dizzy when I see a full screen of English
The number of books you want to read is as many as the PM in the Imperial Capital

The theory knows:
Take your time, everything is too late
Where is weak, where is it
Do only one thing at a time
Power of the moment
Assigned task, the most difficult thing in the world

It seems to be on the road of self-salvation
However, the weak burst like this, and sometimes I really feel hopeless

Half a year after graduation
It’s been half a year
The end of the world is over

Objectively speaking, there seems to be progress
But the curve drawn is infinitely close to the horizontal line

Chao Wendao

There is another place that makes me very depressed

In Da Liu’s science fiction, there is an article called “The Way of the Chaos”,
Quoting from “The Analects of Confucius Liren”
It gives a detailed description of scientists willing to give their lives in order to understand the mysteries of the universe.

Although there is a sequence of hearings, it is nothing more than a big deal.

But there is a sentence in the Tao Te Ching:

The sergeant hears the Tao and walks diligently; the sergeant hears the Tao, if it survives; the corporal laughs when he hears the Tao. Not smiling is not enough.

Not smiling, not enough
The obvious feeling is that I saw the book “Poor Dad” in my sophomore year in the library. I flipped through it at the time. When it came to the coining section, it felt boring. I thought that I would not do business by myself anyway. In the future, I will use programming as my career and narrow my goals, so I won’t spend time looking at this

Now it seems ridiculous how stupid it was at that time, it can be said that the Tao is right in front of me, but I turn a deaf ear to it

Superego, ego and id

Everyone lives in three states of yourself: parent, adult, and child.
They correspond to the personality structure of Freud: the superego, the ego and the id.
The superego represents the law, morality, conscience, authority, the defender of order, the strict prosecutor, the god, the god, the enlightened Zen master, and the principle of perfection.
The id following the principle of happiness is all primitive impulses, instincts and desires, willful, do whatever one wants, and self-centered.
The self follows the principles of reality, the coordinator and the balancer, he is in the middle, not only to satisfy the desire of the self, but also to escape the eyes of the prosecutor, and cannot completely violate the will of the superego. The ego is like a businessman, and can be bargained; the id and the superego are at the two ends of the seesaw, and the ego is in the middle, so they need to be balanced. The self is rational and follows the principles of reality.

Why am I so sad, everything, I think, may be the super-ego too awesome

I have always had a shadow in my heart, that is, in all the fields I know, programming, Tai Chi, meridian, psychology, mind, and recently finance has achieved great success and peaked me.
I have never had a conversation with him directly, there is always only one shadow
As said in “God, Xueba, Man”, “God is not a bird of us”
But I have been trying to control my desire carefully, chasing after the shadow

There are a lot of trivial things and I don’t have time to listen to inner voice
And most of the time, I am satisfied with my choice
But a person, at home, closes the doors and windows, all around you are lonely, and when you are alone
Will face the godlike opponent of the superego and the piglike ally of the self

Only to realize that I was so fragile, even cowardly and crying
No pain no gain, but sometimes I wonder if the price is too great, what is it to toss about? It’s better to live a small life peacefully, why not be happy

How to balance the gap
I think that all the powerlessness and sorrow come from this

entry.title: To the dead 2012
entry.content:
I still have a hindsight. It was originally a New Year’s Day summary. It was delayed until the Spring Festival, and then today.

Written in 2012

I was restless a month before the Spring Festival
I don’t know if it has something to do with a person outside
When I went home during the Chinese New Year, I looked at the snow flying in the sky and the earth wrapped in silver on the bus, and my heart returned to peace.

2012 was the year I grew the most
Leaving aside the changes in the external environment, we can no longer use students’ standards to demand ourselves

In the first half of the year, I had nothing to do, read books and played games at home
Remember the godlike work “Take Time as a Friend”
The heart is eager, and I read it intermittently for a month
After that, the world feels different
Probably since then, fell in love with reading

Overkill

I still remember the process of Tai Chi from rigid to soft in my sophomore year. I chatted with my teacher once
He said that I was shaking too hard, and asked my classmates to take a video with their mobile phones, and I would understand by looking at them.
I was stunned and said, I thought this was the only way to go.

Yes, this is overkill

I also felt back pain when I was in high school
I have been exposed to traditional medicine since then
But recently I felt pain in my limbs and neck pillow
I heard a sentence in Dongwu’s Theory of Relativity, “When you realize his existence, it may be a problem.”
I thought it was more serious and wondered if I was going to die
But recently I saw it in “The Art of Learning”, it may also be an introduction to Tai Chi, and I felt something I didn’t feel before
In short, everything goes on and stays calm

At a glance

Sometimes it’s so strange, you can notice her at a glance when you are in a crowd
Even if it’s not the first sight, after a while, in the vast crowd, you will notice this person
Just seeing it can distinguish her from the people around her
Background, personality, occupation, hobbies are all unknown, but you can still feel her special

Go to the Westside Ice Rink on Saturday, this is the second time in my life skating
Like skating
One is to make yourself feel the difficulties of being an upright animal again and train your cerebellum
The second is to re-understand the balance, this and Tai Chi should have a complementary effect
So decided to make it a constant for weekend sports
At present, friction is still used for steering, and I hope to use centripetal force next time

impetuous

Everyone is saying that this is an impetuous society

Yes, the general trend
There is a saying: If you live in an abnormal place for a long time, you will regard the abnormality as justified.

I do not deny that I am impetuous
I want to do everything, I didn’t get into anything
But I feel helpless. Reading and paying attention only started from the senior year.
Knowing GTD, what’s the use
The key is the quality of time usage, not the quantity
flow- heart flow, time stops for you

The same is true for impetuousness, I feel like how to deal with a deep and broad relationship
First wide-ranging, as Qiao said, keep trying to discover, and eventually, you will find your interest
I have been struggling with programming for two years in the university. I naively thought it was a lifetime thing.
And thought that as long as you are called a master or a great person, you don’t have to worry about money
And claim to work for interest, not money
Look now, it was so silly and naive
In the carefree four years of college, I didn’t make it wide. Although it’s a bit late now, I still have to continue to do this.

Moving

Thank you to those friends in Hefei (I turned out to be disgusted with this term, but later found out that there is another meaning, Chinese culture is really broad and profound), I used to pull you out every time I was sad.
And stay with me for a while
Who else, when I learned that I had five subjects and retaken one, did not get a bachelor’s degree in psychology, did not enter a graduate school, out of desperation for a humble salary and rushed around, and prepared the day before my birthday When you are hit and sad and messed up, there is no disgust but comfort

Sanshengshi

Just listening to the name is awesome

The first contact was in “Sou Shen Ji”:

Lie on the three-life stone, realize the past and next lives, drink the worry-free spring water, and forget the grudges

Last time I visited Hangzhou and I googled Hangzhou attractions, I found three words “Sanshengshi”

At the end of my 22-year-old, there were many things that deviated from my vision
And I found that everything I did was probably avoiding (what to avoid?)

The most depressing thing is that after a sleep, the brain recompiles and runs everything according to what it wants.

When I woke up, I found myself sleeping very deep and relaxed, just like the time when I heard Zhao tell me I have BL in my junior year.

Then I went to see the Sanshengshi, not for anything else, after all, it’s my name to remove the life.

Utility and freedom

Understand true liberalism, understand the role of inheritance tax,

I understand that I may not have independent views, and there is a huge gap between critical thinking and critical thinking.

I understand that since “Happiness Lesson”, I feel so good about myself, and even overcorrected

Understand that you still can’t make promises to others, no matter who that person is

I understand that in order not to disappoint myself or others, I frequently choose not to act

Understand that sometimes opportunities are used to wait and change, the final result is lost

I understand that once I get frustrated, I still feel sad

But I still don’t understand, what when where who why how

Sometimes I feel that everything I do is just a small mess, so what if I change it, I still feel a sense of powerlessness

Yuyu stream bottom pine, seedlings from the mountain
In the diameter of the stem, shade this hundred feet

Wan said she recently discovered that if you work hard, you will achieve it

But my model is, it may not be realized, at least there will be many gaps between the real result and my own modeling

hope

Of course, I think, maybe they are just trying to excuse themselves and find a good-sounding reason for themselves
Of course, more likely, what I said is wrong
But in any case, no matter how you sigh, the wonderful 22 has passed.
Sometimes it feels like there is a clock, ticking on the alarm clock
Is it an inner time observation, but also the experience of the passage of time
It’s true, the dead are like husbands

I also know that hope does not matter whether there is or nothing
But I can’t help but hope that I’m on my way to the end of the third cycle.
I can make a breakthrough, just like the name of a Microsoft game: The Rise of the Country

entry.title: So Young
entry.content:
I want to write something, but I don’t know where to start

Probably entering the bottleneck period, I can’t feel any obvious changes

And no wonder there is a shift from blog to Weibo
There is no time to code a whole paragraph
Time is completely fragmented

And Shuangpin is finally getting smoother, except for tyu and other letters. Sometimes I don’t know it and I need to try it. Most of the time, it’s barrier-free
When I use Quanpin in the library, I obviously feel that there are too many subtitles to be tapped.

Hangtu

The first time I went with Yiya in Lu’an
At that time, I was shocked. The bookshelf reached the ceiling, and I had to climb the shelf while holding the book. It felt like a Harry Potter movie.
I wanted to come often
Last May Day, I finally stayed for more than a long time, and I tried the topic reading (in fact, parallel reading is not considered at best)
Let’s not talk about the reading effect, just take out the relevant books and brush off N of them. It’s quite fulfilling, don’t be too cool.

weekend

We don’t know what changes can bring us, but we know exactly what we will lose
No wonder always avoiding and avoiding
I ran to Shanghai and Hefei last month, let alone the effect of relaxation, it is true that the card burst

I used to be a housekeeper on weekends, and I feel overkill again. It seems that I am always pushing myself.
The time schedule is full, like a real-time multitasking operating system, non-stop, the CPU is always fully loaded
The result is tired, and I don’t feel like a weekend at all. The most depressing thing is that it’s too divergent. I didn’t do everything well. When I’m free, I don’t know where to start.

If I feel a week this time
It seems that one day we must stay in the house without opening the door;
Must be delayed on Friday or Saturday until one or two in the morning
To find a little rest

But today I ran for another day
I saw Mechanic3 in the morning, and it was done by one person again, ha ha

I think Tony must also be thinking, take off that armor, what is he, “Iron Man”? What about other people wearing armor?
He always called himself Mechanic, but later he seemed to have found the answer. He became more determined and healed his anxiety. At the end he said “I’m ironman”

In the afternoon, I went to a place similar to the English corner and read the original “art of learning”
I have brushed Chinese before, but the result is still full of obstacles and tragedy

Staying up late, sleepy and not sleeping, no morals
But the night is quiet, everything in the day fades, and the feeling of powerlessness suddenly occurs. Is this person me?

Wang Xiaobo said that all human suffering is essentially anger towards his incompetence.

It’s right to be angry, it’s not right to be nervous to harass others, then who is sorry?
I will go for psychological consultation tomorrow afternoon. I have already made an appointment.

World Book Day

4.23 After turning over the Douban group, I knew it was World Book Day
Helpless to resuscitate too late, it is the first time in life to know
Remember that sentence

I was reborn because of 200 books, and I was born again because of 1000 books

I thought that the fighting falcon I have been paying attention to, 1000+ is good enough
I just saw a broken 8k+ on Zhihu
For a moment, I thought I was dazzled
Then I thought it was extensive reading, and after seeing the number of notes, I collapsed
Ruin three views
Could it be the sweeping monk in “Dragon Babu”?

At first I thought it was a case, it is not universal
But the reality is cruel
It is sad to find that the broken k is calculated by heap
Are these people perverted? . .

I was not calm in an instant, I turned over the boxes and turned the cabinets, and marked all the books that I had read before, as long as they were books.
Thanks to the contribution of martial arts + fantasy, it instantly doubled, breaking through 200+, but unfortunately nothing has changed, and I have been a passerby since then.
Dedicated to today

Heart-to-heart, yet independent

There is a sentence in “Cang Hai”:

If there is no sweetheart by your side, even if there is a peerless light, what use is it?

Compared with Yingying in Kunlun, I prefer Hua Xiaoshuang, such an independent woman
Although I don’t know much about martial arts, I know exactly what I want and what I can do, kind, warm, and optimistic.

Like Shu Ting’s “To the Oak”

Heart-to-heart, yet independent

but

Sometimes when I fell in love with someone, I was already broken in love. There was no confession, no holding hands, no hugs, none of them, but I felt that I had been in love for a long time.

Now I know a little bit more than before
I have never crossed the mountain, I don’t know, my horizons are a bit broadened
But when I had a drink with the captain that time, I said, I know a little bit more, but is it useful?

like

As for the later story, I have already missed the right time to meet the right person again. It is sad for me, and hurt for her.

I am more liberal. I think respect provides a preparation for true love. Once that person appears, I will go all out
But when you think about it, why not deceive yourself
But what can I believe if I don’t believe it, I can only choose one, life is so helpless

To our dying youth

The whole article is full of a touch of sadness, and I am also very sad when I read it. Alas, the university has never experienced this medicine
When I read it, I have already graduated, tragedy, I heard that the movie didn’t make the taste as it should be, I didn’t watch it, and I don’t want to be sang again.
When I returned to school after Qingming last time, I was a little envious of those students
I originally planned to go downstairs to the 14# dormitory to burn some paper for memorial service, but I gave up later
A passage I saw very early should be very general:

In fact, I am quite envious of these tech nerds, mainly because of their lifestyle and unity. They can play World of Warcraft together, play Dungeons and Dragons board game, discuss women together, play anime together, and experience all kinds of joys in the world of men. Events, such a happy party, I’m afraid it’s only possible when you’re in college. After going to work, you have a career, that is, drinking and chatting together, all your hobbies may be renewed, because it will definitely delay your work. And life, so when you are happy, don’t blink, it’s 30 years.

entry.title: Feelings after joining the company for almost a year
entry.content:
JUST DO IT
Just do IT, ha ha

One year after graduation, let’s write a little bit

Going to school was easy at the time, and I thought I liked programming
But I really liked it at that time. No one was in charge of the university and I went to watch it spontaneously.
Probably because of the influence of the book “Be the Best You”, I regarded the data structure and algorithm very importantly, and stupidly thought that the trainees were all floating clouds, and even suffered a lot later.

Analyzing now, it was also that the vision was too narrow at that time.
People have to be a little hobby, otherwise it is so empty
At that time, I only knew programming, and it should be a sustenance. If you don’t even like this, and you don’t have a girlfriend, this kind of life is terrible

After the offer was signed, I was immediately removed from school
In that year, I had nothing to do, and I looked around and found many wonderful things.
Discover that the world is so magical and discover that there are many possibilities
Why do I define myself as a program ape siege lion?

I joined later, and overall, it’s okay
Day by day, it’s like plain boiled water

At the beginning, I lived far away. Every day, “Time is like water in a sponge. If you want to squeeze, you can always get on the bus.”
Obviously the dung bucket of the ants, I feel sad to think about
Later moved to the company, in order to save money, the paper is relatively old
I’ve seen Daqiang for the first time in my life, it’s not just disgusting.

In terms of work, generally speaking, most of the time is not too busy. At first, I looked at iOS development in my spare time.
I got busy later, my personal time was squeezed infinitely

I don’t know if it’s my Jiangzi or the industry is Jiangzi
I feel a bit like a firefighter, wherever there is a fire, wherever I am caught
At first it was Android, then the boss asked me to take a look at iOS
(Insert: I think everyone who is accustomed to win, contacting Apple, will be shocked by its design, which is why I always want to buy an air or pro)
Okay, I watched it for about two weeks and said that the Android side is too busy. Let’s see Android.
Later, he was caught to compile the android project
Now I’m going to be caught writing a webpage again

Of course, I just vomit, anyway, I’m not interested in it anymore.
Whatever you need, just take a look at what you need, and what you can do at work becomes
Some people should say that it can’t be deep
Yes, I don’t know, but I really don’t want to see it
I’m really envious when I see a colleague gnawing on jvm

I don’t have language beliefs, I just laughed at that language ranking
It feels reasonable to exist, and every language is born to deal with specific problems
No language is particularly good, that language is particularly bad

Of course, there is always a problem of habit. I have always used C to learn programming. I hardened Java and found that it was really smooth. It was a language for people to look at. Eclipse is also more comfortable to use than VS+VA. The automatic prompt is really too powerful. Up
But two days ago, I looked up the Bisset of the year and I don’t know it at all. Is this something I wrote that year?
There is also the Linux kernel, version 0.11, and the 2w code is implemented. It is short and concise, which is incredible

Yes, time is like cleavage, there is always a squeeze
But those who do this should all understand. I can’t wait to fall asleep when I get home. I don’t even want to care about my girlfriend. Where can I get the energy to do other things, and it’s accompanied by delays.
Yes, ** “I often worry that I don’t have enough time, but I squander the little time I have.”**

After a major layoff, about a half of the people who left, many compatriots who joined the job at the time were recruited
I became the silent majority, clocking in and out of get off work, not talking gossip, and not communicating with people around me very much.
The project prospects are not optimistic. TL has already flashed, the new TL is very anxious, and the Yali is getting bigger and bigger
I used to think there were many opportunities here, and I wanted to jump into a better company in two years. Now look at which company to go to, it’s actually not much difference

I’m really tired now, I want to quit, find a place to rest
But it’s not as good as going to school, with parents covering

If you want to change careers as soon as possible, where should you go?

entry.title: How to learn Shuangpin
entry.content:
The first to know that Shuangpin is the era of smart ABC
At that time, the input status bar in the lower right corner had a “Quan Pin”, click it, it becomes Shuang Pin, try a few letters, I don’t know what happened.
Later, when the Sogou input method was in full swing, Pinyin input evolved to the second generation, which greatly accelerated the input speed of Pinyin, and Wubi was left out in the cold.

Usually when we think about something, what comes out of our mind is “sound” instead of Chinese characters.
So Pinyin is more in line with the speaking process than Wubi

Later I tried Shuangpin, mainly because I saw a passage from Teacher Li Xiaolai’s “Take Time as a Friend”:

When I really realized the benefits of taking notes while reading, or even taking a lot of notes, I was surprised that I was scared into a cold sweat by myself. I suddenly understood how ridiculous it was that I refused to practice blind typing in the past. At that time, even if there was no stimulation of the opposite sex, it would take at most a week to get things done. I turned out to be lazy and refused to learn and practice. If this thought made me get goosebumps, even if I spent a week learning touch typing 5 years ago, how many more reading notes and words can I accumulate? ——Not to mention that almost 15 years ago, I had the opportunity, and it was entirely possible to learn blind typing. My God, how much time did I waste? I dare not think about it anymore.

Then I started to check the information, it’s not difficult, everyone will understand after reading Baidu
After all, they are all in the Pinyin system, just like when I was a child, I spoke the hometown dialect, but then there is basically no obstacle to learning Mandarin.

Facing several problems:

1. Speed

If it’s not for speed, the silly eggs will be replaced with Shuangpin

So where is Shuangpin fast?
for example:
I want to hit “Hello, Double Fight World”
The full spelling is nihao,shuangpinshijie
Shuangpin is nihk,udpnuijx (the natural code I used)
This is only six characters, which reduces the number of keystrokes by 8 times. If you count 3k a day, it is also 4k times less. It is also beneficial to protect your fingers.
Of course you may say “I have super simple spelling”, nh, spsj
Then I won’t talk about the duplicate code, you can turn the page to find it slowly
And Shuangpin is also Pinyin, so it makes no sense to not support Super Jianpin

2. Cross input method

Quanpin, no matter which input method is used, the keys are exactly the same
There are several schemes for Shuangpin, the common ones are the following (you can see it in Sogou settings)
Sogou also has a Sogou plan

I have checked before which scheme is more efficient
Children’s shoes that have not been touched don’t need to be tangled.
If you want to say that there is a real gap, you are only familiar with it

In addition, if you are not a coder, the one who is familiar with Microsoft is OK. After all, Microsoft’s reputation and the general input method QQ and Shenma support this.

If you use  family bucket and don’t want to install a third-party input method, use Sogou’s solution
This is the only one that supports both iPhone and Mac without jailbreak
The first natural code I used, but I had no choice but to change it to the Sogou solution 🤷‍♂️
Fortunately, the keys are almost the same, you will be familiar with it in a few clicks

Please continue

3. Cross-platform

I have played the dvorak keyboard before, and after a month of familiarization with the keys (the qwerty keyboard can only be typed blindly after a few months), I don’t know if it is a psychological effect, and I feel that the speed has indeed become faster, from the original 160 to 220

Windows can implement the qwerty->dvorak key mapping by modifying the registry, but ubuntu can’t. In addition, mobile phones have become popular after sophomore year. It is very painful for the two keyboards to switch directly. I have no choice but to return to qwerty.

With the lessons learned from the past, we should be very careful when choosing a plan, in case any of them don’t support it.

In the end, the natural code was selected, whether it is ubuntu, mac, or even the QQ pinyin of android, there is this “natural code”

Exercise:

Practicing boxing but not practicing kung fu
I figured out the principle, plan and everything, and finally reached the last step
Also the most simple step

Yes, you read it right, it’s the easiest step
As I said before, if Quanpin to Wubi is like learning English, then Quanpin to Shuangpin is as simple as learning Mandarin.
So students who have tried Wubi and gave up don’t have a psychological shadow.

It’s the easiest thing to say, because you only need to print out that key position, place it next to the computer, and open QQ, and chat with others every day as usual, and it’s OK.

Self-practice

  • Two days ago: It was weird (this time you will constantly want to switch back to ShuangPin, especially MM said that your typing is so slow, are you busy with other things, this point of pride is not necessary)
  • The next two days: Get used to it (the speed gradually increases, except for individual vowels that need to glance at the key table, and self-esteem slowly recovers)
    One week later: Naturally, from now on, all people will be passers-by

Congratulations, one more skill necessary for home travel outfit B!
Especially when someone uses your computer to press out a series of inexplicable words

entry.title: Kindle Paperwhite use physical examination
entry.content:
In the Haitao Japanese version, after a few minutes, vertical lines appear in the middle of the screen inexplicably, and more and more, depressed
Later on Google, it was said that electronic ink should not be close to the magnetic field, could it be caused by the speaker of the mobile phone?
At present, I can make do with it, it really affects the recognition word, and then contact customer service
The Japanese version cannot be repaired in the mainland.

I have seen my colleague’s kindle5 before, it flashes when I turn the page
For me, who is accustomed to the refresh speed of mobile phones and other things, suddenly feel unacceptable
It’s been a few months since I bought this. The mini2 hasn’t been released yet, and the library here in Hefei is not strong

After really using it, I feel why it is called a reading artifact
First of all, electronic ink protects the eyes, is not as heavy as a mobile phone, and has a single function to reduce interference

And there used to be many problems with mobile phone reading
Unacceptable screen dead pixels, unsatisfactory format after PDF conversion, custom fonts, chatting online, playing games, etc.

One day I watched and suddenly discovered that I had subconsciously ignored the above issues, and focused entirely on the acquisition of content.

I can only sigh that this Dongdong experience is so awesome-I didn’t even realize it was uncomfortable, it’s really super value

How to use push:

Search for one piece of tutorial, just do it step by step, use red for yourself

1. Book

TXT RTF and other formats, email to yourname@free.kindle.com (amazon will help you convert)
PDF can be viewed directly, but with margins, horizontal screen is fine
If you have to transfer, you can use calibre to convert to mobi email to yourname@kindle.com (although this effect is not very good, but I tried a few other conversion software, and compared it, none of this is good)

2. News, blog rss

  • Kindle4rss are all set up, and I found that only paying users can push it automatically, cheating! ! !
  • Aikandou just seems to be upgrading the server, stop registration
  • I don’t like the name of the dog’s ears. I only experimented with this one.

Brush system:

Kindle can be turned into a multi-view system
There are two features that I like very much but the Kindle native system does not have:

  • Multi-platform synchronization
  • Reading time statistics

When you get it, the kindle pw system has been upgraded to support pdf, and it may become bricked and repaired, so I don’t have to worry about it.

entry.title: Imperial City Tour
entry.content:
Speaking of the imperial capital, this picture appeared in my mind: yellow sand is full of the sky, passers-by wearing thick masks; when it rains, the imperial capital can watch the sea and boat.

I don’t want to get out of the car and find that the sky is very weak, azure and blue. I can’t wait to type a few words on it to declare “I am sky blue”
After arriving at the hotel arranged by the tour guide, my little friend and I were shocked: they were rows of tiled houses and tiled houses.

first day

Earlier, I found plastic bags on the floor and dirty, messy, like the street scene behind the food stalls in Yingnan Town
Later, under the leadership of Director Ma, I felt that life in the imperial capital was so difficult
During this period, the horse guide has been on the road without stopping, as if he wanted to quickly end the day’s journey
It seems that Lingbo’s microstep has been small, and there is no big movement, but he slips away quickly, throwing us away.
Within half a day, we rushed to Tiananmen Square, National Museum, Military Museum, and then to the Water Cube/Bird’s Nest

KFC mentioned the small four at noon. I know that it is the small era who got an amazing 0.9 point on verycd. The lowest score seems to be 1 point. How did the 0.9 come about? Unconsciously
Then I was forced to watch an acrobatic performance
The results of the evening test were gratifying. After a year of hard work, I got a tan right away.

Fortunately, the tickets of a couple who are traveling together are the day after tomorrow, otherwise it is difficult to guarantee that they will go back the next day
Deeply experienced the struggle of the ant tribe of the Xiabei Piao family and the Chinese dream promoted everywhere

In the evening, I ate a big bowl house in a street that is known as gold everywhere. A friend who listened to the horse guide babbled how difficult it is to be in the imperial capital.
I was drinking water and thinking, damn it, it’s like you’re alone in the world
But after all, it’s a treat, and you have to pretend to be sympathetic. Fortunately, there is no laughter.
Not wanting to be the last, the couple wanted face and rushed to settle the account, and the tour guide happily took it back and reimbursed
When I came out, I imitated what Gandalf said to Bilbo Baggins in the movie The Hobbit:

The world is not in your maps and books ……When you come back, you will not be the same.
The world is not in your maps and notes… When you come back, you are different from others.

PS1: The big bowl house that was eaten and closed in the first year of high school?
PS2: Wangfujing, at the same time @新华视点: At about 20:42 on the evening of the 30th, a man stabbed a girl with a knife in front of the gate of Xindongan Market in Wangfujing, Beijing

the next day

I went to the Forbidden City and took a look. I don’t know why, every brick and every tile reveals a thick feudal ignorance
The tour guide is in Barabala, where there is no one else. Feng Shui and Yin-Yang are magical, but two passersby became free spectators

PS: One of them is still Huawei’s code farmer

In the meantime, I saw a long-haired foreign girl, with her head down, leaning on the railing quietly, with lovely freckles on her face.

PS: No wonder some white people tan their skin to wheat
PS: After seeing this kind of person, I feel that the world has calmed down. I have seen it several times in total. In this impetuous and noisy society, it gives people tranquility, and I don’t know when I can reach such a realm without using foreign objects.

In the evening, the horse guide changed to a five-star hotel, no, the Express Hotel outside the Fifth Ring Road
There was a disagreement over how to get the body to the destination
After doing a long subway journey, I found that some young people were reading mobile phones/books and were charging them every minute, including our horse guide.

This reminds me of the reading volume of the Russian nation, and the great dynasty is finally getting better
But will this continue to happen? Men and women tears

PS: I often don’t date girls and become notices

I have a mentality of inaction and don’t want to lie down with the gun, and the situation is getting worse
On the first day, I spit out the horse guide from time to time, but now I am too weak to spit out
People are hard to dismantle, omitted here

Third day

I originally wanted to go to Peking University and other universities and Zhongguancun
But I heard that the new students are starting school recently, they may not be admitted
Coupled with the little thoughts of Tai Ji the other day

Look at the time and ride alone for thousands of miles.
Drinking a bottle of water from the Western Qinghai-Tibet Plateau of the Chinese nation at the South Station, it was immediately full of positive energy
After reading a book in the car for a while, I got off and bought an ice cream
Super Plus enjoy

Of course the drawing Tucson is broken
Just then I received a text message and was asked to invite dinner
Dizzy, don’t you know if you’re tired?
I just came back from the imperial capital, so tired and half to death, I also invited to eat, let’s talk about my boyfriend,
Then the willpower that I watched in the past two days took effect, I remembered the green exercise, took a few deep breaths, asked why, and answered that I didn’t eat
I also think of being rejected by Ten Actions back then, and all kinds of cheating and dog-blood incidents afterwards. Looking back, it looks like a vulgar romance novel from the local to the scumbag.
I bought a watch last year and I made a mistake if I didn’t settle the account.

After I got home, I went online for more than an hour and found that there was no water
Suddenly, the revised Maslow needs levels are too accurate

When I ran to pay the water bill, the salesperson looked surprised and didn’t owe the bill.
In doubt, the landlord sent a text message saying that he closed the main gate

Damn it, your sister! ! ! I think they are still sitting on the red train

Later, I heard from the landlord’s wife that their carriage caught fire due to the aging line, and then they were called by the police to record the transcripts. It was that time.

So, you can’t speak too harshly, and you can’t be a man. Sao Nian

entry.title: Warm acupuncture
entry.content:
Today, Zha Chengshan seems to have found the right position. It is not very painful. It will be sour after an inch.
Put the Ai Zhu on the needle handle and ignite

It’s okay at the beginning, Mars slowly burns
A single spark can start a prairie fire, and the smoke is getting bigger and bigger, it is probably scared
The discomfort is getting stronger and stronger, so that I have a strong hallucination: the acupuncture points are scorched.

Hurry up and pour the water, and heard a squeak, and then a lot of smoke came out, as if hitting iron
Ai Yiran, who didn’t want to ignite, was stubborn and had to take a cup of water
Although it finally went out like unburnt smoke
But Ai Zhu and Needle seem to be dying together, they are inseparable from the swelling
I dare not make any big moves, after all, the other end is stuck in my flesh o(╯□╰)o

Because there was a pile of moxa sticks on it, I had to pull it hard, and it felt like 101 sticking to it. It was very painful.

I’m sweaty, but when I wash my face I feel pretty cool in my calves

Recall the analysis:
It should have used hit run hit
Coupled with the auxiliary defense without lateral friction, the damage value is greatly increased
So too hot may be an illusion, the movement of the needle tip pulls the nerve fiber is the reason

Of course the most likely thing is that I am neurotic

entry.content:
