entry.title: The murder caused by two bottles of Jiaduobao
entry.content:
Two small partners, a good relationship
One of them is from the police school and the other is from Chinese medicine

A friend of Chinese medicine doctor came over as a guest, and quarreled when he left, and was fined 5 yuan to buy a bottle of Jiaduobao that he had just drunk.
Because it is nearly 43% higher than the market price, it may have caused a psychological imbalance in the Chinese medicine partner. He actually took the risk and tried to take another bottle of Jiaduobao.
After being discovered, the nature of the natural incident escalated, and the friends of the police academy felt mentally insulted
And the TCM friends stubbornly resisted, and at the same time unconsciously brought on taunting skills
In the end, he tried to settle the incident with RMB and was punched afterwards.

I thought that the little friend who studied Chinese medicine was like me. He had never used hands since he was a child, and he has not even seen people do hands. He has little on-the-spot experience, so he has been in a passive state of being beaten. dps
Later I found out that my drawing Tucson was broken

When I reacted and thought about pulling, the battle was over
The incident was so sudden, I didn’t react at all, and my fellow Chinese medicine practitioner was hit
The final blow is a flying kick + back head knife
After the incident, I somehow appeared in the arcade 2x combo
Probably I didn’t expect that my fellow police academy would really do it. I was shocked!

After that, the police academy’s friend blocked the door and refused to let the Chinese medicine partner go. I didn’t understand at the time, but now I remember
It often appears in martial arts novels that after receiving a palm, there was no problem at the time, and after a few steps out of the gate, he vomited blood and fell to the ground.
Of course, after a consensus, the TCM friends still left

Don’t worry, ask him about his injuries, whether he suffered internal injuries when he was kicked, and whether he had bruises on his stomach.
I don’t want to be unscathed and have been active on the dating scene with his GL

-_-|||

The little friend from the police academy here said that the soft tissue of the hand seemed to be injured, and it hurts when he moved.

-_-|||

I asked my friends who have traditional Chinese medicine before that if they don’t practice internal strength, they know how to acupuncture and moxibustion.
The result was still vowed

Given his GL surname Zhang, could it be that the following episode happened at that moment:

At this moment of silence, the little friend of Chinese medicine suddenly remembered a few words in the textbook: “He is strong by him, and the breeze blows the mountains. He is horizontal, and the moon shines on the river.” He was there. When I read these few texts in the study room, I still didn’t understand the reason. At this moment, I suddenly remembered that with the tyranny and viciousness of the police school students, oneself is by no means an enemy. According to the main point of the textbook, it seems that no matter how strong the enemy is, No matter how ferocious, he can be regarded as the breeze blowing on the mountain and the bright moon reflecting on the river. Although it can be applied to me, it cannot be damaged in the slightest. But how can I not harm my body? The text below said: “He is cruel and hates himself, I am really angry.”

T M D is this playing me

Given that these two terrorists often move within five feet of our radius
I decided to complete Chum kiu as much as possible this weekend, just in case

entry.title: Games
entry.content:
Games played in those years

Monopoly

The stock market goes to their sum

As a result, a sudden incident, bankruptcy. . .

Buy insurance next time

radiant defense

After not wanting to break away from PC games, I became obsessed with mobile games
Plants vs. Zombies 2 After clearing the level with speed, the meaning is still not enough
I wanted to see other tower defenses and I found out

radiant defense, Chinese called dazzle defense
As the name suggests, the picture is very beautiful, I like it right away
But don’t want to be the hardest game

After playing, I also felt the miserable situation in the early stage. If the technology is upgraded, the later stage will be smoother.
On the contrary, if the early stage is relatively smooth, the east wall will inevitably be demolished later.

Today, after the tenth level, I have always had that dynamic music in my mind.

After that, I saw that TOP’s answer on Zhihu. Fuck,

After a while, calm down, think about it, compare with others, go your own way

Anno 2070 deep sea

This simulation is too high, and the pace of the game is very slow, like a real-world simulation
It’s okay to play for a month. It’s impossible to play a battle like Warcraft for ten minutes or even minutes.

1. Pay attention to the people

In the past games, people were made, although they were not beasts, they were at least cannon fodder, and they were drawn to be cows and horses.
And the people inside seem to have gone through the Renaissance and embarked on the road to freedom
The ruler (me) has become a serviceman, and he wants to treat the people as a master
Complete various facilities, hospitals, various foods, public security bureaus, concert halls, etc., to meet various needs
So that people are willing to come and settle down, tax

Two countries’ relations

There will be various cooperation to achieve a win-win situation
Of course there is also a killer: stuff money

Three resources

There are only a few islands
Some of the barren land left by nuclear bombs, and some are the ruins left by over-industrialization, often accompanied by acid rain
Some soils are milder and larger, occupying the right time and place, and may even show signs of future technology
Global market, you can grab land and sell land
You can also invest in other countries, there is actually risk control

Four operations

You don’t need a keyboard, a mouse or even a touchpad. The era of Warcraft APM is gone forever.
I don’t know if I missed those operations. Apart from the cross-sea trade, I have to ask me about all other matters.
I have to balance the resources between the islands
I can’t control it at all.
I happened to be watching “Out of Control”, which describes the distributed and small but beautiful

Five wars

Skip Chicheng and attack warehouses and ports directly, implying a draw from the bottom of the tank, with half the effort
After the warehouse burst, the surrounding buildings became water without a source, a tree without a root, and collapsed.

In terms of diplomacy, he stretched out his hands and didn’t hit the smiley people, stuffed money everywhere, watched the frictions in the surrounding countries, played happily, and developed quietly.

I remember when I was in junior high school, I asked my teacher about the Blitz, why some European countries surrendered without fighting.
The teacher smiled, hundreds of tanks pressed over, how to fight
At that time, all I knew was that when the empire moves, one hundred regiments will fight. I don’t know the hardships of foreign wars on population
And the philosophy at the time was that a soldier can be killed and not be insulted. It is better to fight until there is only one brick and one tile left than to let the enemy even half a step
What’s more, people just drove to the national border and didn’t fire a shot. Why did they kneel and lick it? (There was no such saying at that time)
At that time, I still couldn’t understand or even know the state of the soldiers who came to the city without fighting.

When I was in full diplomacy and distributed the submarines, and then almost at the same time, one nuclear bomb was in a warehouse, and I passed the declaration of war and directly exploded the opponent out, it seemed to understand a little bit.

Assassin’s Creed 4

I thought that after Ezio’s Brotherhood Revelation, after a lifetime of military service, there is no god

It’s time to climb the wall, assassinate all kinds of stuff, no surprises

I saw the assassin’s 4 in verycd, I sighed for the next time, and then I saw under the black flag

I have watched a documentary before, China Revolution: under the red flag, not much to say, self-sufficient, so the name of 4 is so domineering.

This reproduces the great nautical era, tornadoes, waves, and sea battles in storms

So enjoyable

Saints Row 4

Does this make me swollen?

Funny as always, with black humor everywhere

The following things are really stunned.

Aliens! ! !

Then…and…

superpower? !

If you’ve played the Prototype, you must be familiar with it this time
If you have seen The Matrix, you will understand

Watch that action
Parkour is as good as Alex
Jumping and accumulating power are the same as Neo
Coming from the sky, like Superman

Don’t go to the code (๑′°︿°๑) to expose, otherwise it’s easy to feign death and forcibly exit

Really a free city

The only downside is that the map is basically the same as the three generations, which is a bit small for Superman

entry.title: Why Hexo
entry.content:
I used Jekyll when I first built it, Octopress never tried it
Jekyll’s framework design is divided into two parts: code + generated webpage
When uploading to github, the code part is pushed up, and hexo is a locally generated webpage, which should have certain advantages in speed
I saw that the default template is also pretty, so I changed to hexo yesterday

I feel that the biggest feature of hexo is that it hides cumbersome commands
In Jekyll’s words, at least a dozen items from construction to completion
And writing a new article requires at least

Maybe in the eyes of many people, it’s already very simple

But know that some people ** are not siege lions, they just want to start a blog without thinking, and the focus is on **writing
And before writing, you have to make so many commands by Parapara, if you forget one, or miss a parameter, you have to -h, if your English is not good, you have to google, be walled, you have to baidu, wait until the real When writing, I don’t know how many Pomodoros are.
And jekyll has at least a bit of git concept, if you write a Chinese blog, you have to change ruby (utf-8)
Every day, every day, every day!

And hexo is really simple, you only need to know 8 letters in the whole process

For me and other non-professional siege lions, it’s so refreshing to use it to tears.

entry.title: My First Macbook Pro
entry.content:
rMBP ME865 8g 256g
Taobao, Hong Kong Bank, has started for three days

Start attention

Whether the box/chassis/system ID is the same

Whether the three codes are in one, the difference must be unpacked

Detect power cycle times

Generally within 5 times, the less the better (mine is twice)

Check the warranty date on the official website

Here (you can see the seller’s purchase date)

Never use any optimization

Especially the children’s shoes that have just turned to Windows and brought clean OCD
I have known that Mac does not need to be cleaned up, and it is a new one, but when I see the best disk cleanup-CleanMyMac, I still feel cheap

After cleaning up for a while, I found that the temperature was over 90, and checked the heat dissipation problem of the mac
Later, it was discovered that there was a process rushing CPU
Then I found that many icons in the Dock became transparent (there is a word, you can click it, and restart it will not solve it)
One Google, many people actually reinstalled the system

And the culprit is actually CleanMyMac
The lesson of blood is that if you don’t die, you won’t die! ! ! **

The solution for icon transparency:

Click on the Dock to restore it; if it doesn’t work, move it out first, then drag it in

entry.title: Life shouldn't be so boring
entry.content:
Classmate, do you feel that life is so boring
Anesthetize yourself in the game every day? Brushing Weibo over and over again?
Or is it strange that I don’t have any Han/Sister paper for my god horse?

In fact, the world is still very powerful. If you don’t believe me, please see: (continuously finishing…post the link later)

read

No need to explain this, it’s nothing more than:

  • Ugly people can f**k books only.
  • Read more if you are ugly

Shuangpin

Are you all weak?

Mode of thinking

Occam’s Razor

Does God roll the dice?

Simplicity is better than complexity
Simple is beautiful

Critical thinking

independent

  • economic
  • Speech
  • thought

Indispensable
Look at my celestial environment, okay…

Poor Baba Fu Baba

Cash flow/ESBI four-quadrant/income statement

A sentence shocked by Douban Book Review

People who read this book in the early years are now at least millionaires

Wuhezhizhong

I remember that there seemed to be a Harvard professor who didn’t understand why China’s students became so crazy overnight
He must have never read this book

Hypothetical game

There is only one life in one’s life, which is linear
When there is nothing to do, observe the people around you and choose a role from the people around you to bring in
Simulate a completely different life

Plato Cave

Matrix?

Out of control/a brief history of information/selfish genes

This amount of information is too much, it destroys the three views, and you have to taste it yourself
Free will
Gene-meme
Actually we are nothing but machine silver

Physical surgery

Cambridge Concise History of Jin Yong’s Martial Arts

False is true when true is also false, nothing is there and there is nothing
Do not believe it, see below

Tai Chi

It’s not Tai Chi Radio Gymnastics
Chen style Tai Chi, put aside the actual combat first, there is really nothing to say about health preservation
It is said that yoga was first introduced abroad, and later studies have shown that Tai Chi has a better fitness effect~

Now more of the feeling belongs to the guiding technique, the external movement reaches the inner stillness, and the small Zhoutian is driven by opening up the big week.

Yoga

This is not just the usual actions on TV every day

The core is the three chakras and seven chakras (like meridians in Chinese medicine)
Sahasrara Chakra, Brow Chakra, Throat Chakra, Heart Chakra, Manipura Chakra, Sea Chakra, Brahma Chakra

It seems that the effect is as good as getting through Xiao Zhoutian

Ren Du Ermai

Reading martial arts novels when I was young, I always imagined that one day I accidentally opened up the two lines of Ren and Du, and soared.
Gansu Department of Health: 41 medical staff learn to get through the second pulse of Ren and Du in 9 days
This is actually true, there is nothing wrong with it! ! !

In fact, it comes from the Li Shaobo True Qi Operation Method, which has high credibility

Wing Chun

Ip Man 1 2 The Prequel The Ultimate Battle: The Grand Master After that, everyone knew about this martial arts
To know the performance of martial arts / actual combat
What surprised me the most was that Wing Chun really played like on TV

When the wooden pegs were driven, there was a smashing bunker.

Little thought walked up

Mental power

Hypnosis

It’s not that you can let others do whatever you learn, don’t think too much, teenager

Qingming Dream (Dream Space)

Quite like a large-scale 3D game, the highest level is the dream maker
The core idea is: I realize I am dreaming in my dream

It’s said that if you control your dreams, you can do anything, anything.
Baidu Qingmingmeng Bar

Da Vinci sleep (polyphasic sleep)

Legend (note the legend) Da Vinci, Einstein and other geniuses only use one sleep cycle (1.5 hours), so that, in a year, they live 100 days more than ordinary people…
I tried it, and again confirmed that I am an ordinary person… T.T

Pomodoro Technique/The Power of the Present

When I eat, am I really eating?
When I walk, am I really walking?
Do I really hear the sounds around me? Did I really see everything?
When I study, can I really concentrate, even for 10 minutes

When really paying attention to “now”, this is also the reason for meditation

Ljubischev/Inner Time Observation

All our activities, thoughts, wishes and dreams must use time as the carrier
The dead are like a husband
How to be friends with time

English

Get GRE words in 17 days

It’s been 20+ years, and it’s not done yet, the gap…

SSS reading method

Originally, I thought that after reading over a million words, I could read the original E-text book without barriers.
Now it’s almost 100W before I know that there is a second, third… T.T

Never learn English

note! This is a counterexample, no one has succeeded so far
Don’t use this method

Find the first book on English learning methods

This article by Leaking House was born in the sky, shocking me waiting for English rookies

Dialysis

Use your English
Dad’s English Classroom
step by step, I saw the dawn from the pit to the gods for the first time
At present, it has entered the middle and high level O(∩_∩)O~

Of course, if all the above are of no interest, then I will use the magic weapon, and the teenager will take it:

Quick Psychiatric Method

The genius is on the left, the lunatic is on the right-the first domestic interview with mental patients
As long as we sit there and think about nothing, once a day for one hour at a time, we can become mentally ill! How amazing!
Singular functions have become popular recently, and I also seem to have high credibility. Non-spiritual. Speaking from Haizi

At last

I’ve played most of them, and I’ve written a guide, you can read it if you’re interested.
Seriously, most of us just walked through our lives carelessly like this

entry.title: Time management
entry.content:
I prefer tossing software. GTD is not limited to:

  • must
  • Comfortable.do
  • wunderlist

These three are all good tools that support multi-platform synchronization (mac ios win android)
Each has its own characteristics, regardless of the ranking, you can try it out by yourself and choose the one you like

But after using it, you will find that the plan is still not completed. It was originally in the “Today” project, but it is still “Today” a week later.
Just like we all know about procrastination, and anger changes it, but it is often delayed until the last moment; don’t senior smokers know that smoking is harmful to your health, or that one after a meal can beat a living god
Therefore, if you don’t discover from yourself, even with the best software, you can’t stop the dissipation of time.

How to prevent “invalid time”

First of all, it is stated that time is equivalent and there is no such thing as “invalid”. I just want to express that the past day was different from what you expected to do, and you don’t know “how did another day pass”)

“A Strange Life” describes a person who is accompanied by time—Liubischev, and introduces his method of time statistics. It is said that this person has an inherent time observation
In this TED video, Philip Sinbad introduced Healthy Time Concept , I think it should be the same kind of things

Ljubischev’s feeling of time passing, accurate to the minute, I think it’s not difficult. (For example, I used to use a regular screen every day, how many years, I didn’t feel anything, I’ve seen Retina and come back again. It’s no good, maybe I noticed those details) accurate to ten minutes, half an hour, it’s always possible

So, you should spend a month, at least a week, and don’t plan anything first. Use half an hour as a unit to truthfully write down where your time is spent, accumulate raw data, and take a look at yourself. How did you spend the day

You may find that you have checked Weibo, surfed the Internet, etc. With these data, you will be aware of this next time you do this kind of thing.

How to make good use of Google Calendar

I have been using Google Calendar for two years. At first, it seemed to mark the interview time of various companies. Later, I slowly started to record other things. Then I saw “A Strange Life”, which actually fits the habits of the great god Happy
…
(I’m so exhausted, I’ll write later)

Although I kept recording since then, I didn’t really summarize it until I saw this book a few days ago.

I haven’t read it yet, but I have gained a lot. The notes are [here](http://leihao0.github.io/2013/12/16/%E6%8A%8A%E6%97%B6%E9%97% B4%E7%95%99%E7%BB%99%E6%9C%80%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%81%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%8B/)
(This author seems to be a master, covering all aspects, from how to find your own interests to how to realize your dreams, and so on. I don’t want to read this answer, but it’s best to read the book, *strongly recommended *)

Colors are added to the calendar in the book:

  • Black: career and achievement
  • Red: Family and social communication
  • Yellow: healthy
  • Blue: the meaning and value of life

At that time, my eyes lit up, and I felt a kind of enlightenment. I immediately went to Google Calendar and tried to mark a few weeks.

Sure enough, after that, every night, every weekend, as long as you glance at it, you will know the general consumption of time in all aspects.
But before I didn’t watch each Event one by one, I couldn’t figure out what I did.

I think many people are reluctant to summarize and organize their desktops. It may be because there are too many tedious things and their brains are messed up. They feel that it takes too long to organize, and they don’t have a good framework. Then drag it. This is probably the reason for keen to pursue software (tools)

Followed by Google Task
This thing seems to be a list, and it can be graded
I used to record some recent things to do, and when adding Event, it is convenient to copy and paste (Is this Google’s original intention? 囧)

mind Mapping

Mindjet mentioned above, there are more people who use it, skip
Let me talk about another kind of mind map, which I also accidentally saw on Zhihu:
When the protagonist in the TV sorts out clues, he will connect the materials pinned to the wall with wires and find the intersection. What is the method?

TheBrain, the artifact

Gantt chart

The advantage of this thing is that you can clearly know your progress, especially when several projects are in parallel
At that time I was frantically looking for a good software (the reason why I don’t need Ganttproject is that the interface is too ugly, -_-|||)
Later I found out that Mindjet actually supports it, but the operation is very inconvenient
OmniPlan on Mac is good, but it is paid

but! ! but! ! When I saw our project manager use Excel as a Gantt chart (a small grid represents a day and can be color-coded), I was stunned! !

other

There are also some such as: morning diary, Evernote, four quadrants of priority, and I will talk about it later if you have a chance

My personal value ranking:

  1. Free love
  2. Health
  3. Economic independence
  4. Ideal

I have been using Google Calendar for almost two years, and I can’t remember how it started. It implies “A Strange Life”, but it’s just a record.
Colors were added to this book, which made my eyes shine. I immediately went to google and tried to mark it for a few weeks.

  • Black: career and achievement
  • Red: Family and social communication
  • Yellow: healthy
  • Blue: the meaning and value of life

The calendar that was originally all-colored is immediately colorful and comes alive

As stated in the book:

The brush of life is always in your own hands. More black, blue or red is entirely up to your personal decision. I believe that as long as you complete this painting according to your own inner requirements, it must be the most beautiful in your heart. masterpiece.

After that, it turned out to be everyone’s method of “How to Find Your Dream”

There are subtle changes in society all the time. Over-developed information transmission means that the boundary between true and false is becoming more and more blurred. People’s psychological anxiety is increasing day by day, and their self-awareness is becoming stronger and stronger. The focus on others has shifted to self-introspection, and the pursuit of consciousness and morality has changed more urgently than in any previous historical period.

When a person doubts the meaning and value of his life, he is sick.

  • Freud

Different from utopian fantasy, looking to the future is a strategic behavior of mankind, which includes courage, strength, and a firm determination to put ideals into practice.
——Roman Herzov, former President of Germany
A person’s most luxurious enjoyment is that he doesn’t need an alarm clock because he is the master of his time
It is human nature to find troubles, even if there are no problems in reality, we will come automatically
If you feel you don’t have time, then you have to take a break
Only oneself can force oneself to accept those unpleasant things

This thing is like kung fu. At the master level, flying flowers and picking leaves can hurt people.
For example, one of my classmates used 3M sticky notes as Note (Later I saw “Too Stupid Book of Heaven” said that no more than three at a time, complete one, and tear one off from the display)
Of course, having a NB software when we are not so NB is just like a tiger.
The most important thing is not to forget the original purpose of GTD and form your own management system

entry.title: Codecademy
entry.content:
2014-01-04 23:39:28
Finally finished

No wonder Ruby gives you freedom. From the perspective of syntactic sugar alone, it is better than Python
I didn’t like Ruby because of the’end’ problem, but I did it as a whole:

  1. There is no need to pay attention to indentation everywhere like Python, and it can be indented automatically (Python has never seen it before), so worry-free
  2. : Etc. symbols are reduced, function calls are more natural
  3. More object-oriented (Python still has the concept of type (int str…), passing parameters, return values, etc. are particularly obvious; Ruby is weakened, and you can’t even feel the existence of types when you use it)

As a whole, it is realized

  1. Algorithm has nothing to do with code, much less than Python
  2. It’s more natural to write

Therefore, it is best not to make subjective judgments before you understand something

PS:
Java and Android have been used for nearly a year, but there is no love. I don’t understand this.

2014-01-03 23:37:58
Do not use Python and Ruby at the same time

Since Ruby is in front, end is fine

I was sad when I wrote Python, I always forgot the colon, and it is easy to forget return
class wants (object), def func(self): torture people everywhere

++ && This way of writing from C is also a face

The functions of these two languages are different. For example:

It is often mixed, and the error is only found after submission, plus the internet speed…

It hurts to use a proxy card, you can’t get in without even entering…

I’m still the kind of person who writes two sentences and runs them to see the results
A lot of time is wasted waiting for the results after submission
It is said that Ruby is slow, the most exaggerated one is that after ROR is converted to GO, the server dropped from 30 to 2
I still don’t believe it, but it’s just a problem (of course it should be the internet speed or the web server)
But this is a rush to tell people that Ruby is slow with someone else’s life… speechless

Stupid reminder
Mainland too card, after a long time, it prompts to check the loop, please ask me a for/while, is it OK?
Especially Ruby, a language that has N methods

There are two judgment conditions for the feeling result:

  1. Result string comparison
  2. Source code regular inspection

entry.title: Difficult conversations with parents
entry.content:
It’s not cold, but it’s quite speechless

Choose a job after graduation, let me go to graduate school
When I was just working, I asked me to take a civil service exam every time I called (what if those who say they want to make a phone call from time to time and keep in touch?)
Gap Year (I didn’t ask my parents for a penny), and still despise me every day

In short, I feel that you are their private property. LZ brought you into the world, not what I said?
by! When it grows up, its wings become hard and it becomes disobedient, right?

Then began to point fingers at you in an attempt to tamper with your life:

  1. Use power and brainwash (since I was young, now I just need to turn on the switch)
    Move out the unwarranted “The king wants the minister to die, the minister has to die. The father wants the son to die, the son has to die.”
    Taken out of context “Parents are here, so don’t travel far away”
    Filial piety first
    …

PS: Did they watch “1984”? My knowledge is superficial. . .

But you may have been bathed in Western equality thoughts and read
Rousseau’s “On the Origin of Human Inequality”, Russell’s “History of Western Philosophy”, Thoreau’s “Walden” and other masterpieces
Towards independence of mind, not the same as Confucianism

It’s ok:

  1. Use material means to kidnap you
    Common: full payment, down payment, job arrangement, etc.

According to “Influence”, give the other party a little benefit, don’t feel that the other party owes you, so that they can get more benefits
That is, “Eat people’s mouth and soften their hands”

But you may have read Krishnamurti’s “The Things You Must Not Think of in Life”, Lao Tzu’s “Tao Te Ching”, and “The Power of the Present” when you were weak.
Understand that life should liberate oneself and seek inner tranquility most
And the strength is relatively strong, LZ can be self-reliant, these things are not required, they still live well.

Brother is financially independent, so you can’t do anything to me.

It doesn’t matter, what else is there:

  1. Sorry
    Even if you are in a mess, but
    People are not plants, who can be ruthless, after all, blood is thicker than water
    They tried to kidnap you with family
    “I live for you in this life”, “Don’t blame your parents, they have given you the best”

I go, do you think the “best” is what I want?

“We have done this for you, are you worthy of me?”
Ο \ _ \ _ Ο “…
Where did this sour rushing come from? (“The Road Few People Walk” mentioned this kind of parents with deep sacrificial spirit, embarrassing)

“We are your parents, of course we must care about you”
Please, this is obviously trying to control others, no one cares
What kind of tone is used to care about a person? ? ?

PS: There is also this problem between lovers

The words above are a bit serious
In fact, in the generation of parents (they were also young, okay), most of them became victims of the lack of education.
Black-and-white thinking, people speak differently, without the ability to think independently

Cause them to fail to realize the improprieties of their thinking, thoughts, attitude, and tone
I don’t look at the facts, but I think I’m right. After all, I eat more salt than a child’s food. I have a posture of “what I say is the truth of the universe”. Reasoning is useless.

As children, knowing that it’s not their reason, it’s very sad to see them in that tone
The best way (I can think of now) may be to cater and do some “white lies” to coax them happy
But when it comes to major events, paper cannot contain the fire, and conflict is still inevitable

Due to age, it is almost impossible for the elderly to come into contact with new ideas. It is no longer realistic to ask the previous generation to change
But we can start with the next generation-I wonder if you realize that our generation is going to be mom and dad too

So we can ask questions such as: “How to communicate with parents”, “How to keep parents from getting angry”, “Is there any way to make myself think that the advice of parents is correct”, “How to be an obedient child”, “I want to test How to persuade civil servants/researchers/doctors/post-doctors to stay in their hometowns and their parents refuse

Then remind them of Shangzhihu

entry.title: The beginning of the story
entry.content:
Once upon a time there was a little mage who was born in Zeya continent surrounded by mountains

The school where the little mage is located is ranked thousands of miles away in the magic world. Looking around, there is no magical master in the whole school.

When the little mage graduates, it will only be a static magic

Although this kind of magic is very NB, but it takes too long, and you have to stand still when casting the spell

Until a few days ago, the little mage suddenly heard that there is a magic that can be sung while walking, and he became very curious.

After reading the latest magic book, I found that among all the dynamic magic, there is a magic called Ruby on Orbit

This kind of magic pronunciation is weird and inexplicable, but as long as the singing is right, you can summon the most lethal magic in the shortest time.

Then he was killed by the magic he summoned

entry.title: Learn more, learn less
entry.content:
When I was in high school, there was a student in our class. For the first time in my life, I saw a intelligence.

I never saw him studying. I can see playing games or reading novels.

There are also some learners, which means they can get close to intelligence in scores through hard work.

It’s a pity that Turth is I am not one of them.

I studied harder, but the score still did not improve.

You can imagine how desperate I was at the time, which shows that they are talented and intelligent, and I am nothing. I was born a loser.

After so many years, I made up my mind. This is just the magic of the brain.

This book, written by a wise man, describes “how steel is made”.

Thank God, there is always hope.

MINDMAP:

entry.title: resurrection
entry.content:
The last time the little mage intensively trained Ruby on the track, he paid the price of blood

The magic book is jointly recommended by many magical masters. It is divided into 11 chapters. It is written in Elvish language and looks very NB sample paper.

The little mage’s elves were so-so, guessing, half of the practice, a little uncomfortable reaction

In Chapter 9, the continuous casting time was too long, and the magic showed signs of backlash.

Prior to this, the courses of the Little Mage at Codecademy Academy were smoothly removed. The hypertext markup spell, hierarchical style sheet, python ruby are all available, and there are only 3 chapters left in the book.

It just so happened that Little Master was poured a lot of chicken soup from Moments, such as:

A person, if you don’t force yourself, you don’t know how good you are; a person, if you don’t force yourself, your world will always be black

and also:

If a person wants to be excellent, you must accept the challenge; a person, if you want to be excellent as soon as possible, you must find a challenge

It is conceivable that the little mage is full of confidence and full of positive energy

Ignoring that the mage does not have a strong body like a swordsman, and has professional limitations, most of them are in sub-health

Coupled with lack of mana, I have to play technology

Finally in the final chapter, the red and blue were exhausted, and he was beaten to death by the monster he summoned.

Fortunately, the little mage has a lower level and a shorter resurrection time

But wasted a rebirth ankh for no reason, the little mage is still very unhappy

When people around me kindly ask, they can only knock down their teeth and swallow blood.

After all, as a mage, it’s shameful to be killed by a spell he summoned.

After this incident, the little mage was also forced to form a Pavlovian restriction, that is, the animal’s response to specific stimuli

Now I feel nauseous when I see Elvish

So the little mage decided to never touch magic anymore recently

…

entry.title: Build your own blog
entry.content:
What I feel best is:
VPS + domain name WordPress and other blog frameworks, so that the URL, background environment, etc. are controlled by yourself

If you don’t spend money, you can only send it to someone
For example, hang it under GAE or SAE

There is also the easiest way to link to Github,
The general process is

  1. Create a new Repository on Github, xxx.github.com
  2. Static blog generation tools such as Jekyll or Hexo
  3. No more

Yes, it’s that simple, and the online tutorials are piece by piece, so I won’t repeat it
I use Hexo, hang it on here
Compared to Jekyll, it feels simpler

To say something irrelevant:

I still remember when I was in elementary school, I asked to write essays every day. At that time, I was really abused.
I write (chao) homework every day when I go to school and after school. I still have one piece a day. I can only record something for a week at most.
What should I do, I can only copy the sample text

It’s a pity that there was no theoretical guidance at that time, and the copying was not accurate. After the primary school students’ model essays were copied, there was no way to copy them, so I reluctantly started the idea of a Chinese textbook.
Tai Sui broke ground on his head, didn’t he die early, but he was naturally found out

Then the third-grade Chinese teacher, known as the engineer of the human soul, slapped my head severely in front of the class with my diary.

Oh (wocao), you don’t have to be so cruel to kill the chicken and the monkey.

At that time, I couldn’t bear it, and silently improved my skills. After all, the college entrance examination still has eight-part essays. For the sake of tomorrow, if I can’t bear it, I will make a big plan. (Well, I was stupid at the time. Nian still thinks that father beats his son like that)

Fortunately, college, finally no need to write those disgusting things
When I was a freshman, a roommate despised my bad space, and then went to dress up, hang up more than N Flash, the card can not be opened
Later, I found out that there was a log function, and I wrote something about the school casually, and then some students commented, I was very happy, and then I wrote
It took me more than a year to learn that this thing is called a blog

Later, the programming stuff was hung up on CSDN, looking at the thousand miles away in the lower left corner, silently left

I searched for things when I was about to graduate. I saw what Yiya wrote and I was familiar with it. I saw that the number of visits was more than 1W, and there was still a ranking. I wondered who this is. I took a closer look.

Later, I wanted to find a place that no one knew, and record something

entry.title: Free will
entry.content:
I don’t know when I heard the word “free will”, and it feels like more than a year

Although I sometimes use this term, I never understand what free will is

In fact, Google can get the answer right away, but I didn’t do it for a long time. Do I want to understand it based on my own insight?

I first heard this word in Dongwu’s Theory of Relativity
I can come across in some of the next books
Later on Luo Ji Siwei heard
In the previous BBC Hawking universe, “We are all made of interstellar matter”

It feels like people respond rationally rather than instinctively to external stimuli

Three quotes from the author’s epiphany quoted in “Seven Habits”:

There is a space between stimulus and response
In this space we have the freedom and ability to choose our own response
Our growth and happiness depend on our response

To be honest, I didn’t feel anything when I watched it, and I am simply knowledgeable %>_<%

Then I saw the author’s explanation, Freedom of Choice, I couldn’t help but breathe a breath of air (in winter)-I realized it for the sake of my enlightenment.
Isn’t this free will? !

I have never understood before, what is the difference between tossing around when I was young, and then falling into the hot bed of my wife and child, and directly falling into it. It feels there, but I can’t tell the difference.

From this point of view, it should be the difference between free will awakening, respecting one’s inner call, and not simply making a stressful like ordinary creatures.

Listen to thunder in the silent place

entry.title: goddess
entry.content:
As mentioned earlier, the little mage is never going to watch magic anymore

Zhu Xi said: “It’s enough to stop, there is no greed.”
The little mage’s mental plan is good, can’t fight to hide

Life is often so funny or cruel
The Tao Te Ching says: “The way of the sky will damage more and make up for the insufficiency, but the way of man is not, the way of man will damage the insufficiency and give more.”
As the saying goes, “I will kill you when you are sick”

After being humiliated by magic, Murphy’s Law began to show its power-the goddess of the little mage ignored him

The thing is like this:

A few days ago, the goddess suddenly called the little mage, unknowingly, the two chatted for more than an hour
On the phone, the goddess complained to the little mage that she was tired recently, and then she pointed out that she wanted a magic book container, which is the latest powerful magical tool called the bright pure sticker produced by the evil magic group. The goddess used some news in the magic world to deal with the aftermath, which is really accurate

The little mage was flattered when he received the call, and in the next few days he was even more excited, seeing the goddess’ birthday is coming again, so let’s give it away.

Gold coins are a problem, but fortunately, the little mage usually saves money, eats frugally, and barely manages enough.
After comparing prices for a long time, I finally bought one for the goddess in my heart

Two days after the goods arrived, I saw the goddess replied “I like it, thank you”
Before the little mage could respond, he saw the goddess offline

The little mage has no doubts about the others, and he is infinitely happy, just like the little yellow guy in “Despicable Me 2” saw the heroine develop rich associations and imaginations

But a day later the goddess still did not respond
At the beginning, the little mage simply thought that she was a goddess, she must be very busy, but it is normal that she doesn’t reply to messages on the forum and chatting on Weibo every day.

By the evening of the next day, Little Mage felt something was wrong. QQ, WeChat, Weibo, SMS, phone, and various contact magic were all used.

The goddess is worthy of being a goddess, and uses the art of war flexibly to cope with all changes in the same way, gently and ingeniously:
>/dev/null

Just wiped out all the magic that the little mage could think of, leaving no ripples

Apart from sang heart, little mage still has a glimmer of hope in his heart

Then I saw this cruel question:

*How to raise a spare tire? *
answer:
If the spare tyre takes the initiative to talk to you, you just haha
The spare tire is no longer active, just ask him what he is doing

The little mage recalled everything before, as if he was verifying these two sentences
Really words are like blood, actions are like complaints, grief and arousal

The little mage’s eyes were hot, and finally she shed tears

entry.title: Spare tire
entry.content:
The goddess’s blow to the little mage far exceeded the little mage’s imagination
In this way, the last death was like a floating cloud

The poet Yuan Hao of the Jin Dynasty asked Youyun:

Ask what love in the world is, and teach life and death directly?
——“Moyuer·Yanqiu Ci”

The little mage is an emotional child. When he was still in the mage academy, he liked a girl and pursued it hard for 3 years. When he bought a gift for the girl’s birthday and waited downstairs, he found that the girl and a frustrated man were flying together.

Everyone has moments of disillusionment, and the three years of misery finally brought the little wizard’s epiphany
Since then, fascinated by magic and eventually become a master

Of course that happened in the novel
At that time, campus recruitment was already in place, and the young master rushed into battle, but ended up in an embarrassing result

Originally, the little mage thought that after he was enlightened, he was already invulnerable and rational, and would no longer be confused about emotional matters.

But he forgot the famous saying of the ancient philosopher Heraclitus:

One cannot step into the same river twice

Of course the little mage didn’t violate it, it just fell into a different ditch.

The money is gone and come back, and the loss of money is a trivial matter. The biggest pitfall is, “You treat the other party as a goddess, and the other party treats you as a fool.”

With previous experience, the little mage woke up faster this time, but heartache is inevitable

Generally speaking, there are several feasible options for dealing with broken relationships:

  1. Retaliation
  2. Divert attention
  3. Sublimation

The first cost is too high, it is a lose-lose
The last one is the optimal solution, but the realm is too high, the little mage can’t reach

Had to take the golden mean route: divert attention

After that, the little mage tries to keep himself busy

…

The situation has not improved yet, the annual Spring Festival in the mainland has come again
At this time of year, the Scrolls of Return to Town are sold out early

The little mage had to use time-consuming and laborious teleportation

Before entering the house, I saw the blood-red door pair on both sides of the door from a distance:

Year after year, we get married year after year without us

Horizontal batch:

Wait another year

entry.title: Mom and dad
entry.content:
The little mage’s parents are all Muggles, and there are no magicians in the surrounding circle. At one time they thought that the little mage assembled and repaired magical instruments after graduation.

The little mage was born in the environment of Jiangzi, ╮(￣ ▽ ￣”)╭, it is so terrible that it is indescribable, but it can be seen how difficult it is to communicate with parents

This time the annual family reunion day, the little mage returned very unwillingly

why? This involves two points:

  1. Chinese parents
  2. The little mage did not look for a job after resigning

Muggle moms and dads have a deep sense of self-sacrifice
Even in the economic environment where they are now fully prosperous, they can still magically divide the dishes on the table into three or six or nine grades, giving them the meaty stuff, organic vegetables and high-fiber foods for themselves
“We have done this for you, are you worthy of us like this?” is a common killer.

For this, the little mage can’t use “Silly boy paper, you can still go to die!” A similar forbidden curse is broken, otherwise it will only be yourself who will hang up, and will not be able to live well after death, and be hanged on innocence. The charge of unrighteousness and unfilial piety is a negative example of the rumors of Muggle-style parents

The little mage has explained to his parents countless times that he belongs to the late gap year for things that are not working. It is a confusion in life, and it takes a period of silence… (If you have the opportunity to say it separately in the future)
But moms and dads don’t care about this kind of rhetoric. If you don’t have a job, isn’t it a youth in society? If you make moms and dads unable to lift their heads in front of relatives and friends, don’t use a whip to get you to find a job.

The little mage firmly believes that financial independence can be exchanged for freedom, so he no longer asks parents for living expenses
This creates a strange phenomenon. On the one hand, the little mage has no job, and on the other hand, the living standard of the little mage is only slightly reduced.
Mom and Dad who are Muggles didn’t understand it at all, so they became detectives and started their own reasoning: Where did the living expenses come from? rMBP How can such precious artifacts be exchanged for gold coins? It’s hard to steal it? Why are you different from ordinary people? Are you mentally ill? Should see a psychologist…

The little mage is sad, hates blood thicker than water, cuts on the constant family affection, and the annual holiday. The most exaggerated thing is that ZF also intervened in this matter. The legislation did not see his parents convicted, and he was imprisoned after enforcement…

The little mage doesn’t have the guts to fight against the public power. As a P citizen, it’s better to be self-conscious
However, before returning home this Spring Festival, the little mage had already been familiar with the art of war and had made sufficient preparations. He imagined that he possessed the forbidden curse of a senior in the magical world who had already traveled to the west of Hexi-Reality Distortion Force Field (PS: Suddenly thought of science Personal reality in the super-electromagnetic gun)

entry.title: Frame magic
entry.content:
The benefits of frame magic are obvious
A single magic is often limited in power, so wizards often combine many small magics to form an effective big magic
Generally speaking, sing This is a silly framework…, sing every day and sing every night, and sing too much. Some wizards have discovered the commonalities and refined them. Only sending TIASF can complete the chanting of magic. born

After the triple blow, the little mage has been living in the shadows

Looking at the magisters in the world of wizards, all kinds of magic are often readily available.
A master of carbon magic, the coffee produced in Java is also decent to use, no need to start from scratch.

The little mage thought that in this case, coupled with the evil “reasonable adjustment of emotions”-to keep yourself busy, it is better to settle down.

After that, I started reading non-stop, Xanaduola, gunpowder and other frame magic

(PS: The section of the plant. Polymer cement is also within the scope of training, but unfortunately I did not find the spell book “The section of the plant. Polymer cement”, plus the little mage not long ago bought a magic tool (also Not for myself), I was ashamed in my pocket, so I had to give up)

The little mage has read “Tao-Te Ching”, and there is a saying that the soldier will win
Roughly speaking, the opposing armies, the side full of grief and anger, will surely win

The little mage’s gritted teeth at this moment can be described as grief and anger

There is a book on the mainland that is thicker than a few slabs stacked together. It is divided into nine books and records those things in the mainland 600 years ago.
After reading it, the most impressive thing is not any tricks, but whenever there is a bad guy or conspiracy and timing, the sentence is often inserted suddenly:

Due to IQ limitation

The failures of the predecessors, the lessons for future generations
The poor little mage only reads magic books every day, so he doesn’t know anything about history.

And because of the complexity of watching more at once, gradually, the little mage found that when singing python magic, he often blended the spell of ruby into it, and vice versa.

Finally, the little mage was surprised to find that he couldn’t even release a decent magic.

entry.title: Go Web
entry.content:
I haven’t finished reading it, after the age of school, programming books can only pick key chapters to see, the examples can’t run through one by one, I have to say it’s a pity

Relatively speaking, the coverage is relatively comprehensive, and the examples are also very representative. Buying is worth the price

Not to mention that the author puts the book on the Internet, you can find it by searching it

Learning By Doing, I wrote a website to try the water:

Http://direct daily.A horn. what/

From Python to Ruby to Node.js to Golang

Ruby is really amazing. Let’s not talk about the degree of freedom. In terms of syntactic sugar, it is the language that I feel is the closest to pseudo-code. (Human attention to indentation)

Node.js, because I don’t know JavaScript, I don’t know much about this

Then I saw Go. Since my entry language is C, this one has a natural intimacy and familiarity.

However, when switching from Ruby to Go, the most uncomfortable part is that you have to declare the variable type again. The more complex data needs to be converted by the interface.

Slowly I learned that this is to check out the BUG before compiling. Dynamic languages can only be tested by human flesh.

Egg pain

entry.title: Orphan
entry.content:
The little mage hadn’t moved for a while, why did it pop up again? Because this time is special

In the afternoon, the little mage was basking in the sun on the balcony, looking at the mob recommended by the goddess two days ago, and when he was bored, he swiped Q, and when he saw the goddess was online, he went to chat.

I didn’t expect the goddess to answer every sentence, and the response was very fast

It is said that the little mage should be very happy, but he instinctively feels a kind of coolness-too abnormal
Careful temptation:

A raise?
No
Promoted?

In love? When the little mage has been hit and hasn’t sent it out
The goddess automatically told the little mage the good news
Little mage, his eyes went dark, almost fainted

Reality is always cruel and often dramatic
Seeing that the gap is about to end, the little mage slapped him severely when he was already drawing a picture of the future.
And history is always surprisingly similar. At this time last year, the little wizard had already suffered a blow no less than the disaster of extinction.

According to the principle (I forgot, roughly the emotions come from the reptilian brain and do not pass through the human neocortex, so in non-life-threatening situations, the momentary feeling is often a harmful judgment), the little mage takes a deep breath for 10 seconds ,then…

Enduring the bloody heart, made a phone call and chatted for a while, but at the end I haven’t forgotten to wish them happiness
What I really think in my mind, without mentioning a word

After hanging up, looking at the carefully prepared gift, the little mage was full of sadness
Is this the rhythm that is destined for a lonely life?

entry.title: Complications of broken love
entry.content:
Generally speaking, after the protagonist of a series has died, it is often the end

For example, in “Ice and Snow Fantasy”, at the end of the story, the elder sister wins love, two mushrooms cool the lace, and the male pig’s feet have to be with the animal (the end of life is often sad)

However, given that this is a novel and there are precedents before it, “Rework” also mentioned that “modifying a BUG often introduces a new BUG”
In desperation, we acquiesce that the little mage can be resurrected

But the little mage suffered so much that he broke through the level of resurrection time, staying in the altar and reluctant to come out, so he had to get a special first.

When we read some books about history, we often notice a word: historical limitations

For independent individuals, it also exists
For example, half a year or a year later, as long as you continue to move forward mentally and look back suddenly, you can often find your own limitations, such as things that you have come up with now, but were in a hurry at the time.

As someone who came over, often

persuade:

No reality
If the goddess is gone, find another one
The setback I have experienced is much greater than you, and I haven’t survived it. You are completely too weak to withstand stress.

As the parties involved, let’s not talk about beating them in the past. After all, they are kind, but they can’t relieve much pain in my heart.

In fact, when we ourselves are parties, we often cannot escape this vicious circle.

Human beings have the function of forgetting pain, the most obvious is as a top painful childbirth. After one or two years of numbness, the idea of regenerating a child will be born.

So when the time is long enough, the original pain will be forgotten, and it is not a big deal to lose love.

At this time, there must be broken-up children’s shoes around, and we will have the same feeling-isn’t it just broken-up, what’s the big deal, often goto’persuade’`

When writing stuff, you should pay attention to the ups and downs. Authors with deep internal skills will internalize this into the atmosphere of the plot, without a trace, and the low-level will often see a dry transitional tone:

but

Most of the time, we don’t know why we are suffering, so we can only use the phenomenon of “broken love” to summarize

So everyone is broken in love, why someone can immediately turn to chase another girl (beast!!! Okay, envious), and some people want to die for love

We know that due to the existence of the subconscious mind, the content of awareness is often just the tip of the iceberg

The pain of losing a relationship is not just as simple as losing someone
It often includes your longing for love, fantasy about the future, and even the disillusionment of your personal beliefs

Actually, you also know that she is not as perfect as you think, but she is indulged in fantasy and neglected subjectively.
Like the colorful soap bubbles in the sun, they are infinitely beautiful, and everything disappears after being punctured

In a very short time, all the good parts of life are taken away (at least you would think it is all)
This kind of thing comparable to subverting the Three Views is naturally heartache

You feel like being taken away from oxygen in your life, and your heart is empty
I usually force a smile in front of everyone, and only mention it in front of my close friends
If you are unlucky and self-conscious, knowing that you are disturbing others, you will often keep silent, and just say a few words and become silent.
When I was alone, the emptiness came again from all directions, and there was no escape

Congratulations, because at this time, you have encountered the ultimate problem of mankind and even the universe: loneliness

From an economic point of view, we know that everything we paid to the goddess before is already a sunk cost

At this time, the scientific approach is: the heart is like steel to stop the loss in time, that is-there is a break, there is a rebirth! Strictly control the expansion of opportunity cost

The reality is that stock gods often only have so few

Because human emotions precede logic

It should be understood that most human emotions come from ancient animal brains, with short paths and fast reactions, which belong to the core level and have higher authority.
The new cortex, which is responsible for thinking, has a long path and slow response speed, which belongs to the application layer and has the lowest authority.
If you encounter amygdala robbery, cingulate back lock, etc., it will lead to insufficient permissions at the application layer and be rejected

At this point, people are completely controlled by emotions

Then the little mage is not willing to resurrect, we can understand

entry.title: How to heal yourself
entry.content:
Last time I analyzed some of the reasons behind, this time I talk about how to deal with it

First of all, there is no chance of redemption by default here, not that you can kneel in front of the goddess and cry, or make exaggerated things like crying, making trouble, and hanging yourself.

If you really did it and got it back, please refer to how to fall in love instead of the following

For individuals, how to get out of the predicament as soon as possible and minimize the loss is what we are most concerned about now

Okay, let’s first deal with the “preventive treatment” stage emphasized in the “Huangdi Neijing”

First of all, we must face our identity as a spare tire

Most people are often unwilling to admit this fact
For example, our little mage has been immersed in the fantasy with the goddess
For example, those retail investors who buy high and sell low

There is a concept in economics called path dependence, the official explanation is:

Once people make a certain choice, it is like embarking on a path of no return. The force of inertia will make this choice constantly self-reinforcing and prevent you from going out easily.

For example, the QWERTY keyboard we are familiar with (I have used Dvorak for a few months, and it feels pretty cool, I don’t know if it’s in my heart)

“Suwen·Four Qi Tiao Shen Dalun” also mentioned:

It’s not too late if the husband’s disease has become a disease and then the medicine, the chaos has become, and then he can be cured.

Cultivate a sensitive heart, through some small things, see the little things, see through this layer of fantasy, instead of continuously indulging in it

Get out of the illusion, move towards maturity, cut the fetters, and break with the past self

Of course, if you have not been able to see the leopard in your eyes, and know the autumn when a leaf falls, don’t be too pessimistic.

After all, it is more difficult to get out of this illusion on your own.
This is tantamount to requiring a variable in the code to check for bugs, which is often unrealistic (for example, our little mage was awakened by violence when he encountered a face confession)

Now let’s deal with the “it’s too late” situation

Some methods are widely circulated on the Internet, such as:

  1. Read a book that you have wanted to read for a long time
  2. Go out and exercise
  3. Tourism
  4. Stay with friends and chat
  5. Turn your attention away

I have to say that these do have a certain effect, but they cannot solve the problem fundamentally.

When using these methods, I talked and laughed at the time, but from another angle, it might not be another illusion.

Because other people cannot and cannot stay with you all the time. When everyone is gone, the feeling of loneliness rushing toward you is like the force majeure defined in the law, which is unstoppable (the children who study abroad may have this experience)

So what should we do?

If you have seen Stanford University Open Class: How to Think Like a Psychologist-Can We Really Control Emotions, should have some insight

As mentioned in the previous article, the human brain has various defects, but in fact, as long as the hardware bug is not triggered, it can often continue to run smoothly.

Subjectively, we feel that the brain is a single-core single-process. Forcing a large number of concurrency often means that intelligence and judgment are reduced overall, let alone parallel computing.

But we often do not realize or ignore the existence of system processes such as breathing and heartbeat

Due to the existence of the kernel or software and hardware protection mechanisms, if you want to metaprogram it yourself, it is often unrealistic to bypass the monitoring of the operating system (foreign objects such as drugs are not counted)

Based on this, we can try fork to create a new process, throw in all emotions such as sadness and disappointment, and then execute disown % instead of letting them occupy fg, thus affecting the routines of daily life

entry.title: Fanwai-chat
entry.content:
It was just on impulse. I was watching ROR at the time. I didn’t know that the test should go first. In addition, it was all E texts. I didn’t know what I was doing at all.

In addition, I watched a video at that time, which basically said that the passengers kept asking the flight attendants why they can’t play with mobile phones on the handjob. The flight attendants kept explaining from a scientific point of view, and finally went crazy saying that you Muggles, handjobs are driven by magic, otherwise How did such a big thing fly into the sky? The aerodynamics and electromagnetics were made up by aliens to deceive you stupid humans…

Then I hurriedly started programming and magic is a bit similar. I usually listen to public lectures, and the professors often mention there’s no magic here. I rushed to the opposite, coded a lot of letters, and then I could run , Isn’t this amazing

I think if I can write 10, I will open a project on Github
Well, in fact, I should write 100 before I should review the magic horse

But I know I’m too lazy, I don’t know when I’m boring and don’t continue, so I’d better do this early.

I was surprised that I broke single digits
Much of it is due to the number of words in a chapter, enough for me to add up to 12345

Fortunately, my goal for myself is very low, and it’s not a professional codeword. It’s good to have fun while writing.

Having said that, the coders are hard pressed, and it’s fine if you want to record something, and you don’t dare to show your face if you are not photogenic. You can only rely on plain text.

Looking at the literary and artistic youth, which one is not the photo of the food
Gap ╮(￣ ▽ ￣”)╭

Generally speaking, there are few midway actors in the novel who hang up on this kind of thing. If unfortunately, it is a great event. Either the protagonist changes suddenly and his skill soars by 100X like Saiyan; or there is a turning point in the plot. It’s the next generation’s turn to appear. For example, Zhang Cuishan and Zhang Wuji in “Evening the Dragon Slayer” have changed the protagonist; or, the author has changed, and it’s time to start anew (-_-|||)

Also, this kind of martial arts fantasy, the protagonist only gets stronger and stronger
Jin Daxia’s Flying Snow shoots the White Deer, and the Laughing Man leaning on Bi Yuan is such a pinnacle

When I was still watching “The Wilderness” in college, I was curious about this question, why is Jiangzi?
Like Tuobaye, at the end of “Sou Shen Ji”, he can already fight the immortal level. When “The Wilderness” is about to end, the mind of the three emperors and all the mess will be all, not to mention the bug-like Shi Nafang at the end. Hua
Of course, this is the end, and I can’t write any further

Of course, now I know that the golden style has a strong sense of substitution, and readers can grow with the growth of the protagonist, so that users’ return rate, stickiness, and loyalty are very high. I still see “Sculpture” after a few years. The impulse to sleep and forget

On the other hand, in Gulong’s works, it’s a god level, no need to fight monsters, driven by suspense reasoning, but I haven’t heard of any downgrade.
There seems to be no “reverse growth” model on the market

Then I asked a roommate who had broken ten thousand books. He said that out of all the fantasy he has seen, only one is weaker with practice.

I can imagine how surprised I was, so how about asking? He said what else could happen. The pig’s feet first killed the God Realm in seconds, and later became weaker and weaker. He was humiliated by opponents who had already abused him, and finally found that he could not beat even an ordinary person.

I felt melancholy after listening

Then he went on to say that the protagonist will be resurrected and reincarnated as XXX, starting from scratch, and will finally become the top and embrace the beauty(s).

If you don’t die, you won’t die

entry.title: 2013 Summary
entry.content:
2014-03-31 13:47:59

Hmm~ o(*￣ ▽ ￣*)o, I really have to drag it to March again, please give me a thumbs up

You have to wait until your birthday is over before you can enter 24

The other is also because the “Huangdi Neijing” puts men in an 8-year cycle
When I was 16 years old, I felt that I had changed significantly. This time I was swollen, and I was afraid
But 24 is still inevitable, and a few days have passed in the blink of an eye~

Gap year

Complete computer in one year and linear algebra in one week
I can only say that after watching TM, I was shocked. I can still play like this. Okay.

I had no choice but to sell myself and clinked poorly

parents

life

When 6 comes out, the whole line will be replaced by Apple

At last

It’s a pity that there is always an end
To quote Russell:

If there is a chance, I am willing to do it again

entry.title: Reading Plan
entry.content:
2014-04-08

There was a miscalculation last time, which caused Luzhu to think that fast reading was done
After the correction, I know the truth.

After buying Air, I stupidly spent a few months reading
I discovered Game Center only two days ago, no wonder people say that the iPad is used to play games
Uncollectible for two days
Then I thought about the reward mechanism of the game, and the irritability of reading

I remember where I said that reading is a long-term reward process, so the hourly unit cannot feel rewarded
Blindly saying that internal drive is an abuse of willpower

If the subconscious doesn’t understand this, it feels boring and controls you to do other things

I feel that after breaking through 1k or more, I will be internalized into the habit. I shouldn’t care about this anymore, but it’s especially uncomfortable at this stage of several hundred (╯﹏╰)

So I wonder if there is a kind of visualization
It’s similar to KPI, purely used
And the number of pages in the book is easier to quantify

Then I used omniplan and Gantt chart for a long time, but it didn’t look what I wanted.

I was angry and wanted to write it myself and make it into a website or ios app. Later I found that Excel was enough…

Does the programmer mode make wheels for yourself at every turn…

Thinking out of box

entry.title: Dream interpretation
entry.content:
The little mage found himself doing some tricks
The needle is stuck on the back of the hand, inside the red blood needle tube
Without thinking, I pressed the C (pause?) key

I breathe tightly, and I feel choked instantly. It feels like I am in a vacuum, and the air in my body leaks out of the pinhole.
The little mage was terrified and hurriedly pressed the pause button again

After about a few seconds, the little mage took a sigh of relief and finally felt that he could breathe.
He took a few deep breaths. Before he thought that “If you die in a catastrophe, you will have a blessing.” He discovered a serious problem-no heartbeat

This time, the little mage was scared
Oh my god, how could this happen, the little mage thought to himself, there is breathing but no pulse, what’s the matter with swelling?

Acute cardiac arrest is one of the most important causes of death in the elves
Fortunately, the little mage was in the celestial dynasty, he did not give up the treatment, and proceeded to perform CPR on himself. At this time, he was already lying on the bed.

However, there are several key points for high-quality CPR:

  • Compression rate is at least 100 compressions per minute
  • Adults compress at least 5 cm
  • Ensure chest rebound after each compression
  • Minimize the interruption of chest compressions
  • Avoid hyperventilation

In this way, the current situation of the little mage is simply a joke

In addition, no blood circulation means that there is no energy exchange with oxygen, and the body’s activities gradually stop.
But I can move, still doing chest compressions on myself, and have such a clear will
Although the little mage was puzzled, he did not stop to treat himself.

Working hard for a while, then he woke up…

It’s late at night, and there’s no sound around it
Whenever he has a nightmare, when the little mage wakes up, he often finds that his hand is pressed against the position of the heart, but this time it is on the right.

I think that when I was in the first grade of the Master Academy, the little mage was exposed to hypnosis, and he was very relaxed and comfortable after doing it. Later, I listened to it once before going to bed every night, and the quality of sleep soared.

By chance, the little mage turned to an ancient book Uncover the mystery of the human mind
It’s a pity that this book is too thick. When the deadline for returning the book is reached, the little mage can only read half of it

But the cheats are the cheats. For example, Mei Chaofeng only got half of the Jiuyin Scripture, which is enough to kill Qiu Chuji and other old ways in seconds.

The little mage was stunned by Freund’s Oedipus theory, but “the dream is to achieve a certain wish” inspired him
Some dreams can be found out by themselves

Thanks to the seemingly scientific explanation, coupled with the bonus of hypnosis halo, the little mage’s dreams gradually disappear

PS: A few years later, the little mage flipped through this book again, read the remaining half, and saw the description of controlling dreams, although only one sentence:

Some people can clearly know that they are sleeping and dreaming at night, so they seem to have the ability to guide dreams with their will. For example, when this kind of dreamer is not satisfied with the dream, he can interrupt the dream without waking up, and then start in a new direction.

The little mage can only sigh that good luck makes people, it is very close to this, if you insisted on going through it back then, you might not have made so many detours.
There is another thing in the same way, I will talk about it later when I have a chance [pit]

entry.title: Multiple sleep
entry.content:
As mentioned in Powerful Sleep

The reality is that they have slept too much, and their mental state is as bad as their sleep quality. This happens because they are not aware of the potential energy and sleep mechanism in their body (Energy and sleep mechanism)

This sentence points out a long, long time ago, the little mage sometimes slept for 10 hours, but when he woke up he felt tired, sleepy, and lack of energy.

Cheese is power
After that, the little mage made appropriate adjustments according to his Deep sleep and REM cycle, and strengthened the light (note that it is melatonin, not photosynthesis)

Even under the strong work of Yali, the quality of sleep improves linearly

Later, the little mage learned about the magical [Da Vinci Sleep](http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A4%9A%E9%98%B6%E6%AE%B5%E7%9D% A1%E7%9C%A0), also known as polyphasic sleep

At that time, the little mage was rather silly, so he actually tried it, and the result directly led to a sluggish work during the day.
If he had seen Private Myth, he would not have done such stupid things

In fact, NREM REM has its irreplaceable effect
First of all, REM is not a human patent. It occurs in mammals and birds. Second, it may be expressed as “feeling” in the NREM stage, so although there is no dream at this time, it does not mean that it can be shortened at will.

At the same time, some of the warriors who have tried this are mostly based on the month. It seems that there has not been a chestnut that has been successful for ten years.

However, the little mage was inspired by a child’s paper 6 + 3 * 20′ that used this method to test the TOEFL (6 hours at night, 20 minutes in three periods during the day), and perfected his own method

So that afterwards, there was no dream

Ordinarily, the little mage should be happy. At this time, he can go into deep sleep smoothly through hypnosis [pit, fill in the back], and after waking up, his whole body is loose, as if he has opened up the eight meridians of the odd meridian [pit]

But the little mage is still depressed. Not having a dream for several months is equivalent to missing a skill, and this kind of thing has not happened before, it is hard not to doubt whether there is something wrong with his human brain.

As mentioned earlier, the little mage can already see how his subconscious is doing something magical based on Freud’s dream interpretation theory.
But now there is no dream, how can this be explained? Could it be that the little mage has no desires and desires?

The little mage was confused for a long time, until he saw Beyond Inferiority Complex

Adler mentioned in the study of dreams in individual psychology:

If the meaning of dreams is to leave certain feelings in life, we often find people who don’t want to be swayed by feelings. Most of the time, they only believe in science. People of this type are less likely to dream. People don’t even dream at all.

Any solution provided in the dream is actually worse than the solution you think about when you are awake. To put it another way, that is to say, when dreaming, the individual is tantamount to solving problems in the process of sleeping. This is not excessive.

The little mage was relieved, and quickly took notes to strengthen his memory

Unfortunately, he didn’t know that due to the early age of these books, the authors belonged to semi-blind people who touched the elephant in the dark. Everyone thought that they had touched the whole elephant, but in fact they only touched the trunk, legs, and tail. As a pioneer, Ephesus was not spared, apparently only touching the reproductive organs of elephants.

As for Jiangzi, the little mage has always been complacent about being a “person who does not want to be influenced by feelings”.
Until he came into contact-Qingmingmeng
