entry.title: Lucid dream
entry.content:
I have to say that this world is really amazing. What you don’t know doesn’t mean it doesn’t exist.

After the little mage read the magic post of “Teach You How to Control Dreams”, the whole person was stunned.
The previous Inception was completely regarded as a movie, and I forgot after watching it. I didn’t expect it to have a realistic basis.
Really an expert watch the doorway, the layman watch the excitement
Because of my own stupidity, the unforgettable things like ghost press never appeared again

PS: The prototype of Inception seems to be Yasuhiro Tsutsui Dream Detective. If you don’t have time, you can watch the adapted anime movie [Red Pepper](http:// movie.douban.com/subject/1865703/)
However, I still recommend novels, because it describes the non-deterministic polynomial (NP) problem from the shallower to the deeper, and gives many examples

After that, the little mage kept on Google, found Baidu Lucid Dream Post Bar, and saw the children on the end of the world, you may “miss a wonderful world”, and then go to the dream space of ants
If none of these can convince him, he saw in TED, [The feelings of the doctor of Harvard Neuroscience Department after stroke](http://v.163.com/movie/2013/3/6/B/M92INA100_M92INHT6B .html)

Why is the little mage so excited?
Not only because Qingming Dream can be played as a large-scale 3D game, the most important thing is: it is said that if you control the dream, you can do anything and everything in the dream (✧≖´◞౪◟≖ ｀)

The little mage immediately started the experiment, and succeeded several times afterwards, all of which were recorded in detail, excerpt

the first time:

Use the retreat to sleep, hug Benben, look at the software, the six-pointed star, three conversion methods (trigger! Actually, it’s already asleep, otherwise the notebook from somewhere in the middle of the night), slap on the bed, and the pores all over, As if they were all opened, they got up immediately! ! !
Out of body? It’s only the third day, I was excited, and found myself back in my body…
Then I saw that I was a white glowing Dongdong, with limbs + body, no hands and feet, but the end was arc-shaped. Is this an energy state? Then I can’t get out no matter what, the next step is not to open my eyes
Then I opened my eyes and found that the door to the balcony was open. It was a bit scary to know the sound of horses and horses outside. It was probably scared. I really woke up and found that the door was closed properly. The outside was dark and nothing. Sound
Continuing to take out the notebook, the whole body is numb again…
The vague memory below is going to the karaoke hall, back to school, buses, taxis, repairing electric wires, it has become an ordinary dream…

The next time:

In my dream, I was in school. I thought of holding down ctrl and I could fly. Shift was to accelerate, and then I played for a long time under weightlessness.
Then there is a Q version of the small animal competition. I was about to fly, and suddenly the green small animal became Makolov (Modern Warfare 3), or T-bag (Prison Break)… He wanted to catch me , I just drifted away…

There are some, such as:
Jobs’s “your time is limited” taught the little mage a heavy lesson in his dream
And in the dream, the unclear relationship for the university has completed the closed loop, and can continue to move forward
And the dream mentioned in Uncovering the Mystery of the Human Mind, the little mage often wonders what is the meaning of living, so he will give him a little bit in the dream and kill him to let Ya know how wonderful it is to live.

##method
There are a lot of online games, each with its own way of playing. In fact, you only need to master the core ideas: Dream in a dream, then control dream

  1. When you wake up in the morning, you must record your dreams. Even if you can’t remember any dreams, you must write and draw.
    Normal short-term memory is cleared in 5 minutes, so if you don’t record the dream immediately, the dream will be forgotten instantly
  2. In daily life, remind yourself, “Am I dreaming?”
    Habits can be brought into dreams. The principle can be referred to: The power of habit-why do we live like this and work like this?

For details, please refer to Dream Guide-Analyzing the Mysterious Qingming Dream

It also describes a state that may be more advanced than lucid dreams: dreamlessness, that is, the state of pure consciousness.

PS：
The dreamless here is not the kind of little mage who sleeps till dawn on the island of Phuket after hypnotizing.
It may be the state of being completely present in the “Power of the Present”
In addition, when the brain evolved REM, no words were produced yet, so our dreams are often presented in the form of images

In fact, even if it’s Zhimeng, I still can’t help feeling that kind of fear, such as the situation where the body is cold, the whole body is transparent, and one arm is broken.
It’s even more terrifying if it’s the scenes of your daily life, such as strange sounds, monsters and skeletons
Because of the Fight-or-flight rooted in human genes, it’s hard for you not to wake up at this time

Because - in case it’s true!

In the Don Juan series The Art of Dreaming, the Qingming Dream is described as another world, but our daily life is illusory
It sounds a bit like Avalon-the ideal home for heroic souls to rest

Although it sounds nonsense, but Zhuang Shengxiao dreams of butterflies, who knows which world is real?

The truth is always one

Having said so much, in Conan’s words: There is only one truth

For a monthly income of more than 50,000, consider mid-range travel in Europe and America
Monthly income of 30,000 can consider low-end European travel
Monthly income of 10,000 to 20,000, please choose Southeast Asia tour
Monthly income is less than 10,000, please choose domestic travel
Monthly income is less than five thousand, please choose the province tour
Please choose an outing with a monthly income of 3000
Please choose peanut oil for less than two thousand
Less than one thousand, please choose the trench tour
If you have no income, please choose Sleepwalking!
Happy May Day everyone!

entry.title: Sleep paralysis
entry.content:
Once, when the little mage was still a magic apprentice in the magic academy, he experienced twice [Ghost Press](http://zh.wikipedia.org/zh/%E7%9D%A1%E7%9C%A0%E7 %98%AB%E7%97%AA%E7%97%87*)

It’s been four years since the first time. The little mage at the time didn’t even know that it was called a “ghost press”, but was completely at a loss and defined it as a “spiritual event.”

Let’s go back to four years ago, (in parentheses is the analysis using the theory of “Dream Explanation”):

At that time the little mage came back from shopping at noon and went to sleep for a nap
Plus he was having a cold and was very uncomfortable, so the little mage continued to use hypnotherapy
As mentioned before, after the little mage uses this method, he has no trouble dreaming, and hasn’t had any problems for almost two years.

And this time he will eat a pound

The little mage slowly relaxed, and suddenly he found that he had introspection ability (Taoist practice can see the internal organs), and when he scanned his stomach he saw a huge tumor.
Dizzy, the little mage thought to himself, this is a terminal illness, and then the picture is reduced, the previous one is the elephant that has been enlarged many times (High School Biology Book in Tumor Cells)

…

When he was conscious again, the little mage found himself on the bridge of a lake (a map of a local lake)
Suddenly a picture of a hand extending from the water flashes (Plants vs. Zombies)
When crossing over half of the lake from the bridge, there was a riot on the right, as if someone fell into the water.
Then I saw a child in the water (When the little mage passed by a certain door when he was young, the little friend said that it was haunted inside, and he must not look inside (*Never imagine the pink elephant), otherwise he would have a ghost. Then the little mage would I looked inside and caught a glimpse of an unforgettable picture*)
The little mage went down an arc to a ship, and the picture of his hand extending from the water flashed again. Then he flew up or fell into the water? The screen is tilted about 90 degrees (CS died and fell from upstairs & “I fell into the water last time”-Angel Beats)

After that, the little mage got entangled with that thing. I don’t know how long it has passed, it may be instantaneous
Then he felt numb all over his body and buzzing in his head (the kind of UFO that appeared in the movie is actually brain waves)

The little mage is terrified, there is a horror of being possessed by a ghost and about to be occupied
He always wanted to get rid of it, and tried to shine the sun on it three times, only the last time came out a red flame with a little grimace (Warcraft Flame Lord’s Lava Creature)
At this time, the buzzing sound is getting louder and louder, and the whole body is getting numb

I don’t know if he came up with it himself or the person rescuing next to him reminded: Just open your eyes.
This is undoubtedly a life-saving straw, the little mage desperately did it, but he seems to have no control over his body, he is paralyzed all over, and even unable to open his eyes.
At that time, the little mage had only one feeling: “If you don’t open your eyes, it will be a plant.”
After trying hard several times, he finally opened his right eye and saw the ceiling of the dormitory. It was only dim, and the phantoms and phantoms disappeared immediately, and he realized that he was taking a nap.

Although there was “Dream Explanation” to withstand, some of them were beyond the explanation of the little mage, and a series of questions were raised:
If they are all illusions, why is the whole body paralyzed?
After waiting for a long time, he was able to control his arm to take off the earphones, and he didn’t have to think about how his body should be exercised. It could move according to our consciousness.
Can mental activity cause physical damage?
In addition, it was more than 3 o’clock at the time. Although it belonged to the yin of the sun in a day, the ghosts did not escape.
And what happens if you don’t open your eyes? Lost consciousness? For that thing, the little mage didn’t feel any emotions, and it had no spiritual impact on him.
Is it still stuck in his mind, or has he gone out? Or is it a part of him?

In short, the experience of ghost press is strange and peculiar, especially the first time, without scientific guidance, it is difficult not to make ghost associations.
The little mage has been puzzled for a while since then, a few weeks later he experienced it again
With the first experience, the little mage quickly opened his eyes and thought he was done.

After a while, the little mage brushed the Q domain, and suddenly found that Tiantianfa sent a public account that he was planning to block and posted an article:
Teach you how to control dreams [Super technology]

Little Mage is completely stupid

PS:
In fact, the answer that really convinces the little mage is in Out of Control-The Final Fate and Ending of All Mankind This book is inconsistent with Mengbagan, in which The chapter from All Fools into Wisdom says:

Humans have a brain, but it is neither centralized nor central
… Consciousness emerges from a distributed network of many tiny and unconscious neural circuits

There is also a quote from “The Society of Mind” (The Society of Mind): A paragraph from Marvin Mins’s philosophy and humanities book published in 1988:

Human mental activities and any naturally evolved perception systems are a large society composed of individual simple processes completed by countless “busy beings”-like agents. Various mental phenomena emerge from the highly connected interaction mechanism of the brain.

To make an inaccurate analogy, the human brain is probably like a GPU, with a lot of computing units. Everyone is in charge of their own affairs, and together they form the current “you”.
And when sleeping, if the part of the consciousness cell is running while the part that controls the body is dormant, it will probably lead to the horrible phenomenon of feeling awake but unable to control the body (stroke patients?)

entry.title: Straight to heaven
entry.content:
Charles Dickens, the greatest British writer of the Victorian era, said in A Tale of Two Cities:

This is the best era and the worst era;
This is the age of wise, this is the age of ignorance;
This is the era of trust, this is the era of doubt;
This is the season of light, this is the season of darkness;
This is the spring of hope, this is the winter of disappointment;
We have everything, we have nothing;
Here goes straight to heaven, here goes straight to hell

Of course this article has little to do with this passage
The reason why it is quoted here is just that these sentences are catchy to read & crazy and cool.

But the little mage did leave and went to heaven

I have to sigh the rapid development of the celestial dynasty. Two years ago, when the little mage went to heaven from two fat papers, there was only K series.
In fact, there was no G system at that time, it was just like Dante’s “Divine Comedy”, the route was divided into:

Inferno (Inferno)-‎ Purgatory (Purgatory)-‎ Paradise (Paradise)

Before going to heaven, the little mage has to go to the magic city. Not to mention that the price is several times more expensive, but it can actually be ＞= K series

Once back to the city, the friend bought a hard seat in order to save money, and successfully lured the young master into the pit
Originally, the little mage tried too hard while practicing magic in the mage academy, which caused some minor problems in the lumbar spine.
It turned out to be good. The 6 hours of continuous bumps almost broke the thin waist of the little mage.
From then on, the little mage vowed to lie down as long as he has a ticket

I don’t want to have a direct G series after a year, quiet, fast and clean, and the voyage is shortened to 2.5 hours

But even with Jiangzi, it’s quite boring on the train
In the past, the little wizards always brought books or read them directly on the phone, but this time with the code artifact, it is naturally very different

However, the little mage is still more worried, and has been hesitant to sacrifice the artifact. After all, there are some ordinary artifacts around, such as the plague and death.

In fact, the little mage has also used and used this ordinary magic weapon for a long time, from the ancient eh thirsty skin to the latest type of plague, let’s die, and spend more than 1k days and nights with the little mage

That’s really a good memory, the little mage’s waist started to wear out at that time, so let’s talk about it later if I have a chance.

In fact, the little mage worry is completely redundant, because:

The little mage in the eyes of the little mage:
Wow, I got the artifact at a young age, this guy is not easy
The little mage in the eyes of others:
A hard-working programmer, I have to fix the bug on the train

Tips:

There is an experiment:
Let others help to see things, can reduce the probability of being stolen
I don’t know whether it’s true or not, but the little mage often uses it
The passers-by are also very helpful, there has not been a black swan incident

Before, the little mage asked a little partner to find a farmer’s house in his community, temporarily for a month as a transition

Then he knew what is called the struggle of the ants and what is called Bei Diao

That environment…
That noise…
That smell…

In addition, the shops here, as if they had been discussed, closed one after another, each time there was a loud noise, giving the little mage continuous and continuous stimulation.
One after another, more than the snoring of the little mage’s dormitory.

At three in the morning, the last store was finally closed
Little Mage thought he could finally sleep this time
Just lying down, there was a loud noise again, and the little mage was surprised to find that selling early shops began to open the door one after another.

The little mage has a good mental plan, thinking that he has read so many poems and books this year, and one month is not enough.

If he has watched the eighth episode of the documentary “Why Poverty?” produced by the British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) and the Danish Broadcasting Corporation (DR) in collaboration with documentary directors from various countries [“Reading to Poverty”](https://www.youtube .com/watch?v=tcMzVgurk-0), it should not be so naive

Sure enough, after the little mage made a fierce shot, a few days later, the result was gratifying
There are only two interview calls, the conversion rate is less than 20%, and the interviewer has been hung up
This one is also said to be miscellaneous, lacking advantage, boring, and empty thoughts, and the most important thing is that it is still disgusted with spells.

The little mage didn’t eat dinner when he was heartbroken. He quietly returned to the peasant’s room and went to read Laozi’s “Tao De Jing”.
Use that sentence repeatedly:

Misfortune, where the blessing rests; Fortune, where the misfortune lies

Come to comfort myself

╮(╯_╰)╭

entry.title: How to install reaver on Mac OS X
entry.content:
Update: 2017-05-24 09:03:10

Sorry, this post, I didn’t realize its ** danger before.

In October last year, my network was overdue, and I re-avered the wifi that was used temporarily during the National Day holiday that the new network needed.

When I played the Open Yale Course-Listening to Music on the NAS, I found that my TV (Android system) had a subtitle that said “This website is for my personal use only. Do you have any problems?”.

I was taken aback by this sentence. My NAS has a PandoraBox system. I use it as a bridge. Normally, my TV shouldn’t appear on their router. Obviously, I found that this wifi was a fishing wifi, and my TV was hacked.

So, if some stupid applications are still using http, all my data will be exposed. Even https has a problem with MitM. ‘The product says iOS and macOS have a login trust certificate in the Keychain, but what is Android? Some devices have their own back door.

As for my TV, I think it uses adb connect <TV IP address> which is Android Debug Bridge (adb) Wireless Debugging Over Wi-Fi.

However, I later changed most of the passwords.

So, you can try the reaver of technical exploration, but cannot use it.

Update: 2015-07-27 13:14:32

I wrote it on 2014-05-11, but it was a year late, and now you can easily install reaver with Homebrew.

Thanks Rustam for the suggestion

I always use beini in vmware, and every time I plug in an extra USB wireless adapter to my computer.

When I had a Mac, I just copied beini’s VMX from Windows to the Mac, which meant I still had to use a wireless adapter.

In fact, minidwep or inflator all use the powerful tool Reaver… you know), while Mac is a unix-based system, you can run Reaver directly.

  1. Download reaver-osx.zip
    (Tips: The original reaver-1.4 cannot use make directly on Mac)
  2. Unzip reaver-osx.zip.

Enjoy, don’t do bad things :-)

entry.title: Enhance your Lifestyle
entry.content:
[A person rents a single room in a strange city. Is there any way to make life in a small space more interesting?] ](http://www.zhihu.com/question/21752718)
A little expensive but what are the items worth buying?
Which things after buying will make people feel bad about each other because of the improvement of their quality of life and happiness?
Are there any good products or brands that are not known to outsiders?

When I first worked one or two years ago, I went to play in the room paper rented by the small group, and found that a girl decorated her cabin with all kinds of things and it was very warm

At that time, my income was nearly twice as much as hers, and looking at our living space and way, it really seems like the other way around
I immediately realized that the quality of life and the correlation coefficient of income are not proportional, or at least not as originally thought.

I know that those posts are so long. I read them for a long time a while ago, but I haven’t finished reading them. I chose some according to my needs:

~ Cote & Ciel backpack ~

As a male, it doesn’t matter if the mouse button is 1K, but the bag is so expensive at this price.
Wait for pay

OKO Filter Jug

This weird thing turns the coke into pure water, thunder is dead (actually to drink high-concentration coke →_→)
But I still need to make tea or coffee, so the demand is not strong

Retina MacBook Pro 13

Development artifact + guy who eats
In this way, it is investment rather than consumption
Regret not on top 15

iPad Air

I was bewitched to buy kindle before, but I couldn’t avoid the pad later.
It’s cool to read the PDF, the kindle is thrown in the drawer, don’t worry if you haven’t bought kindle

iPhone 6

Wait and wait, finally there is a big screen, wait for the release

BOSE QC 20i (active noise reduction)

The whole world is quiet…

Feel:
Great value, great recommendation

Logitech G700s

From G1 to MX518, now it’s time to enter the wireless
But now I play less games and wait for my salary

Feel:
11 custom shortcut keys, really don’t need to…
1W6 DPI, it’s like floating

Filco 87

After checking for a long time, I actually figured out what the green axis, red axis, tea axis and black axis are.

I thought that the keyboard + touchpad that comes with rMBP would be enough

As a result, I used Filco to hit Warcraft, and coded the code again
After switching back to my notebook, the difference immediately came out-if I press it quickly, the keycap will not bounce softly (poisoned…)

The legendary ** static capacitive keyboard**: HHKB or Realforce
But HHKB does not have F1, Realforce is so ugly…

Also, I want Mao to be silent, the office is noisy, okay? Besides, I still have QC 20
In addition, I like the keyboard crashing when playing Warcraft. The magnetic levitation keyboard is still in concept, naturally it is mechanical

Filco looks wrong
The 67 keys are weird. The most important thing is that you can’t choose a hero ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah
104’s keypad is not needed
So just 87 myself

Feel
I can only say that the Macbook’s trackpad experience is really in place
When coding code, use the board to locate, the hand movement is not large, and the mouse cannot do this
That’s why pure mouse streams such as Vim and Emacs appeared
There is no sound of crashing when playing games
Measured APM, still that number…
Related to people…

Braun ice razor

Oral B Electric Toothbrush S26

Feel:
It’s true that I’m wrong, and I bought a copy for my parents
Now brush your teeth every morning and night

Wooden SPA bathtub

Let’s talk about having your own paper

Well, it seems to be related to income…

entry.title: iOS 7 Programming Cookbook
entry.content:
How to read the cookbook

Oh my God, it’s finally over, more than 1k pages! ! !
Hand-typed 80% of the code inside and found two bugs in the code
In addition, if there is an error, children’s shoes can Pull Requests on Github to oreillymedia/iOS7_Programming_Cookbook

Suitable for the crowd:

Generally speaking, the Cookbook series are analogous to dictionaries. There is no need to go through the top and bottom of what is used and what to look up.

But after brushing it again, the benefits of building the relevant knowledge system are obvious

Not suitable:

  1. noob
  2. Senior iOS Developer

Novices can read these two books first:
Head First iPhone and iPad Development
The Big Nerd Ranch Guide

method:

  1. First of all, be prepared for collapse →_→
    Think about how many children’s shoes back to the abandon’s dictionary and kneel down

  2. Select the chapters that are key, that is, the chapters related to your current work look at it without missing a word
    Since the stuff you see can be used immediately, the effect is better
    The non-code parts are the principles and tips, so take a closer look

  3. When it reaches about 50%, the focus turns to the code
    At this time, I’m basically familiar with the author’s narrative method. Scan the title and you basically know what to do. Combine the code and guess with a guess. Just scan the text.

  4. Know how to give up
    Memorizing the dictionary does not allow you to speak fluent English, so there is no need to finish this book.
    For example, when I watched it, I thought iCloud and the like were too troublesome. If you simply synchronize data, it’s better to set up a backend directly, so just skip it.
    It’s just in line with the 28th rule.

  5. Pairing
    The effect of working alone is not as high as group learning
    But what you can see is different. For example, my friends are watching the Python Cookbook. It’s enough to achieve mutual promotion.
    PS: When I watched more than half of it, I realized that he was watching the translated version…

  6. English
    iOS update is too fast, the latest ones are all in English, 7 has not been translated yet, the official version of 8 will be released…
    So, learn English well, Sao Nian

entry.title: Cathedral and Bazaar
entry.content:
I have always been weird
Programmers in the eyes of the general public are generally dumb, acting logically, immersed in their own world all day long, taciturn, high IQ and low EQ. There is endless debate about which programming language or framework is better than another
Oh, and the most important one: Muyoumei paper

This also confuses me, and for a while I even disagree with this label from the bottom of my heart

Because looking at some big cows abroad, in addition to their superb code, they also write blogs, publish books, marketing, start companies, venture capital, diving, climbing, traveling…
And it’s not just a taste, it can only be described as guarding the sky
Is this… a programmer?

After reading this book, I realized that the name of this race is: Hacker

When I watched “The Hacker and the Painter” last time, it was very cold
I still remember that when I first learned the C language, I told my brother that I didn’t want to be a hacker or engage in security-related stuff.
After all, the school’s library at the time was filled with stuff like “hacker offense and defense practice” and “hacker disassembly”.

After many years, I now know that what I don’t want to be is a cracker

For hackers, Eric gives some suggestions in the article:

If you want to be a hacker, please read on. If you want to be a hacker, read the alt.2600 newsgroup (news:alt.2600). If you find that you are not as smart as you think, be prepared to go to jail for 5 to 10 times. This is what I want to say to hackers.

Regarding this, I have doubts. I have time in the future to see what version they were before 2000.

Java is also a good language for learning programming. It is more difficult than Python, but it can generate code faster than Python, I think it can be used as an excellent second language

If you haven’t read Python, just look at Ruby. This is a language that makes you cool. Also, due to the publication time of this book, iOS & Android has not yet appeared

It is best to learn all five languages (Python, Java, C/C++, Perl, and LISP). They are not just the most important hacker languages, but also represent completely different programming methods, each of which will benefit you a lot.

Reinvent the wheel

Creative minds are an extremely precious limited resource. They should not be wasted on reinventing the wheel, especially when there are so many fascinating new questions waiting there.

GUI

The problem lies mainly in ergonomic design and interface psychology. Hackers have always been weak in these areas. Hackers do a good job designing interfaces for other hackers, but they are often not good at modeling the thought process of the other 95%

Below is the book excerpt, the appendix is very interesting

2. Cathedral and Bazaar

  1. Good software works often come from the personal needs of the developers
  2. A good programmer knows what to write, a good programmer knows what to rewrite (and reuse)
  3. “Plan to throw one away. Sooner or later you will do it.” (Fred Brooks, Chapter 11 of The Myth of Man-Month)
  4. If you have the right attitude, interesting things will naturally find you.
  5. When you are no longer interested in a program, your last responsibility is to give it to a competent successor
  6. Treat your users as development collaborators. This is the most worry-free way if you want to quickly improve code quality and effectively troubleshoot errors.
  7. Publish early, publish often, and listen to user feedback.
  8. If there are enough beta testers and co-developers, almost all problems will appear quickly, and then naturally someone will solve it.
  • Linus’s law tells the most critical difference between the cathedral mode and the market mode: in the eyes of the cathedral builders, bugs are tricky, hard to find, and hidden in the depths. It takes several months of dedication. With careful inspection, you can be confident that all errors have been eliminated. And the longer the release interval, if the long-awaited release version is not perfect, people’s disappointment becomes more inevitable.
  • For the market model, it is completely different. With thousands of co-developers eagerly studying each new release, you can assume that bugs are easy to find, or at least quickly become easy to find. So you will release frequently to get more corrections, and the side effect is benign: even if there are some minor issues in the release, you will not lose too much.
  1. Smart data structures with stupid code are far better than the other way around.
  2. If you treat beta testers as your most precious resource, they will become your most precious resource
  3. Next to having a good idea is to identify good ideas from users, sometimes the latter is better
  4. Usually, the most breakthrough and innovative solutions come from the realization that your basic idea of the problem is wrong.
  5. “Perfection in design is not that nothing can be added, but that nothing can be subtracted.”
  6. Any tool should have expected functions, but a great tool can bring you unexpected functions.
  7. When writing gateway software, try not to interfere with the data flow as much as possible, and never throw away the information, unless the recipient forces you to do so
  8. When your language is far from Turing-complete, syntactic sugar will benefit you a lot.
  9. The security of the system depends only on the secrets it possesses. Beware of false secrets.
  10. To solve an interesting problem, first find a problem that interests you.
  11. If the development coordinator has a good communication medium like the Internet at least, and knows how to lead without coercion, then multi-person cooperation must be better than individual combat
  • If you feel fear and disgust during work (even if you express it in the form of self-deprecating-such as hanging a Dilbert doll), you should realize that something went wrong with the process. Happiness, humor and playfulness are real assets
  • “Play” is the most economically effective work mode in creative activities.

3. Cultivate the mental layer

  • In gift culture, social status does not depend on what you control, but what you give
  1. If it doesn’t work as I expected, it’s not good-no matter how smart and original it is.
  2. Extensive work at the mental level is better than repetitive work in a functional domain (for existing works).
  3. Works that can enter the main release are better than those that cannot. The works included in all major releases are the most respectable.
  4. “Use” is the most true compliment, and the category killer is better than its competitors.
  5. Compared with those who only pick interesting and simple tasks, those who have long been committed to hard and tedious tasks (such as debugging and writing documentation) are more admirable.
  6. Important function extensions are better than low-level repairs.

4. Magic Pot

  1. Reliability/stability/scalability is very important.
  2. Except for independent peer review, there is no other convenient and easy way to verify the correctness of the design and implementation.
  3. The software is very critical to the customer’s business.
  4. The software creates or operates a public computing or communication infrastructure.
  5. Key methods (or methods that can achieve equivalent functions) are public knowledge

5. Hackers’ counterattack

  • The lack of theory and language is bad for us in two ways: one is that we cannot systematically think about how to improve our methods, and the other is that it is difficult for us to explain and sell our methods to others.

Appendix A: How to become a hacker

Hackers do construction, hackers do damage

Hacker attitude

  1. The world is full of fascinating problems waiting for people to solve.
  2. Don’t solve a problem twice.
  3. Boredom and boredom are harmful
  4. Freedom is good
  5. Attitude cannot replace ability.

Basic skills of hackers

  1. Learn to program
  • If you want to acquire a mindset that transforms knowledge into skills, you can only practice and follow the master. The way is to read code and write code
  1. Find an open source UNIX, learn to use and run it.
  2. Learn how to use WWW and write HTML.

Status in hacker culture

  1. Write open source software.
  2. Assist in testing and debugging open source software
  3. Publish useful information.
  4. Help do some basic work.
  5. Serve the hacker culture itself.

Style problem

  • Learn to write well in your native language. Although there is an old belief that programmers can’t write well, many hackers (including the best hackers I know) write good articles, and the number is surprisingly large.

  • Read science fiction and participate in science fiction rally (this is a good way to get to know hackers and potential hackers).

  • Study meditation and/or learn martial arts. (Mental training seems to be similar in many important ways.)

  • Cultivate the appreciation of music. Learn to appreciate some unique types of music. Learn to play an instrument well, or learn how to sing.

  • Cultivate your appreciation of puns and witty words.

    But these things are related to the combination of left and right brain skills, which may be the key to the problem (hackers not only need to have strong logical reasoning skills, but also be able to quickly escape from the specific logic of the problem)

Don’t

  • Don’t use stupid, exaggerated usernames or nicknames.
  • Don’t get involved in Usenet (or anywhere else) online scolding wars.
  • Don’t call yourself “cyberpunk”, and don’t waste time interacting with people who call themselves cyberpunk.
  • Don’t let your posts or emails be full of incorrect spelling and bad grammar.

At last:
“You are a hacker only if other hackers think you are a hacker”
The values expressed are similar to the ideals declared by the elite groups of the medieval European chivalry era (usually unachievable). These social elites have sufficient financial resources to surpass the scarce economy in which they are located. As one might expect, an aspiring knight fights for justice. He seeks honor instead of money. He stands on the side of the weak and oppressed, constantly seeking opportunities to challenge the limits of his heroic talents. It is precisely because of this that he will consider himself (and considered by others) to be a leader among people-provided that his abilities and conduct have been recognized and officially recognized by other knights. In the chivalry eulogized by Arthurian tales and chansons de geste, we see idealism, constant challenge to oneself and the pursuit of status, which are similar to the elements that motivate hackers today.

entry.title: Willpower
entry.content:
As modern magic spells become more and more complex, a successful project often needs to be calculated in months. Magisters who know this well are honored as the myth of man-month

In this environment, spiritual power is very precious and important to the wizards

Speaking of mental power, it’s actually pronounced as WillPower in the kingdom of the elves, but after being introduced into the empire, it was forced to translate as self-control or willpower by unknowing Muggles.

Sounds very mysterious + tall, in fact, you only need to grasp two characteristics

  1. battery
  • Mages use their mental power to control magical elements
  • Morning> evening
  • Available sleep/meditation call back
  • Different magic consumes different power
  1. Muscle
  • Variable total reserves
  • Can be expanded with specific exercises

Mr. Brooks bowed his head and prayed silently at the dinner party where he was awarded the Business Person of the Year; the prayer came from Niebuhr’s 1934, one of the most famous prayers of the 20th century:

My God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, The courage to change the things I can, And the wisdom to know the difference.

(PS: Do children’s shoes sound familiar~)

Among the features, specific exercise methods and sleep are what we can change

Chip Heath/Dan Heath co-authored [Transient: How to Make Your World Better](http://book.douban.com/subject_search?search_text=%E7%9E%AC%E5% Mentioned in 8F%98&cat=1001)

The vast majority of our daily actions are spontaneous rather than supervised. And this is a good thing, because it is difficult to supervise, it will gradually consume self-control ability.

Then said

Self-control ability is an exhaustible resource, which is a crucial realization. Because when we talk about “self-control”, we are not talking about the superficial meaning of the word, but it means that willpower needs to fight against vices (smoking, eating cookies, alcohol).

In view of this, the book gives a simple and effective exercise method:
Internalized Habits-Set up an Action Trigger, its role is to create an “instant habit”

Because in such a cycle, there is no conscious and deliberate thinking, and this can also avoid the loss of people’s energy for self-control

The result is like a classmate driving a car. At first he was in a hurry, but later (thought) he would not drive into the ditch when he called (→_→)

And the aspect of sleep does not just refer to the sleep of more than six hours at night, and naps of no more than half an hour during the day can also be included.
The most important one is: sleep when you are sleepy
After all, under the condition of insufficient mental power, forcibly controlling magic elements will have the risk of bursting magic weapons

If you still don’t give up, please call the following formula:
Achievement = efficiency X time

PS: In case the efficiency is negative…

With correct ideological guidance, and after a period of devil training, the little mage is delighted to find that his mental power has improved significantly
The most obvious is that when you are in good condition, you can control 15+ Pomodoro every day, and usually around 12

At the same time, the little mage also discovered that his mental power reserves cannot be increased indefinitely
And if it is a book with a large amount of information such as “A Brief History of Information” and “Out of Control”, the power consumption will be very fast

So I can only devote my limited energy to more important things

This is also where Katsuma Kazuyo Time Investment Law Time Investment Distribution Map (Four Quadrant Rule + Time Record) appeared

But the most paradoxical thing is that after you control what you want to do, other things are messed up.

For example, self-control mentioned:

More willing to “try multiple mating strategies” after dieting

Is this also one of the reasons why some stars cheat? (→_→)

But our little mage doesn’t even have girlfriends, so it’s not obvious
The side effect is that after more than a dozen Pomodoros, if you continue to read the book, the stack will be full and cannot be pushed.
In addition, the reaction became sluggish, and after the library closed, he looked demented on the way home.

PS: Willpower is a bit like immunity, not the stronger the better. Excessive willpower = chronic stress
PS2: People who integrate themselves have the right willpower

entry.title: What technology wants
entry.content:
The last sentence
This reminds me of Zhang Xiaolong knowing If this world is just a piece of code, what bugs have you found so far? Quite humorous answer to this question

It is unrealistic to require a variable in the code to check the code for bugs.

Book excerpt:

The meaning of freedom is not to do it rashly, but to “freedom of choice”

Both life and technology seem to be based on non-material information flow.

Autonomy: self-repair, self-protection, self-maintenance (access to energy, discharge of waste), self-control of goals, self-improvement

We should treat technical elements like nature. We cannot ask technology to obey us, just as we cannot ask life to obey us. Sometimes we should surrender to its guidance and be happy to feel its colorfulness; sometimes we should strive to transform its true colors to meet our own needs. We don’t have to implement all the requirements of the technical elements, but we can learn to use this power instead of against it

Language is a technique that allows thinking to question itself; it is a magic mirror that tells the brain what it is thinking; it is a joystick that transforms thoughts into tools. Language has mastered the elusive goalless movement of self-awareness and self-control, so that it can control thinking and make it the source of new ideas. Without the rational structure of language, we cannot know our spiritual activities, and naturally we cannot think about our behavior.

Money brings more choices, not just more material (although more material is also a result). We will not be happy because of more equipment and experience. What makes us really happy is to be able to control time and work, have the opportunity to enjoy real leisure, escape the uncertainty caused by war, poverty and corruption, and seize the opportunity to pursue individuality Freedom-all this happens with the growth of wealth.

Human nature is malleable. We change our values, expectations and self-perception through thinking. We have been changing our nature since the time of the apes, and once that happens, we will continue to transform ourselves deeply

Technology is an extension of life, and the common needs of the two are:

  • Improve efficiency
  • Increase chance
  • Improve spontaneity
  • Increase complexity and diversity
  • Increase specialization
  • Increase universality
  • Increase freedom
  • Promote symbiosis
  • Increase beauty
  • Improve perception
  • Extended structure
  • Improve evolvability

free
Like everything else, our free will is not unique. The choice under the subconscious free will is in the primitive behavior pattern of animals. Every animal has basic needs, and they will make choices to meet these needs. But free will even appeared before life. Some theoretical physicists-including Freeman Dyson-believe that free will emerges in atomic particles, so free choice was born in the heat of the Big Bang and has continued to expand since then.

Technological elements are the way the universe creates self-awareness. Carl Sagan gave an impressive explanation of this: “We are stardust thinking about the stars.

entry.title: Imperial Capital
entry.content:
Since my reading is almost half a thousand, I have always wanted to introduce the stuff about fast reading in a few paragraphs.

As a result, as soon as I drag this series, there is nothing left…
It is estimated that the level is still limited and can not be written…

Let’s do something else first

Nasim Nicholas Taleb used the entire book “Random Wandering Fools” to explain “uncertainty”, and then used the entire book “Black Swan” to describe how to deal with the unpredictable future
The little mage hastily read through and thinks he has the essence

Between Shen Zhen and Imperial Capital, after careful consideration (tou nao yi re), I decided to choose the Hard mode to see if the hidden skills can be turned on get√

surroundings

Most of the children’s shoes in the south have always had the impression of the imperial capital:

When it rains, it’s Jiangzi again:

After a week of fieldwork, the little mage came to a conclusion

“The above picture is exaggerated, but it’s really true!!!”

Don’t you see the air is too dry, and the girls on the road have bad skin
Don’t you see that the roadside cars and the ground are covered with a layer of dust because of the dust

Since the little mage found a girl walking barefoot on the asphalt road when it rained in heaven, he stopped wearing socks.
As a result, the Imperial Capital took two steps and got a pair of sandpaper…

accent

Geographically speaking, the young master was born north of the Huaihe River, and has always thought that he is a northerner, but he agrees with the southern way of life.
When I first arrived in heaven, I was told by the children that the sound of “er” was very heavy, and they were said to have caused them crooked

After I came to the imperial capital, I learned that the little witch has seen the big witch
Where is this official description:

Mandarin uses Beijing Voice as the standard tone, and northern dialect as the basic dialect…

The sound of “er” here is so heavy that it sounds funny, and the little mage can’t help but laugh when he hears people talking on the way.
But in just two days, the little mage found out that he was taken in a ditch…

But there are really many crooked nuts on the road, and many of them don’t speak English (Little Master still knows a little English, it should not be an accent problem)

intermediary

I think that when I was still in heaven, renting a house only had to stop at the gate of the community, and immediately surrounded a group of enthusiastic aunts, and there was no intermediary fee.
When the imperial capital arrived for the first time, the little mage was not prepared enough, and still thought it was similar to heaven, but when he arrived at the gate of the community, he found that the little blackboard (except for a layer of dust) was clean. Asked the security at the door about the renting situation, the security shook his head repeatedly, and replied “I don’t know”

There used to be more than ten square meters at 0.8k in heaven, 1.3k is enough to face south + large balcony
And no matter how cheap the room paper is, even the basement has its own bathroom, so you can run naked after taking a shower.
The little mage Jiangzi still complained (with the meager salary)

The price of the imperial capital is x2.5, and the bathroom is shared
There are also houses within the third ring road, some of which are older than the time the little mage was alive.
The walls are yellowed with spider webs in the corners, and all kinds of mess inside the house
And most of the five-bedroom rooms, in case one house is crowded with young couples, there are 8 excluding the young masters, and during the WC peak in the morning… the young masters thought of using Queue to achieve FIFO

When I went back to the hotel to search for reliable intermediaries at night, I found that there were no corpses in the Imperial Capital. No matter how big or small, as long as they were intermediaries, they had been hacked out.

It’s a pity that the little mage has just arrived, and he is not familiar with the place of his life. He knows that “I am a fish and a man is a knife”, but he has no alternative.

advice

The children from the south, the muds are filled with too much chicken soup, such as:

The little mage gave the muds a piece of advice with rope life:

Thousands of watches come here because:
*true! of! ! meeting! ! ! dead! ! ! ! of! ! ! ! ! *

Delegate

After doing 1, 2, and 3, it still doesn’t work. Why?

  1. add refreshControl to tableView, not view

3 refreshView function

entry.title: Why we will gradually become conservative
entry.content:
At a certain stage, I always feel that my parents are old and stubborn, disgusting and unwilling to touch new things, because they are young and ignorant, I even laughed at them

Today, when I worked for IE8 all morning, I finally changed from Win 8.1 to Win7 (as for why, I mean two words: online banking), and I was shocked when I thought that I would never use the new system again as a last resort.

Recently, Microsoft has been forced by various browsers to start brushing the version number
The customer service of CITIC Bank said that IE8 is best for USB USB. I saw that Win8.1 comes with IE, and it has reached 11…

But IE and the system are bound, and in desperation, I can only change the system. Because it is installed in the virtual machine, all kinds of tossings, although the final is Happy Ending, but the time of the morning cannot come back

Recall that when the Yosemite 10.10 Dev version came out, as a developer, I didn’t have a cheap hand, so I just upgraded it until the official version was released.

The reason is that when I was in university, the preview version of Win7 just came out, and I couldn’t wait to upgrade it. It turned out that the broadband connection disappeared every time I restarted.

I also tried [Dvorak keyboard](http://zh.wikipedia.org/zh/%E5%BE%B7%E6%B2%83%E5%A4%8F%E5%85%8B%E9%8D% B5%E7%9B%A4) It is not a problem to be familiar with the key position after a month
And I feel that the speed has indeed improved. Although there may be some psychological factors, I obviously feel that the keys in the middle row are pressed more.

but! When I use someone else’s computer, I completely become a fool in the eyes of others! Every time I say “I use Dvorak keyboard” with heartfelt words
The most deadly thing is that after using Ubuntu, the English is okay, the system is there, and the Chinese is tragic again.
Coupled with the popularity of Android, it’s basically impossible to have a Dvorak layout on mobile keyboards.

Then, I can only compromise

For example, at work, use Ubuntu 10.10 to compile the Android ROM. Although 11 is more beautiful, even 10.10 officially has given up support, but if you are a bit cheap, you can’t compile it at all.

There are countless examples of sauce

I think I’ve already started to be afraid of things before I’ve been established, so because older people have suffered a lot and lost more pits, so gradually they don’t want to touch new things anymore? ?

Reference [Learned Helplessness Experiment](http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%BF%92%E5%BE%97%E6%80%A7%E5%A4%B1%E5%8A %A9), this is again the nature of the animal, it seems there is no good way

But such a person will gradually become boring, like a pool of stagnant water slowly stinking

I don’t want to be that person

Look at some older and interesting people, talk to them, there is no pressure, you can better explain your ideas

So how do they keep up with the times and stay curious?

entry.title: Why study philosophy
entry.content:
Any subject has a trial range, useful or not is relative
If your life is relatively smooth and the surrounding environment is better, although there are boats, there is nothing to take advantage of, and although there are soldiers, there is nothing to report. I haven’t reflected on anything, it may be useless

But if you keep curiosity and keep seeking, whether you are in politics, research or business, you will definitely encounter philosophical problems in the end
Because philosophy is about the origin of the world

Harvard University Political Science Professor Michael J. Sandel in “Justice-What Should I Do?” “The paragraph at the end of the first lesson is very, very good (so good that people watched the full set like chasing American dramas) summary:

Reading philosophy books can be used as an exercise in your cognition of yourself.
Philosophy makes things we are familiar with become unfamiliar. It does not give us more new information, but gives us another way of looking at things. It has two levels of adventure: personal level and political level. The so-called adventure on a personal level is that once those familiar things become unfamiliar, they will never be the same again. Self-knowledge is like a lost traveler, no matter how confused or disturbed he is, you can no longer think about it. This process is difficult but you have to devote yourself to it. Moral and political philosophy is like a story. You don’t know where it will take you, but you know clearly that this is a story about you. The political risk is that after you read these books and participate in these discussions, you will become a better and more responsible citizen, you will examine those assumptions about the public political realm, and your political judgment will Get exercise, you will be able to participate in public affairs more actively, but this may be one-sided and misleading. What you need to admit is that it may make you a worse citizen instead of a good citizen, or at least it will make you a bad citizen before you become a good citizen. That’s because of philosophy, which is a long time ago, and even a little destructive. Let us take a look at a conversation in the Socratic era. Socrates’ friend Calicole hoped to persuade him to leave philosophy. He said to Socrates: Philosophy is indeed beautiful. It is only beautiful when you are moderately involved in it, but if you are too addicted to it, it will destroy you. Listen to me, put aside those philosophical debates, think about what is the real achievement in life, don’t learn from those who waste time in ambiguous philosophical statements, you should look at the rich lives of those who really live well. Reputation and other things. He meant to say, buddy, be realistic. But one thing Kohler is correct: Philosophy will alienate us from the original conventions, pre-ordered assumptions, and inherent ideas.

When facing these problems, we have a special way of avoiding it. Its name is skepticism. It means that, like this, we have just begun to learn, and there is no way to completely solve the cases or principles that we argued at once. , And if Aristotle, Kant, Locke, and Muller have not solved these problems for so many years, who do we think we are? Can you solve them after just spending a semester in the sanders hall? Moreover, this may just be a question about each person having their own different principles. There is nothing worth discussing, and it is not clear why these problems are. This is how skepticism escapes. Regarding this, I think I can answer this: Indeed, these issues have been discussed for a very, very long time, but it is precisely because they are constantly being discussed that although in a certain sense they are impossible to be explained, But on the other hand, they are also cannot be avoided. The reason is unavoidable because the answers to these questions are in our daily lives. Therefore, skepticism just lets you let go and give up thinking. It will not solve any moral or philosophical problems. Kant has a very wonderful description of skepticism. He wrote, “Scepticism is just a place for people to rest in the process of exploration. It allows us to wander in some dogmas, but it is definitely not that we can stay forever. Where *.” Here, I want to briefly summarize the purpose of this course is to *awaken endless curiosity and reasoning to see where it will take us.

entry.title: How to manipulate Filco keyboard layout to Mac OSX
entry.content:
I entered the red axis of Filco before, and the game code is correct.

Although before using System Preferences -> Keyboard -> Modifier Keys -> Select keyboard -> Opt-Cmd Cmd-Opt, you can adjust Cmd-Opt to Apple’s key position
But every time you play StarCraft, you have to change it again. From the above process, it can be seen that it is very cumbersome.

As for F1-F12, there is no way, and the lock screen is also a problem

Huangtian did not take his pains, and finally found this, and it’s free:
Karabiner

After setting Opt-Cmd, then F1-F12 are changed to Apple function keys
By the way, the second to last useless key in the lower right corner is changed to FN
Then I changed the position of Ctrl_R and FN
The Pa/Br in the upper right corner is changed to Power

Then in MenuBar -> SettingList -> + a Profile without key modification, such as Game

If you play a game in the future, click the icon in the status bar and switch to Game with one click.

entry.title: An indigestible programming language is a bad language
entry.content:
When I was Gap Year, I saw this book. I was writing questions at codecademy. I only saw the Ruby chapter. At that time, I felt that Go was already very Geek.

One year later, when the company I am currently working for was refactoring the backend, I considered Scala. One of my friends saw the high salary of the game, so he resolutely went to see Erlang. There was a Thoughtworks event sharing I heard. Clojure`

When I read this book again, I found that Ruby, Io, Prolog, Scala, Erlang, Clojure, Haskell

I’ve been sitting in the well and looking at the sky, I read this book again and found that I don’t really need to read this book

So if you are curious and satisfy your curiosity, you can take a look. If you want to study seriously, skip it.

Looking at the programming languages, there are so many people who can’t escape the following categories:

  1. model
  • Functional
  • OO
  • prototype
  1. Data structure algorithm
  2. data structure
    • Types of
    • Linked list
    • Hash table
  3. process
    • judgment
    • cycle
  4. Concurrent

Regarding concurrency, since the process does not conform to human thinking, there seems to be no good solution at present
I think that even if it is solved in the future, it should be written and encapsulated by some talented people, so that people with mediocre IQ can solve it as simple as writing ifelse

Personally, the popularity of a language is inseparable from the following points:

  1. Commercial Promotion (Java|OC)
  2. Safe and stable
  3. Is it easy for humans to read

No need to say the first two points, if you say too much, it will be tears

It is mentioned in the seven languages of seven weeks:
In many ways, Clojure is the wise kung fu master, the oracle on the hill, or the enigmatic Jedi trainer.

The benefits of Lisp are known from “The Hacker and the Painter”, and Emace is known as “the editor of God”

However, it’s so good and so awesome, but it’s not popular, it’s a question worth pondering

From the perspective of syntactic sugar, I still remember that I used Swift once, a previous generation (C/C++/Java) programmer (non-derogatory), just saw the return value changed to ->, the variable type was Exclaimed from behind
As for myself, I completely accept Go Swift and other grammatical sugars, but I also feel that Lisp‘s prefix expressions are all uncomfortable. The simplicity is good, and I get dizzy when it is long, and the closing brackets are very heretical.
It can be seen how difficult it is for programmers to accept the new syntax after getting used to a system

“Code is written for people to see”

So I think that language that is anti-human reading will disappear, or at least not become popular among humans.

So Mazi took another approach, focusing on how to make programmers write code happily

So there is no best language, only the most suitable language

Of course, none of the above mentioned applies to a situation where computers have evolved to be able to write code

Because this has broken away from the human paradigm

entry.title: Refactoring is not a silver bullet
entry.content:
When the book was written, object-oriented was still a niche, but now functional programming has become popular

Today, most of the ideas and methods of refactoring are slightly heard by programmers who are a little bit pursuing. If you are a Java programmer, it is even harder not to know
So far, reconstruction has been similar to a part of coding

Chapters 1 2 3 of this book have already explained what refactoring is and when, so you should read it carefully
4 5 6 7 8 9 10 11 are specific methods, those who are familiar with Java can take a look
Just skip over the following chapters

I once brushed “Code Encyclopedia” in school, so, after reading this book, relative is not that important

For example, although my iOS is weak, but seeing the project of the company now, I am drunk with hundreds of lines of functions, a lot of repetitive code, and various magic numbers
Of course, this is not to say that the previous project was not good. After all, everyone was forced to become stupid by deadline

In general, this book should be passed over, after all, the cover is printed:

Cheats that ordinary programmers must practice to advance to programming masters

Because if you don’t look at it, you may not be aware of the pits that people passed by.

Like my understanding of temporary variables is incorrect
There is also the previous writing of functions too random, like parameters without let, and without adding private for those that are not exposed

The more instructive are:

  • Eliminate temporary variables
  • Polymorphism replaces Switch
  • Null Object

At present, the time to make iOS is still short. I belong to junior programmers. There are so many things I don’t understand. Every time I do functions in trial and error, I ignore all these things when I write.
Although I often think about refactoring immediately after the function is OK, people are lazy, and often see that everything is fine if they can run, and then put the hope of organizing the code on refactoring

The ideal situation is:
Version control + Review + pairing + refactoring (The current company is very good, it has been implemented mostly)

But this reminds me of a classic paper on software engineering published by Fred Brooks in 1987-[“No Silver Bullet”](http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%B2% A1%E6%9C%89%E9%93%B6%E5%BC%B9)

Refactoring is certainly not a silver bullet

Can only rewrite the boy

entry.title: Design book for programmers
entry.content:
I look at this book so enlightening
As a result, our CTO picked it up and flipped through it the other night, and said: The painting is so ugly, but I am embarrassed to say it is a design

awkward

But this reminds me of the C++ book written for everyone that I read when I was in college. At the time, it felt so normal, but Douban 8+

So it’s really important to meet the right book at the right time

It’s been a while since I jumped from C to C++, and MFC is also in use, so I probably don’t count as everyone anymore. It’s normal to have no inspiration

Regarding this book, I personally feel that its purpose is not to train you as a master, but to target children who have never paid attention to design or who want to get started but don’t know how to get started.

So the use cases inside are the comparison between no design and the addition of basic design elements, which is naturally out of the eyes of experts.

  1. Four principles:
  • Intimacy
  • Align
  • repeat
  • Compared
  1. Color
  • Complementary
  • Tricolor
  • Split complementary tricolor
  • Similar color
  • Dark and light
  1. Font
  • Oldstyle
  • Modern
  • Slab serif
  • Without serif
  • Script

People who have never done design may notice these basic points, but they don’t have a system of their own.

Once the human brain knows something, it cannot return to or simulate the state when it did not know it. This is the curse of knowledge.

So the children’s shoes designed in Phuket should be unrolled quickly

entry.title: What I talk about when I talk about running
entry.content:
The old breath permeates the book from beginning to end
Regarding the passage of time and the decline of physical ability, there is no alternative

It is different from rashly resisting and insisting on disobeying the old. Yes, the author gradually accepted this fact and used it as a rule to deal with

Many questions I am curious about, the author has also reflected on and went deeper

This is roughly:

I’m the kind of person who likes to be by himself.

I stop every day right at the point where I feel I can write more. Do that, and the next day’s work goes surprisingly smoothly. I think Ernest Hemingway did something like that. To keep on going, you have to keep up the rhythm. This is the important thing for longCterm projects.

I’m the type of person who doesn’t find it painful to be alone. I find spending an hour or two every day running alone, not speaking to anyone, as well as four or five hours alone at my desk, to be neither difficult nor boring.

I ran a bar, so I learned the importance of being with others and the obvious point that we can’t survive on our own.

The clouds are mere guests in the sky that pass away and vanish, leaving behind the sky.

it’s precisely because people are different from others that they’re able to create their own independent selves.

I had to give it everything I had. If I failed, I could accept that. But I knew that if I did things halfheartedly and they didn’t work out, I’d always have regrets.

I only began to enjoy studying after I got through the educational system and became a soCcalled member of society.

We’d closed the club, so we also decided that from now on we’d meet with only the people we wanted to see and, as much as possible, get by not seeing those we didn’t. We felt that, for a time at least, we could allow ourselves this modest indulgence.

It was my real schooling. But you can’t keep up that kind of life forever. Just as with school, you enter it, learn something, and then it’s time to leave.

I’m struck by how, except when you’re young, you really need to prioritize in life, figuring out in what order you should divide up your time and energy. If you don’t get that sort of system set by a certain age, you’ll lack focus and your life will be out of balance

In other words, you can’t please everybody

Life just isn’t fair, is how it used to strike me. Some people can work their butts off and never get what they’are aiming for, while others can get it without any effort at all.

It suits me. Or at least because I don’t find it all that painful.

The most important thing we ever learn at school is the fact that the most important things can’t be learned at school

while they’re getting by on these, they may actually discover real, hidden talent within them

I’ve always done whatever I felt like doing in life. People may try to stop me, and convince me I’m wrong, but I won’t change.

My own individual, stubborn, uncooperative, often selfCcentered nature that still doubts itself—that, when troubles occur, tries to find something funny, or something nearly funny, about the situation.

This takes time, of course, but sometimes taking time is actually a shortcut.

entry.title: iOS CI (Jenkins + pH AB Rica Tor + slack)
entry.content:
shell 里 brew install jenkins
Then jenkins starts, enter 127.0.0.1:8080 in the sirloin device to jump the pit

Install the xcode related plug-ins in Jenkins
Steps are available in other blogs, Google ios ci continuous integration, such as:

  • Jenkins+Github+Testflight build continuous integration environment under Mac,
  • Travis CI for Continuous Integration of iOS Project

The version may be older, but you can make up for it

The Phabricator we use here, because it is iOS, is placed on the local Mac instead of the server, so the private key is good enough, and the callback interaction between Jenkins and Phabricator is ignored.

In addition, there are several problems:

jenkins.plugins.slack.ActiveNotifier hudson.model.listeners npe

test push message is good
After two hours, I don’t know what’s going on. I slept and it was normal the next day…

Seems to know the reason, Project Channel cannot be empty

ResourceRules.plist

On the first day, it was prompted that ResourceRules.plist was wrong, so this was added to the project and Jenkins configuration
Custom xcodebuild arguments $(SDKROOT)/ResourceRules.plist

As a result, it was prompted that ResourceRules.plist could not be found the next day. It was OK to delete this in Jenkins. It’s amazing.

iPhone Developer: no identity found

swift-stdlib-tool failed with exit code 1

Go to developer.apple.com to download various certificates, but none of them work
There is really no way. I directly opened the project under ~/.jenkins/jobs/**** with xcode. I wanted to make a comparison. It turned out that there was an extra certificate in the keychain, and then it succeeded…

In addition, the company account has not been bought yet, and Jenkins has not opened the account system, so continue to wait

DUNS (Dun & Bradstreet Code)

The company account has been stuck here before, and Apple’s email has not responded for a long time, so be sure to call Apple’s customer service. It will be OK in a day or two.

bundle identifier

Previously, .alpha and .beta in the company account were occupied, and the same certificate could not be created here for the corporate account, so I had to delete the original account or change ID

As a result, when deleting, it is found that the app needs to be in several states, the official document: TransferringAndDeletingApps

Previously, beta was used as testflight, and AppStore was not uploaded. Email Apple, reply:

Currently, your app does not have at least one approved version.

…
Had to change the ID

over the air distribution

Everything is ready, quickly export it, and it turns out that after Xcode 6, there is only one .ipa for guiding ipa without a matching .plist, you have to write it by yourself…(fortunately, Jenkins can also generate it automatically), roughly like this: plist (Change the corresponding in $ $)

Then python -m SimpleHTTPServer, open Safari on the iPhone, the result… still not working…

It was later discovered that the server must be https…

build number

targets -> Build Phases -> + New Run Script Phase

When the scheme is release, the build will automatically +1

PS:
In fact, this can be written in the shell of the Jenkins build step, then push to origin/master, and then upload *.ipa to the server

OS X Server

Pit, have time to organize one

DistributionProvisioningProfiles

Directly download the downloaded *. mobileprovision and write the path and find that it is impossible, so I have to manually package it myself

to sum up:
All the way to pit

entry.title: Painless Acupuncture
entry.content:
Once I talked about Chinese medicine in the magic group 粢饭, and found that 80% of my colleagues thought Chinese medicine was deceptive. The little mage was shocked.

Later, I talked about this with a magician in Red Riding Hood. The little mage thought that healing was like marching and fighting.

Combat strength of both sides: I 5 enemy 8

Western medicine directly kills the virus, reducing the enemy’s combat power to 3
And the Chinese medicine is like adding a halo to increase our combat power to 10

As far as the result is concerned, there are 2 after the fight, so it’s best not to believe in a certain plan.

As for the unbelief, on the one hand, there may be too many scammers. For example, after being deceived a few times, you will no longer believe in love.
On the other hand, medicine has its limitations. Today, when Western medicine is relatively perfect, cancer can still be misdiagnosed, not to mention that there are still no effective treatments for some diseases.
There is also a possibility that the public has a misunderstanding of the theory of Chinese medicine, just as a child who often learns magic strangely can’t even repair magic instruments.

In the third year of the Magic Academy, the little mage got a serious illness and didn’t want to be a blessing in disguise, so he comprehended [The Theory of Human Ecological Balance](http://leihao0.github.io/2012/05/28/%E4%BA% BA%E4%BD%93%E7%94%9F%E6%80%81%E5%B9%B3%E8%A1%A1%E8%AE%BA/), I have not had any disease after Dache
Xiao Chao, who usually catches a cold, kills chickens with a sledge knife and directly sacrifices “Suwen·Four Qi Tiao Shen Dalun” by Huang Di Nei Jing

That’s why the sage does not cure the disease and cures the disease, and the incurable cures the disorder but the disorder. This is also the case. It’s not too late if the husband’s disease has become a disease and then the medicine, the chaos has become, and then he can be cured.

When the disease is about to start and there is a warning, calculate it to eliminate it in advance

But I also said before that the little mage has problems with his waist and cervical spine due to occupational problems. For example, the KW test in Magic Health Guide cannot pass , The swing in yoga can’t do it

But the little mage is lazy, unable to keep exercising, let alone running like Chun Shang Chun Shu for decades, so he can only hope for acupuncture

To be precise, acupuncture and moxibustion are divided into acupuncture and moxibustion, but people often think that acupuncture and moxibustion are all needle sticks, so let’s describe it like this

Descartes once divided the method of studying a problem into four steps in Talk about Method, the first of which is:

I will never accept any truth that I am not clear about, which means that we must try to avoid recklessness and prejudice, and can only be very clear and certain based on my own judgment, without any doubtful truth. That is to say, as long as you have not experienced the problems you have personally experienced, no matter what authoritative conclusion you have, you can doubt it. This is the famous “doubt everything” theory. For example, Aristotle once concluded that women have two fewer teeth than men. but it is not the truth.

Since I have drunk medicine, but it hasn’t improved much, so the little mage doesn’t believe in herbal medicine.

But meridians, to be precise, acupuncture points, are easy to feel
For example, Hegu (Hukou), Jianjing, pinch it by yourself, and then pinch another place, you will know that it is not ordinary meat.
The meridians conflict with the three chakras and seven meridians of Indian yoga, so it is the little mage who is skeptical

Many times before the needle, the little mage had simulated the whole process:
I saw that the 2.5-inch stainless steel needle penetrated the epidermis -> dermis -> subcutaneous tissue effortlessly. Due to the inaccurate recognition of the acupoints, unfortunately it touched the arteries and veins. The little mage’s painful hand shook and broke the next one. Autonomous motor nerve, disabled for the rest of my life…

Mark Twain lamented in his later years

Most of my life has been worrying about things that have never happened. No behavior is more stupid than worrying out of nothing.

The little mage was pierced several times by a small partner of the University of Traditional Chinese Medicine. After being able to bounce around without any major incidents, I guessed that the motor nerves were not like optical fibers as previously imagined. There was only one, and it was broken when it was broken. There are many roots, and the organism has the ability to repair itself

But the little friend lives far away and can’t come often. He keeps some hospital needles every time, so the little mage takes care of himself.

Of course, the act of digging the corner of socialism by small partners should be strictly prohibited. But compared to another one, I bought a super-sized power bank in order to not use my own home appliances, and charged my notebooks every time I came back, and notified the stunned people’s police of the little mage, which is nothing.

But there is still a problem-the little mage is afraid of pain
This is also the reason why he hasn’t had a physical examination every day

So the little mage first moved out the True Qi Operation Method, in an attempt to solve this problem once and for all by opening up the two channels of Ren and Du, and even stupidly wrote [ Log](http://leihao0.github.io/2014/01/08/%E7%9C%9F%E6%B0%94%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8C%E6%B3%95- %E6%89%93%E9%80%9A%E5%B0%8F%E5%91%A8%E5%A4%A9%E8%AE%B0%E5%BD%95/) To record the whole process, it is a pity When the Qi is stuck on the tail, you can only slow down

But the cervical spine cannot be slowed down. First, it has affected sleep, and secondly, I am afraid of myself.

Secondly, rule the Liufu, and then the Wuzang. Those who rule the five Tibetans are half dead and half alive.

It was the night of New Year’s Day, the little mage was tossing and turning on the bed, and in this moment of silence, he remembered Schopenhauer the world as will and appearance A few words in:

It turns out that everything that exists is just the existence of the subject.

When he was reciting these few sentences, he never understood the reason. At this moment, he suddenly remembered that neck, shoulder, waist and leg diseases are different from organ diseases, which are difficult to cure. Irregular treatment or rehabilitation training will only cause illness. Repeated or even worsening pain, but according to the meaning of “The World of Will and Appearance”, it seems that the disease only exists for “I”
Thinking of this, the little mage quickly got up and flipped through the book, Guo Xian said again:

Every time the body is subjected to an external effect, this effect immediately and directly stimulates my will… and the reverse is also true. Every violent excitement of the will, that is, touch and passion, shakes the body and hinders the function of the body. run

Thinking of this, the little mage suddenly realized that he sat down cross-legged and adjusted his breath according to the method shown in “True Qi Movement”
Then he concentrated his thoughts into a beam of light, forming a sample paper of needles, and slowly plunged into Dazhui. As expected, the surrounding muscles gradually relaxed.
After that, the little mage took Fengchi, Fengfu (isn’t this for treating colds?), and Gao Liao (who is seriously ill, it is really an acupuncture point)
After the acupuncture is finished, imagine that the light needle slowly dissipates heat ([Warm Needle Moxibustion](http://leihao0.github.io/2013/09/11/%E6%B8%A9%E9%92%88%E7% 81%B8/))

Slowly, the little mage fell into a dream safely
