entry.title: Clear water and blue sky
entry.content:
Two black spots appeared in the distant skyline. After slowly expanding, there were two people, oh, two magisters.
Their flying speed is extremely fast, and supporting such speed shows that the magic power of the two is high

Just listen to the magician α telling β that if you speed up like this, even if you catch up with the deadline, there will be little magic left. Why don’t we suppress the magic value and go to Stargate?
β took a look at α, continued to fly forward, for a long time, said slowly, in case of failure
α I can’t help but shudder, I don’t know if it’s stimulated by the high altitude too cold

I caught it, after β said, threw a bottle of soylent to α, and then silently drank it to supplement his magic

The so-called StarGate is a tool for long-distance teleportation. Although magicians can also pass and effortlessly, it is helpless that Stargates have been occupied by Muggles, and before entering, the guard will use a similar torch order. Obsidian test whether the passer is carrying a lethal weapon
Although 99% of the mages are kind, the magic stones they carry with them will make the holy fire scream non-stop, and the mages who reach the level of the mages are covered with magic all over their bodies. Even without any props, they will inspire obsidian
If you don’t evacuate in time or even make a desperate move, the state-level armed forces will appear in a few minutes, grab you and close the small black house, and since then, the world will disappear.

When approaching the city, they quickly lowered to below 1500 sea level, so as not to be mistaken for UFOs and shot down by the imperial capital’s missile defense system.

The imperial capital is surrounded by mountains on three sides
The western mountains are [Taihang Mountains](https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=%E5%A4%AA%E8%A1%8C%E5%B1%B1%E8%84%89&hl_tag=textlink&tn= SE_hldp01350_v6v6zkg6)’s northeast remnant
The mountains in the north and northeast are [Yanshan Mountains](https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=%E7%87%95%E5%B1%B1%E5%B1%B1%E8%84%89&hl_tag =textlink&tn=SE_hldp01350_v6v6zkg6) of the western branch.

entry.title: Tips for rewriting iOS apps
entry.content:
I finished my Gap year and went to my current company last fall.

As a newcomer, I did not do much in the first month. There is a software engineer from AMAP with 10 years of experience. Every time I have something to ask him, he will explain in depth, and patiently ask him to inspire me. But at the same time, I also found thousands of lines of Copy & Paste code in the project. Yes, I used CLOC to count and found that there are nearly 20,000 rows in total.

Since Objective-C is an overly verbose and cumbersome programming language (which means you have to write dozens of lines of code to implement the same function, and this function may only have one line in Ruby), the calculation for this project is reasonable of. But copy and paste should always be avoided. To make matters worse, I see global variables and magic numbers everywhere.

This is weird, isn’t it? If you are a programmer with 10 years of experience, can easily handle pointers, and have a deep understanding of computer systems, why not pay attention to the code style? After all, we need to prepare for adding new members and new features to the team at any time.

He said that most of the code was written by himself and that bug fixes were quick. However, he will go to a startup company of a friend next month. So, he just left, and the code of Anqu. 😭😭.

to be continued…

entry.title: Summer Ends
entry.content:
Summer Ends
This is a good piece of music, because summer is really over.

During this year, I wrote less, read less, and felt bad. Before that, I was in my gap period, and I was productive and efficient, and my heart flowed. So I started thinking about why and tried to return.

Because I went to Gopher China in April and met an IT farmer. CTO, tell him, maybe I’m in a bottleneck period.

But now it’s September, and the summer is over. I have stayed in Beijing for at most a year, and I am still stuck in this popular state.

I want to figure it out

model

First of all, the lifestyle (the contract of survival) is not like Hangzhou. When I was in Hangzhou, I could rent a unit near the company, I could walk to work, and I had my own bathroom in my room, so it bothered me. But in Beijing, if I still use the same model, I will have to live in an old unit, which is older than me! To make matters worse, I have to live with my neighbors and share everything from the bathroom to the kitchen. So you have to pray that your neighbor is good.
For me, as an inner person, I just want to live alone.

Once I adjusted the scale of this business, I immediately rented a new unit. I will move out at the end of this month, but after a year has passed, I never come back.

English

I used to read at least 10 books every month, but for the last few months when I narrowed down to the English version, the numbers have dropped so drastically that I almost never finished reading a book in a month.

No book makes me feel sick, no input, no output. This is also an important reason why I no longer post blogs and the “Little Master” series. Needless to say, I force all my new blogs to be written in English.

Procrastination

This seems to be a common problem. But after seeing too many GTDs, I found a health circle based on polyphasic sleep. I can make more than 16 pomodoroes a day.
After returning to work in the company, I only do what I want to do. I think my efficiency is still very high.

Although I have outsourced the application instead of DIY, preparing for IELTS and working hard is still a big challenge for me, not only because I don’t know the start date, but also my colleagues cannot understand it. I have to write nearly 70% of the code in the main project, and even rewrite some functions. I want to find a way to manage our new team (currently I like a TL assistant).

So, all the apps I used have been returned, and I think it really improved my situation.

Slack

Not talking about Slack, although I will write some code for our CI based on its API in the future.

I found some things that I ran away, but I will work harder to face it in the future. For example, I hope my colleagues will write more, read translated books, cut off and so on.

Therefore, I dare not hope anymore.

In this way, winter is here.

entry.title: Harvard Positive Psychology
entry.content:
I watched this course during the open period and took a lot of screenshots. This course helped me a lot. Because I cleaned up my old photos by the way today, it’s time to turn them into text.

Psychological maturity is about the ability to willingly shift perspective.

Goal

The step on the way to a destination that you deem valuable that is important to you.

So end goal can often be liberating.

One of the reasons is because love, and especially lust and passion wears over time.

They are also extremely sensitive, wise, way beyond their years, saintly, generous, benevolent

Exercise

The wonder drug: 30 minutes of physical exercise, 4 times a week.
At least 15 minutes of mindful exercise 6 or 7 times a week.

I have so many things to do.

Exercise should be the last thing to go. It is an investment.

You may lose that 45 minutes. But you’ll gain so much more. It’s such a good investment. Your memory actually gets better when you exercise. So you’ll get more buck for the bank in terms of time you study; your creativity and concentration levels go up

Whether you have ADD or not, especially if you have.

Relationship

People stay together out of a sense of duty, out of habit, because they think this is their lot in life.

A lack of alternative

“do unto others what you would unto yourself.”

“do not do unto yourself what you would not do unto others.”

Love

“Perfect love is rare indeed - for to be a lover will require that you continually have the subtlety of the very wise, the flexibility of the child, the sensitivity of the artist, the understanding of the philosopher, the acceptance of the saint, the tolerance of the scholar and the fortitude of the certain.”

But while perfect love doesn’t exist, true love dose. True love exists between imperfect humans.

I will find that right person. I don’t believe that. It’s simply not true. It’s not the matter of faith.

So what makes relationship unique? It’s not finding that one right person. Once again it’s cultivating that one chosen relationship. It’s by virtue of working together, of being together, of spending time together, of dedicating one another. That’s how we create the one chosen relationship. That’s how we create the one chosen relationship.

entry.title: When a company become bigger
entry.content:
Doing the right thing is more important than doing the right thing. The previous sentence means that you have your own arguments and reasons. The correct ** measures your own justice, whether you can be responsible for your actions. But when you enter a big company, your manager cares about whether you can do things right. This is also the reason why startups are more powerful.

People are born social animals. If a group has fewer than 140 people, it can manage it by itself. Because everyone knows what others are doing, it is easy to have a common view of someone, and no one can be lazy. But when the team gets bigger, fog and shadows appear. Your abilities and abilities depend to a large extent on your manager, not based on your real contributions.

Most companies have hundreds of employees, which is why office politics is so common in large companies. How to deal with office politics is paramount. After all, this is related to your salary and promotion. If you want to do this, the best way is to become a politician. Everyone knows what is going on, but no one points out. Just like the emperor’s new clothes, the risk is that you might lose yourself.

This is why a good startup company is so attractive, but one day, the company will grow bigger because of its excellence. More and more strangers join, not everyone is friendly, if you still be yourself and don’t care about politics, it may cause inappropriateness, rumors will be everywhere, and when the new year comes , You have not been promoted for no reason.

The neutral way is to work like a robot without sharing any emotions and feelings, which will make your colleagues feel a certain professionalism. The disadvantage is that there is no chance to be regarded as a friend, but for people who have changed companies (no longer a startup), it is easier to accept than the previous company.

entry.title: Go home for the new year
entry.content:
On the last day of 2016, most people in the Imperial Capital went home
The little mage boringly scans the discount website in the low-rent housing
Suddenly Q, who hadn’t moved for ten thousand years, suddenly broke the calm. The little mage looked at it and turned out to be a goddess
When he clicked on his head tremblingly, he saw four words: I am married

sudden

Going home for the New Year has become a pain for the younger generation
As a second element, the little mage naturally knows the family calculation problem

If your parents live for another 30 years, if you go home once a year on average for 5 days each time, minus the time for entertainment, eating, sleeping, etc., you can only stay with your parents for about 24 hours, and a total of 720 hours for 30 years , Almost a month

In addition, according to the “Law on Protection of Rights and Interests of the Elderly”

Family members should be concerned about the spiritual needs of the elderly, and must not ignore or neglect the elderly. Family members living separately from the elderly should visit or greet the elderly frequently

In order to avoid facing prosecution, the little mage tries to meet his parents twice a year

But in time, it will stagger the Spring Festival and other holidays
Because one holiday left a huge psychological shadow on the little mage:
I thought that it was the Ching Ming Festival in 2013. When the little mage asked the goddess to go to West Lake to play, he was shocked by the crowd when he went to Sudi after passing the music courtyard and wind lotus.
At that time, the little mage was standing at the entrance of Sudi, but he could only see the people on both sides and could not appreciate the slightest view of the beauty of West Lake. The little mage did not consider that the main reason was that he threw the pot anger on holidays because of his shortness

The Spring Festival is the first-class citizen in all festivals. Due to the traditions of the previous generation, it was asked by the seven aunts and eight aunts about the salary and the target to ask about a good opportunity to have children
And now that the next generation has appeared in this world, red envelopes are naturally indispensable. While the meager year-end bonus is given away, the face also has to smile: “Ah, this child is so beautiful.”
What’s even more exaggerated is that Guo Jia has now fully opened up the second child, and time comes Double is ready

During the Spring Festival last year, the little wizards used [Thirty-Six Strategies of War](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%89%E5%8D%81%E5%85%AD%E8% AE%A1) in the chain meter (25)
As a magician, he naturally knows how to buy a ticket, so he concealed himself (1), and deliberately delayed for five minutes before going to wait for work (4)
Later, he informed his parents that “the ticket is not available”, and then tried to get in (16), saying that even if the ticket is 8x, he must go home
Naturally, the little mage’s Baba Ma Ma was shocked by this bitter trick (24), and immediately said that you don’t need to come back…

With last year’s precedent, it’s much easier to replicate last year’s success this year

Until he saw a poster that exposed the truth:

Going home during the New Year is the winner of life

entry.title: High Templar Mage
entry.content:
During the year of Little Mage Gap, he experienced various fusion blows
However, the most annoying one is technology selection

As early as in the Academy of Magic (2011), the little wizard wanted to learn iOS. After looking at it, he asked for money and turned to Android.

At that time, the little mage still used the plague to die. I just learned that there is another operating system called Linux. The portable tool Nokia occupies a large area. Naturally, there is no concept of . I only know that Jobs on the news died of cancer, which is a change. Who lost the world
After I saw one of the three major lectures Stay Hungry. Stay Foolish, it was already two years later.

PS: The other two are [The Fringe Benefits of Failure, and the Importance of Imagination] by JK Rowling in Harvard (http://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2008/06/text-of-jk- rowling-speech/), Randy Pausch’s Last Lecture in CMU are all thought-provoking and good videos that are worth pondering

After watching several classes on Android, it was 886, and there was no special reason, but the interest of playing C was not triggered in the process.

In the blink of an eye, the school recruits, due to the remoteness and not many companies, the preaching is basically at the University of Science and Technology and the Joint University. The young master has a degree of 233, so he naturally suffers discrimination.
After dozens of miserable defeats, I was finally moved to heaven. A NASDAQ gave an offer, which is affiliated to the pre-research department. The location is still a dream paradise.
The little mage had no tears and immediately signed a contract

HR MM said that the company is undergoing transformation, from C fart to Android
Ever since, the little mage who is afraid of entering and leaving the job, in his senior year, once again bit the bullet to learn Android

The twisted melon is not sweet, history repeats itself, and 886

The pre-research department originally imagined by the little mage was a place similar to the academy described in “The Beauty of Programming”
However… Most of the time, the Philosopher’s Stone (Jar) is made from Java and incorporated into the source element. After that, the little mage summons a modified Android with Ubontu, and then burns it to each place by the live siege lion. High-level simulation

Having said so much, it can be summarized in two practical words: shanzhai

And a simple effect of Android requires a lot of Java, plus Java’s own characteristics remain unchanged, leading to the birth of various shooting modes, and the little mage is exhausted.

So looking back now, I don’t know if it’s Shanzhai or Java. It’s really bad.
Until now, the little mage still has all kinds of dissatisfaction with the spells that this mage world uses most frequently all the year round (* ￣︿￣)

PS: Lambda and functional are provided in 8, which looks much more concise

More than half a year later, the little mage accidentally discovered the python class of the gully. For the little mage who only had contact with the CC ass shell Java, It’s a cardiotonic shot

During the Gap Year, the little mage found a better ruby. After finishing the question on Codecademy, he just felt that it was inconvenient to watch the sunburst on the phone, and the official statement was not As a PC terminal, I want to make one myself

However, the appearance of 🐶🐺 disrupted the little mage’s plan

PS: Ruby is a weakly-typed dynamic language, that is, different types can be assigned, and they can change themselves at runtime, so there is often a line of code that does hundreds of lines of things for others
Yukihiro Matsumoto also mentioned in “Program World” that the primary goal of Ruby design is: cool

But the trouble is that in order to ensure correctness, we must constantly use tests to constrain
The result is that the longer and longer the test is, the more it will be written
Generally small and beautiful, but not suitable for large-scale collaboration
Strongly typed static languages can detect many errors at compile time

Golang itself is strongly typed, but provides some convenient syntactic sugar
The most shocking thing is that when there was a lot of demand, the author first wrote formatter
This is one of my favorite features, it saves much time for code formatting.
Speaking of the first Gopher🇨🇳, the author also came to Shanghai and talked about the realization of this Dongdong

Even though ruby has all the benefits, after the little mage has tested the two spells 🍐, he embraced 🐶🐺

At this time, most of the planned gap time has passed
If the sauce goes down, the little mage may have gone to the full stack of siege lions
However, a decisive event occurred before, switching the branch lit by the magic stack

For some unknown reason, the little mage after choosing 🐶🐺, without any income, actually upgraded his magical equipment, replacing his father’s plague with his own rMBP

After completing the Demo-level website, the little mage bought a certificate and was surprised by Xcode when he came up. Σ( ° △ °|||)︴, I thought of binding the button to respond to events on Android back then, and got a bunch of code, which I used in Xcode Ctrl + drag line is done in this elegant way

Later, in the process of Master Stanford White Beard’s cs193p, Head First iPhone Development, iOS 7 Programming Cookbook,
The word “artwork” often comes to mind

After that, everything went smoothly

Full stack out of Archon since ancient times

The little mage avoids this way, how many have his own little abacus
The main reason is that the full stack is too tiring, in a sense, it is all dry
And this also means that leisure time is infinitely compressed

The smaller the ability, the smaller the responsibility
In the final analysis, Little Master is just a good kid who likes to read in his free time.

But he is too naive

On the way to the advanced temple mage, >> these pits

WWDC

100+/year, the little mage’s feet are shaking when downloading
However, in Stockholm, I will clap my hands excitedly when I see Cool’s technology.

Adapted version

Little Mage has been tortured by different Android screens, stupidly thinking that the iPhone is only one screen size
After a year…

Swift pains

Various bugs, including the built-in system…

The most tragic thing is that the little mage found another sinkhole

Design

In the past, the little mage was blind, like fungus listening to IE 800, and did not distinguish between color difference pixels
Gradually improved after entering the pit, but the understanding of Design is still in the category of Shooting Lion

As a result, Frederick Brooks, the author of “The Myth of Human Moon”, published the book The Design of Design and patted it on the face of the little mage, and the author of another Designing Design with a similar name was known for his indifference to his mother 🐔 Advisory Committee member Japan Print Design Master Kenya Hara

At this point, there are three more branches on the little mage’s technology tree

  • Sketch
  • photography
  • Keynote

Fortunately, these are what the little mage longs for
After all, what made the little mage determined to enter the pit was that the feeling of “art” could be realized on a cold machine.

This is crying, isn’t it?

entry.title: Observer
entry.content:
It seems that my observer is back.

When I finished reading Being Friendly with Time, I began to know the mental model, and it took me a month to finish reading that simple book.

When I am grateful that my mental model has improved, “Power Now”. The Spiritual Enlightenment Guide declares that the mind is a trap. The predictive ability of the mind only focuses on the future. It prevents you from knowing the power of the present. These different arguments puzzled me at the time. As I continued reading, the concept of observer appeared in my eyes.

The first time I heard that the observer was in my university. I read this word from dark forest. After I read a book on quantum mechanics, it fascinated me even more.

There is also a concept of observer in psychology. Not only is it different from the above idea (Observer (Quantum Physics), it is also different from the Design Pattern ([Observer Mode](https ://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Observer_pattern)). When I finished Think on These Things a year later, I tried to build an observer about myself.
Because usually, when you see others doing, things will be clearer. Weaknesses and blind spots are obvious, and you will find better solutions.

Fortunately, I achieved this goal during the gap period. There are two versions of me, one acting and one observer.
I don’t think the observer is equal to the superego, but it is clearly the guardian of the ego.

But when I came to work in Beijing a year and a half ago, all the works I built were ruined. My observer is gone. I have some new bed habits, such as watching my watch frequently, which exposed my anxiety and tension.

When I do something wrong, I feel exhausted. Fortunately, I had a long vacation and I went to my parents’ house. Although that city is not an outfield, it at least got me out of the super city. In addition, I had a deep discussion with my parents about dreams. They feel very helpless because our family is poor and the hotel prices are constantly rising. They don’t understand why I behaved so strangely.

After 10 days, my vacation expired and I felt very relaxed.

American Emperor-0-0

lottery

Little Mage wrote Swift for more than a year in 15 years and was told to watch WWDC session
Somehow, I don’t know what WWDC is. I checked it and clicked on a section
I was surprised to find that even though English is not good, I can do it with a guess.
Thinking of the Android tutorials back then, completely in the mist
So I was full of good feelings in an instant, and I went through most of the videos of the year and benefited a lot.

Later learned that as long as there is a developer account, Visa/MC credit card, you can draw a lottery
Register at official website at the beginning of March every year. There is only one week, so please don’t miss it

Afterwards, whether to go or not, deduct the money first

Tickets are also forbidden to transfer and can only be sent to other developer accounts of the same company
In short, don’t even think about refunding the lottery, so think about it clearly

The San Francisco Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Pride Celebration (formerly known as International Lesbian Freedom Day, Gay Freedom Day, Christopher Street West), commonly known as “San Francisco Pride”, is held in San Francisco, California at the end of June every year Parades and festivals to celebrate lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) people and their allies. Jiuquhua Street

The most well-known section of Lombard Street is the “Jiuquhua Street” on the Russian hills. Jiuquhua Street is the section between Hyde Street and Leeviworth Street. This is because it is the most curved street in the United States. There are a total of eight sharp bends in a short stretch of road, and only one-way traffic from Hyde Street to Leeviworth Street and downhill is allowed, while the San Francisco cable car runs on China Street. -The Hyde Street Line passes through the starting point of this section (that is, the location of the highest point at the intersection). This section of the very steep street was originally a straight line, but considering the safety of traffic and pedestrians, this section of the road was changed to the current curve in 1923. [2] This design was first proposed by the owner Carl Henry. [3] This design aims to use length in exchange for space to slow down the slope size (27%) along the line. [4] The entire Jiuquhua Street is 600 feet (180 meters) long, and the straight section is 412.5 feet (125.7 meters) long, and the pavement is paved with bricks to increase friction. The starting point is marked with a maximum speed limit of 5 mph (8 km/h).

The name and neighborhood features of San Francisco’s Fisherman’s Wharf come from the mid to late 19th century, when Italian immigrant fishermen took advantage of the influx of people brought by the gold rush to the early days of the city. Most Italian immigrant fishermen settled in the North Beach area near the pier and fished for local delicacies and Danji crabs. From then until today, the dock is still the center of the San Francisco fishing fleet. Although the area was re-developed as a tourist attraction in the 1970s and 1980s, there are still many active fishermen and their fleets.

Any exposed part of the body–including earlobes, scalp, and lips–can be burned. Even covered areas can be burned, for example, if your clothes have loose weaves that allow ultraviolet (UV) light to pass through. Your eyes are extremely sensitive to ultraviolet rays from the sun and may be burned

When UV photons hit the skin, they damage the DNA in human cells. It does so by breaking the ordered bonds between the four nucleotides of adenosine, thymine and guanine. The so-called formation of thymine dimers means that when two thymine nucleotides are combined together, the shape of the entire DNA molecule becomes imbalanced.
Cells with messy DNA usually commit suicide, a process called apoptosis. The cells have received so much radiation that they undergo apoptosis.

entry.title: Nothing to say
entry.content:
I haven’t written anything for a long time. Perhaps writing entirely in English is an obstacle.

Too much happened in these two months.

First of all, the D-round financing of my company failed.

Our CTO had to reduce the number of programmers designing apartments by more than one-third, reducing three applications to one. Almost half of the programmers left. It seems that everything is back to the B round happy time.
However, some things can never go back.

My project iterated to version 1.6 and was cut off. So, no coding job, after that, I went to San Francisco to participate in WWDC16.

Second, do what you like.

Therefore, programming is my job, and it is my gap year after the iOS developer.

When I first started working, I subscribed to many technology blogs, but they never caught my attention. At the same time, I lost interest in everything and didn’t want to see anyone.

It may be caused by my lack of real hobbies. My only hobby was programming.

However, after going to Beijing, the most breathtaking super city in the world, two years ago, I finally had a little extravagant time to relax my body and spirit.

Third, after returning from SFO, I did readjust the importance of exercise. In developed countries, almost every elite will exercise.

When I saw the blue sky everywhere, the wide Pacific Ocean, the green leaves under the sun, and the houses on the mountains covered by mist.
I know there is a wonderful world in the world.
Maintaining your own heat is the most important, and everything else is secondary.

It seems that the bank’s website has really done some work in terms of security.

entry.title: Sync macOS ssh config with iCloud
entry.content:
As a developer, I sometimes have to restore the backup due to the “beta” system.

Fortunately, most of the data is on the server these days. Not only Safari, photos, calendar, Note, reminders, but other applications also use iCloud storage. This is a major advancement. I just need to reinstall the system and re-download the app from the App Store and brew shell.

But ssh, configuration, etc. settings are very annoying. Also, I may lose my private key.

So I created a new folder named “macOS” in the iCloud Drive folder, and copied all the files without “. “, for example: .gitconfig ~> gitconfig.

Any cloud drive (such as Dropbox) can do this, but.
Considering privacy and this letter written by Tim Cook Information for Customers

iCloud is my choice 😊

entry.title: How to add Xib on StoryBoard
entry.content:
In 1975, the classic software project management book “Mythical Man Month. In Essays on Software Engineering, Fred Brooks pointed out that no matter which programming language is chosen, a professional developer writes an average of 10 lines of code (LoC) per day.

StoryBoard is conducive to saving lines of code and improving efficiency. Apple will strongly recommend it at every WWDC and continue to improve it.

I don’t understand why there are still many team leaders who ask their poor programmers to write UIView programmatically.

Maybe they think that some CustomViews are very reusable, and if they are pasted into StoryBoard, they will cause unnecessary side effects.

Therefore, the main idea of this solution is to condense CustomViews into Xib and then add it to StoryBoard.

This requires several steps, because Apple does not directly support it.

  1. Add an IBDesignable CustomView.Swift and CustomView.Xib
  2. Set CustomView.xib->Placeholder->File Owner->Custom Class to CustomView
  3. Create a new CustomView programmatically and load the root view from CustomView.Xib
  4. Add a root view with equal width and height in the horizontal and vertical centers on the CustomView of the init function
  5. Now you can drag View to StoryBoard and set its class to CustomView, which can generate a snapshot for preview

But the subviews of CustomView (such as UIButton) cannot be connected to ViewController@IBOutlet

Delegate or Block can solve this problem.

As for me, I suggest the Block method, because I have used Delegate for half a year and found

  • ViewController will have too many delegates
  • delegate = self must write viewDidLoad and sometimes =nil in viewDidDisappear

The code for Block will be less and simpler.

Below is the example, which may reduce your time.

entry.title: How do Chinese learn English
entry.content:
Like 99% of Chinese students, I hate to memorize words in cruel ways. When we were young, we naturally learned our mother tongue without any pain.

So, when I was in a poor elementary school, I never remembered a word.

Actually, the fact is that I cannot remember words. Believe it or not, no matter how hard I try, I just can’t remember. Every time it’s my turn to write on the blackboard in this row, I have to look carefully left and right, copying word by word.

As a teenager at the time, I was curious, why could they do it? The method must be incompatible with my brain.

Fortunately, I saw another method in a grid book where a former champion announced that she didn’t memorize words. All she did was repeat NCE aloud more than 100 times.

Humph, it’s really good, so I tried it. This method helped me a lot because it allowed me to get a pretty good score in the college entrance examination, and I passed CET6 in college, even I sometimes know it. What are you reading.

Before IELTS, all early English tests were just a joke.

And there is another blind spot that I only realized recently. Exams are exams. You should master the key points and leave as soon as possible.

Before that, I firmly believed that as long as my true level was improved, I would be able to do the exam just like doing test papers every day, without extra effort.

But in fact, this requires a very high quality of people, far exceeding the requirements of the examination, this is an endless road.

14 years have passed since I first came into contact with English. After communicating with the dormitory a few months ago, I feel that I have only taken a small step.

Now I know that language is more like a human instinct. When the baby grows up, our brain neurons will be washed, because according to evolutionary psychology, our ancestors did not need to learn another language when they were young.

But we are now in a modern society. As far as I know, there are only two methods that sound reasonable, and more importantly, economics.

  1. Use your English
  2. Lai Shixiong American Phonetic Mark
  3. ESLPOD
  4. American accent training
  5. Read at least 10 original books every year
  6. A little pragmatic learning English experience
  7. Learn 600 GRE words every day
  8. Repeat according to the Ebbinghaus forgetting curve.
  9. Intensive reading
  10. Past papers

Now you see, the irony is that Article 2 kicked me to the point: I want to remember words!

But this time at least one thing is different. I chose it according to my free will.

entry.title: Time capsule on PandoraBox
entry.content:
My “OpenWRT” is “PandoraBox” and my router is “Mi mini”.
These are some subtle differences from the official wiki.

software

System -> Software -> Configuration

Adjust all text to:

Then, ssh to your PandoraBox

To your browser

System -> Software -> Actions -> Download and install package

  • netatalk
  • avahi-daemon
  • kmod-usb-storage
  • kmod-fs-hfsplus
  • block-mount

Don’t try “opkg install” as wiki said, otherwise you will get an error message.

Format and Mount

Insert the BackUp hard drive into the Mi mini

Use blkid to find your sda, this is mine

Format as ext4 (Mi mini failed to mount hfsplus, so I tried ext4 as exchange)

To browser

System -> Mount Points -> Mount Points -> Add

Select the UUID you get by blkid mount to /mnt/TimeMachine, remember the size xxx MB, save

You may see /dev/sda3 /mnt/TimeMachine in Mounted file systems

Then to your ssh

Netatalk

Change all text to:

Replace all text with. (Fill in the xxx you got before, which is MiB)

Avahi

Change all text to:

Replace all text with:

To your browser

System -> Startup Enable

  • afpd
  • avahi-daemon

Restart the router

Go to Mac, System Preferences -> Time Machine -> Select Disk -> Available Disks -> on "Time Capsule", you can see TimeMachine

entry.title: Use UIStoryboardSegue to customize the presentation transition of UIViewController
entry.content:
The most popular way is UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning

In order to do this, you must:

  • Create a new subclass, which can be called “XXXTransitioning”, inherited from “NSObject”, and implement the two functions of the protocol “UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning”.
  • Then:
    1. Create a new instance of “XXXTransitioning” in “ViewController”.
    2. Set transitioningDelegate = self.
    3. Use UIViewControllerTransitioningDelegate to extend “ViewController” and implement it.

dismiss

I noticed that Storyboard Segue has a Custom

That’s it, no need to code delegate and Extension. Simple and clean:)

entry.title: Software accelerates your learning
entry.content:
Podcasts and videos are a typical online learning method, but they are numerous, and collection is human nature, and how to increase this speed becomes even more necessary.

Normally, people can process their native language at high speed.
As for me, 2x is very comfortable, 3x is acceptable, and 4x has subtitles.

Desktop computer

A few years ago, when I was still in college, I used Windows. KMPlayer is the best of all types of video players, because other players may have sound distortion when they are replaced. Later, the author left the company and re-written a new one in C++ and renamed it PotPlayer

On macOS, Movist is my first choice. It is also from South Korea. Needless to say, its splendor and simplicity, it provides 4 times the audio tracks without much loss.
Other players such as MPV, although provide unlimited rate limit (yes, you can accelerate to any speed you like) and open source, but if you want to change the default settings, every Modify ~/.config/mpv/mpv.conf every time.

Mobile version

The good news is that Podcasts on the iPhone already have twice the function (the strange thing is that iTunes Podcasts do not), and many learning apps also have this useful function.

But I haven’t found any application that provides more than 2 times the functionality.

According to 

If the audio is a file-based media, it seems that it can be done just by changing player.rate = 3.0. Will this cause distortion?

If one day I have time, I will try.

Three-year return visa

Unlike the U.S. visa, you cannot make an appointment by yourself and can only be processed through a designated travel agency

  • After tax 25W+
  • Taobao mails passports and tax bills and other materials

The whole process is all by mail, I thought I would lose the item
I didn’t expect it to be done smoothly in two weeks

Business class

Most Asian airlines have the same business class and first class

For example, this Boeing 787 model has only four seats in a row 💺
There are windows on both sides, no neighbors, couple seat in the middle
1 The area occupied by business class seats == 6 economy class

Because the fare for ANA’s activities is only twice as expensive, it’s quite a bargain.

Provide hot towels on board, follow-up champagne and various beverages
Lunch can be reserved in advance for Japanese or Western food
The tableware was replaced with heavy porcelain plates and metal knives and forks 🍴

The best part is that the seat can be flattened 180 degrees by pressing the small button
WC 🚾 Never again
The children I touched were also polite and did not cry all the way

The roar of the engine is also much smaller, the default headset 🎧 is Bose QC 25

Because it only takes 3 hours to fly directly to Tokyo

The basic process is
Get on the plane for a meal and drink
See your name
Lie down and sleep
almost there

The overall experience is great

But the back of the business class is empty
Once worried, I will go to Japan next time
All Nippon Airways, will it close down?

Haneda airport

Observation deck

There is a huge observation deck on the roof of Haneda Airport
You can watch the aircraft take off and land, and feel the engine roar that is more real than IMAX

Hotel Gracery Shinjuku

I live in Shinjuku Station because of convenience
Unexpectedly, it was Godzilla Hotel
There is a big head on it
I usually see piracy in China
I’m not used to listening to genuine ones

Next to it is Kabukicho
Ichiran Ramen is delicious
At 11 o’clock in the evening, I went downstairs for supper and there was a long line

Kani Doraku & Fenghaku

Japan is so clean
No, it should be said to be clean
This apartment is reminiscent of
Miss Kobayashi’s Dragon Maid

I feel so happy to live here
I don’t know how much the rent is

National New Museum

Visiting an art gallery for the first time 🎨
Totally incomprehensible
But isn’t this the purpose of visiting the museum?

Came out and saw a poster
I don’t know if it’s an advertisement or a charity event

Roppongi Hills Observatory Tokyo City View

Can look around Tokyo

This piece is a group of interconnected buildings
Different from playing open sandbox games
Here you can enter the store through the model

This time I finally realized what my dad said when I was young
Standing on the Oriental Pearl Tower and looking down
Cars are like matchboxes and people are like ants

Although it’s only June, the weather is already hot
I saw a man-made fountain that can be sprayed with water and spray to assist in heat dissipation

The interior of the building has always had a sense of design
I also met a couple holding hands

Then went to eat real wagyu yakiniku
For the first time, I experienced the melting in the mouth

The most amazing thing is the price
I didn’t dare to have a cup of coffee here to see the scenery
Habitual thinking thought it would be as expensive as a floor
Actually only a few dollars more expensive than downstairs

Yoyogi park

Yoyogi Park is located at this location. On December 19, 1910, Captain Tokugawa Yoshitoshi made the first successful powered airplane flight in Japan. The area later became a parade ground. Beginning in September 1945, this site has housed a military barracks called “Washington Heights” for American officers during the Allied occupation of Japan
In 2014, Tokyo experienced the worst dengue outbreak in 100 years, and it was the first recorded case in 70 years, with nearly 200 confirmed cases.

Unexpectedly, there was an outbreak of dengue fever

I used to go out with 1.5L arteries
There are vending machines everywhere in Japan, so you don’t need to bring water
The only embarrassing thing is that there is no trash can, and I can only hold the bottle after drinking, looking forward to the next vending machine with a recycling bin

WC also provides LGBT 🏳️‍🌈

Passing by Kaminarimon, there is a small train exhibition poster next to it

Sumida Aquarium

Under the skytree is an aquarium

Nemo from Finding Nemo?
Hermit crab, lobster, squid
Undersea power…

🐠 🦞 🦑

Employees sweeping the floor in the aquarium

Of course they came out as souvenirs
All kinds of furry undersea animals that are so cute
I almost couldn’t help buying one back as a pillow

Attack on Titan

Just in time for the Attack on Titan theme
Unfortunately, I haven’t seen it
I don’t know who these two are
No waves

After adding this anime
Fortunately, I patted Captain and Allen.

Tokyo Sky Tree

It turns out that this tower is not only built for Gaohe scenic spots, but also a radio station.

The tower is the main TV and broadcast station in the Kanto region; the older Tokyo Tower is surrounded by high-rise buildings, so it can no longer provide complete digital terrestrial TV broadcast coverage. The Skytree building was completed on Day, February 29, 2012
Tokyo Skytree is also similar to Japan’s historic 5-story pagoda. [11] The bottom of the tower has a structure similar to a tripod; starting from a height of about 350 m (1,150 ft) or more, the structure of the tower is cylindrical, allowing panoramic views of the river and the city. [12] There is an observatory that can accommodate 2,000 people at 350 m (1,150 ft) and an observatory that can accommodate 900 people at 450 m (1,480 ft). [13] The upper observatory has a spiral glass-covered skywalk, and visitors can ascend to the highest point of the upper platform at the last 5 meters. A part of the glass floor allows visitors to directly view the street below.
The tower is earthquake-proof and includes a central shaft made of reinforced concrete. The main internal pillar is connected to the first external tower structure 125 meters (410 feet) above the ground. From there up to 375 meters (1,230 feet), the pillars are fixed to the tower by shock absorbers, which act as cushions during the earthquake. Additional elasticity is obtained through “additional quality control mechanisms” (or tuned mass dampers)-a damping system that, in the event of an earthquake, will be out of sync with the structure of the building to keep the center of gravity as close to the tower as possible bottom of. [15] According to the designer, the damper can absorb 50% of the energy in an earthquake

I have a fear of heights
I wonder if it’s an illusion
Feel the tower sway slightly

Not afraid
Actually trembling
After going up, the body keeps walking inside
Take up the courage to look at the glass outside

The glass floor at the highest point is okay, a bit unreal
Tentatively stepped on a foot 🦶

Return

After I went back, I took advantage of the hotel and threw away all kinds of garbage.
No trash can really hurts 😂

Looked out the window
A good time

Then take a taxi 🚖 to Haneda Airport
10w yen 💴 that’s it

I heard that the elderly here drive taxis 🚕
Witness how to bear the heart to let Grandpa carry luggage 🧳

It’s still early after checking in, so I came to the ANA First Class Lounge
Unlimited supply of fruits, milk, drinks, bread and cakes
🍉 🥛 🥤 🍞 🍰
I really missed the shower
🛀 😂

I saw Mount Fuji on the plane 🗻
Because I’m full in the lounge
I had to sleep flat 💤

Then it ended this first short 🇯🇵 Japan trip

I really like the cleanliness and order of Japan
The shoes I bought are still like the ones I just bought until I leave

Three-year round trip visa
Will come again next time

✌️✌️✌️

Naples

In the evening, leave Naples and go to Palermo by boat

The suspended lifebuoy and lifeboat can not help but remind people of the Titanic

Actually this ship is much bigger than the Titanic
Can handle the entire parking lot next to the car
In the calm Mediterranean again, there are no icebergs, don’t worry about sinking ships
You can also see this huge cruise ship on Google Map
The cabin is small but has a separate toilet, and can also be hot and rainy

The shaking cabin and the siren are very hypnotic

Struggling to get up the next day to watch the sunrise 🌄

It was not there yet
No time for pincers
No waves shrink
Seagull flying backwards

🌊 🐦

Sicily

Palermo

My friends rented a sea view room by the sea
About three floors, there is an echo
The decor is very sicilian

Not far from Al Cantastorie
Although the score is very low, and the seaside smell is very strong
But this lobster spaghetti is really delicious
I never encountered this practice again in my subsequent journey

  • B&B Theater Theater
  • Four Songs Square (Palermo)
  • Palermo Cathedral

Just like a sticky note with scarlet letters
A few streets next to the residence, you need to be careful to step on the shit everywhere
Greatly affected the play experience

Of course, in order to avoid unnecessary trouble, the sticky note was secretly torn off by another friend before leaving

But I can’t stand it. Sicily’s capital Palermo has become a shit town.

Taormina

Fed up after shit
The summary analysis should be due to the Airbnb address
Unsubscribed from all next Airbnb
Hurry up and book the Eurostar Monteduro and Rome Marriott Park

Wait until Taormina
I feel happy instantly because I live comfortably
Play UNO by the pool at night

Ice cream

Italian ice cream is really special
Wander all the way and eat all the way, buy when you come across
I’m afraid I can’t eat it again

Ionian pearls

There is a narrow path, the sea is constantly scouring, you can walk to the island
Seeing others back and forth is like walking on water
I tried it myself and sinked steadily
When the sea washed up, there were signs of slipping

Supreme Court

Fly back to Rome
Passing by the Supreme Court
It really has historical characteristics


Arrived at Marriott found that the facilities are a bit poor
There is no free Wi-Fi, and additional wool is required for activation
The Book of Mormon and the New Testament are in the drawer

entry.title: Neural Networks Representation
entry.content:
Neural Networks Representation

1.3 Vectorizing Logistic Regression

All right, I already used the Vectorized approach and without any loops last exercise.

1.4 One-vs-all Classification

the key points here are:

  • for is needed here to loop from 1 to num_labels
  • all_theta should assigned with (i,:), otherwise it will be a one-dimensional vector.

1.4.1 One-vs-all Prediction

the max function will return a two-dimensional vector, m is the value, and p is the max index in that row.

2 Neural Networks

Finally, I touched the Neural Networks with so many classes after. 😳

The are trained to predict.

Before this, I wondering what is the process of prediction with a trained model. Is it the same with the training process?

Amazing ha! 🤩

First I forgot to sigmoid the hidden layer and output layer. The Accuracy shows

Training Set Accuracy: 69.62

And it will get the same accuracy if the output layer has no sigmoid . It also happened in the previous One-vs-all Prediction.

Therefore I still have the question. 🧐

It’s time to keep on the training part. 💪

entry.title: Programming assignment Scrooge Coin
entry.content:
This is the worst task I have ever done.

TxHandler.java cannot be built and run, everything is a guess. Since I am not familiar with JAVA, I encountered millions of syntax errors after submitting.

I have to:

  • Import packages manually
  • Add “;” after each line.
  • () after if.
  • Declare variable type

This is why I hate JAVA 😡😡😡

Japan-2-0

🇯🇵

sequence

Little Master’s eldest sister suddenly said to go to Hakone

So skip some (many) chapters and write this first

As for why it became traditional
Because the eldest sister is Taiwanese
Although she can understand simplified characters

It happened in 8102 3🈷️

At that time, the little mage had served in the former company for 3.5 years, and then went to the fruit company to sweep the floor 🧹, and his birthday 🎂 was on the same day as the pit
I plan to give myself a run similar to graduation 🎓 travel before that

After all, it’s very troublesome to change jobs, and being an inferior person will definitely be humiliated.
So I plan to prepare both mentally and physically in advance

At that time, the little mage was still young and was still in the stage of wanting to go out to play. The way to relax is that the world is so big I want to see
So looking at the world map, I feel like I want to go everywhere

But because it’s Solo, I just got my driver’s license and I didn’t dare to drive before the internship period.
Naturally, Europe and the United States can’t think about it, but choose the urban landscape
Let’s take a look at the 3-year return visa that I finally got, so I can only go to 🇯🇵

In view of the fact that the last time the little mage found in Kinosaki that the fake hot spring was boiler water, and the real hot spring ♨️ can heal a disease, he would never forget to go 🇯🇵 soak once

So the route is all the way north

Hakone-Kamakura Enoshima-Yokohama-Tokyo

Although I have been to Tokyo, because the first time I was following others, the little mage had a poor memory, and it was only 6 days short, so I had no impression.
So exactly as expected, when I came to Tokyo again, apart from knowing Skytree, it seemed like I had never been to other places.

Odakyu

This time it’s JAL, landing at Narita Airport 🛬️
Originally, the young master planned to go to Shinjuku and transfer to the Odakyu Romantic Express (it is said that it is not romantic) and go directly to Hakone
After all, it’s only 4 o’clock, and the last Odakyu train is 6 o’clock. Even if you go from Narita to Shinjuku, it’s completely too late.
However hungry for Japan 🇯🇵 time is an hour earlier, the little mage is dumbfounded after the airport time synchronization

In a panic, the enthusiastic old man in front helped buy a ticket for the Narita Express to Shinagawa to Shinkansen 🚄 under the condition of language barrier. 🎫

Catch the Guangming, which resembles the train man, is very stable and comfortable. You can see the location on the Map and jump forward quickly.
At Odawara (Odawara), the sun has already set, there is no bus, only the mountain train

After leaving the station, I was confused and didn’t know where to go. Many people walked towards me, only to see a beautiful little sister. I quickly went up and asked where the little train was.
After the little sister gave the way gently, the little mage walked a long way and looked back and saw the little sister nodding to indicate that he had found the right carriage.

After going up the mountain, it gradually rained and the temperature dropped sharply. The little mage found that the seat was getting hot, and heating was blowing up.
Really humane

After arriving at Kowakidani, the watermelon 🍉 card balance is insufficient to leave the station
There is no one around, just when the little mage wants to turn over and will be caught
An Officer appeared from nowhere, gave him a piece of paper, opened the subway door, and disappeared

I saw a hill when I went out of the station, and after repeatedly consulting the map, I still couldn’t believe that the vertical ladder hidden in the shadow was the road shown on the map.

Fortunately, after climbing the stairs, I arrived on a normal national road
Only 1.3km uphill

The little mage is holding an umbrella and dragging his luggage, walking alone on the road
Passing by a big 7-11
Still not alone

…

Tenyu

When the two characters Tianyou appeared in the rainy night, the little mage had no energy

I thought I could enjoy the hot spring
I was hungry for a long time and couldn’t find the hotel entrance
Had to call the hotel

At that time, the little mage’s English was still very poor, and coupled with the other party’s Japanese English, he couldn’t understand what was being said at all, so he could only say it by himself.

Then I was told not to move and I would send a car to pick him up
After waiting for a while, there was no movement, so I had to continue walking up the mountain road.
During that time, a car came down from the mountain and experienced no one. The first thought of the little mage was, there is a car on the mountain? !

Give way to the bottom and continue to go up

After walking for a while, the little mage suddenly opened his mouth, it wouldn’t be the car just now.

Go back quickly

Back to the bus stop just now, I found that the car really stopped there
After showing the Booking Detail with the driver, he picked up the Master

In the meantime, I asked the driver if there was any Shuttle at Xiaotianyuan Station.
The answer is too far no
I don’t understand how to find this station
There are just a few bus stops nearby, found by name

The most let the little mage vomit blood is that the car returned on the same route as it just came back. It only went 500m further, and a U-turn arrived at the hotel entrance…

It’s not that the little mage is blind, it’s really too dark and it’s raining to see the road.

So if you go to Hakone from Narita Airport, don’t miss Odakyu

Hakone 0

Just choose this hotel, I have been there a few times, and it is considered very good in Hakone
Little Mage’s friend said

After looking at the price, the little mage couldn’t help asking

‘I’ll go alone, why do I stay in such a good hotel?’
Because a good hotel will be built on the hot spring ♨️ the spring eye, the next time you need to draw water, the temperature is not guaranteed

‘Go alone, why do you want to stay in such a good hotel’
This hotel can choose a room with a hot spring on the balcony, instead of going to the male and female baths, it is very private

‘I am going by myself’
After working continuously for so long, let’s relax and take a graduation trip. 🎓 ✈️ Well

Then the little mage couldn’t help the temptation and ordered Hakone Kowakien Tenyu
Listening to the name makes me feel at ease

Tenyu

After the little wizard was pulled to the hotel by the shuttle, the luggage was wet because of rain
The little sister of the receptionist took out a brand new towel to wipe the luggage 🧳 and helped deliver it to the room

The little mage felt it was unnecessary in his heart, and after climbing the mountain road for a long time, he had no energy to speak, he could only sigh the service was so good

As Hao said, the hot spring is on the balcony
There is a small button next to it. Just press the hot spring that smells of sulfur and it will pop up.
Go to the vending machine to buy a lot of energy drinks to prevent dehydration, and then start to cook the meat

There was light rain and fog outside the balcony, and the curtains were rustling with the mountain breeze.

The little mage stayed in the hot spring watching the rising heat until late at night, listening to the sound of wind and rain outside, feeling that everything was worth it

Wake up the next day, the fog has not cleared

The little mage is very shy and doesn’t like meeting people
I planned to lie down on the balcony for two days

However, hungry and hungry, he went to the male soup on the top floor
I was stunned in an instant

Although iPhone X 📱 is waterproof
Although there was only one person in the pool, when the little mage came, he left

But this kind of candid place can only steal official pictures

Wow, it feels like the infinity pool of Marina Bay Sands in Po County
It’s just that the swimming pool has been replaced with a hot spring

Then the little mage looked at the mountains in the distance, thinking that there was a female soup next door
Go downstairs and find that the female soup is actually downstairs, and men and women will change it every day
I don’t know if it’s ☯️ there is a good balance between yin and yang

So it shouldn’t be like the top floor, you can only see the mountains from the house

That’s boring, the little mage plans not to leave the room the next day

The fact is
The fifth floor is a small pond with fallen leaves 🍂
There is a waterfall flowing down from the hill more than ten meters away
This waterfall is a hot spring

Helpless, the official did not give the picture
It’s a big surprise

Breakfast is also great
You can choose Japanese or Western style
To the window, outside is a bamboo forest

little Prince

It will be cooked after all
Little Mage had to go out and stroll around

I was surprised to find that there is a little prince’s temple (museum) next to it

PS: The first love of the little mage loves the little prince

As early as January 3102, the little mage had studied the little prince
The timeline of this series also happens later
So the name was more or less inspired

Little Prince Aircraft

Little prince rose

My rose, others think she is like you, but she alone is better than all of you. Because she was watered by me. Because I put her in the flower cover. Because she was protected by a screen. Because I got rid of the caterpillars on her. Because I have heard her complaints, her bragging, and sometimes her silence. Because she is my rose.

If you love a flower blooming in the vast sea of stars, then when you look up at the stars, you will feel satisfied

So hungry, first love made the little mage wait for three years at the Magic Academy
And finally got together and dumped him in a week
So the little mage hates the house and Wu doesn’t like the little prince
I don’t understand why I am so respected all over the world

After a round, I went out to the Crystal Museum

Hakone Glass Forest Museum

It is said that it should be like this:

What the little mage saw was this:

Only here is like a fairy tale

Gora Park

It is said that it should be like this:

The little mage rushed over and saw:

Closed up tea room
Bare moss garden
The rose garden is not romantic at all 🌹🌹🌹

So recently, the little mage has been pestering her big sister to teach her how to make a picture like the one in the brochure
🐶🐶🐶

Even so, the little mage still saw the moss bamboo forest towering trees and white clouds

The same scenery is like this in the writings of the ancients in the pre-Qin Dynasty

Bai Hua Jian Xi, Bai Mao Shu Xi. My son is far away, leaving me alone!
Yingying Baiyun, showing off Swarovski. The day is difficult, the son is not jealous!
——“Xiaoya Baihua”

The seasons are not right, there are gains and losses

Let’s go back and cook the meat
Little mage comforted himself

Then a German 🇩🇪 sister paper forcibly Amway a drink🥤

Then buy an extra can and take it back as a gift 🎁

Pola Museum of Art

Pola Museum of Art

Little mage saw a good thing

I quickly photographed it and sent it to mom and dad 👨👩 ask if you want to buy two sets
If you have Parkinson’s for dinner, you won’t be afraid of falling

Bus

Google Map, which has always been easy to use, sucks in Hakone

The bus here 🚌 is very fascinating
I haven’t encountered any problems in larger cities before

However, if you are hungry, let’s not say that Japan is traveling on the left. The map is easy to read.
The most vomiting blood is that the bus stop sign does not indicate the starting station-the terminal station
There are no cars on the mountain road, so it’s hard to tell the direction
There are few passers-by, and those who meet don’t speak English

Every time I walk to the bus stop, I don’t know if I should chase the car when I see it has arrived.
And always ask the driver if he did the right thing

Owakudani

They hate you

Make a cable car in Gora 🚠

Suddenly saw Mount Fuji 🗻

Although in the cable car, the elegant arc is still amazing

Since I just finished Andrew Ng’s machine learning on Coursera two months ago
Turn over the previous notes 📒
Recall the Gaussian distribution equation

$$g(x)=\frac{1}{\sigma \sqrt{2\pi }}^{-\frac{1}{2}( \frac{(x-\mu )}{\sigma} )^{2}}$$

Since Mount Fuji 🗻 is not a two-dimensional element, it cannot be used directly. You need to deform the formula and delete $\mu$

$$z=\frac{20}{\sigma \sqrt{2\pi }}^{-\frac{R^{2}}{2\sigma^{2}} }, \sigma= 2, R = \sqrt{ x^{2} + y^{2}}$$

Of course the height and slope are wrong
You can use linear regression to try it out. Naturally, you don’t want a human tone.
Of course 🗻 the top is concave, and a smile curve needs to be superimposed

…

Just then the cable car 🚠 passed the highest point

The mountain breeze blew over, 🚠 began to shake violently
The mountain below ⛰ is still smoking
Although it is very tall, you can still smell the pungent sulfur

No wonder there are hot springs here ♨️

Get out of the car, there is an egg bigger than a human 🥚
You can see Mount Fuji in the back 🗻, it looks like the cloud just now

The girl from Germany 🇩🇪 told the little mage that she must buy eggs to eat🥚

The little mage is unclear. So, are foreign eggs 🥚 better than mainland gardens?

Okay, the eggs here are black 🌚🌚🌚

I ate five at once, and it didn’t feel strange

In the meantime, a European and American girl asked the little mage how to crack the eggshell
Helpless don’t know how to knock
Pointed at the door

Sister paper surprised
‘Against the door???’

Oh, I used Against

Hakone Ashinoko Narukawa Art Museum

Then 🚠 after getting off, board the boat from Togendai Port, and the Hakone Pirate Boat makes a circle around Lake Ashi and disembarks at Motohakone Port

Remember to buy first class before boarding, otherwise you may not have a ticket and you can’t make up for it.
I’ll be disturbed by the mountain wind outside

But because I did something similar in Osaka before, there is not much newness
I saw a sculpture in the art gallery

So subtle
The material turned out to be ivory

This one is even more amazing
Here is a flower
So this is the name of Wanhua tube but its origin?

Beautiful and quiet snow scene

Then at the coffee shop ☕️ shop in the art gallery
Looking at Mount Fuji 🗻 dazed until closed

Generally speaking, travel notes only mention the good side
It’s as if these people have airborne to the attraction without luggage or equipment

Little Mage is no exception
Because luggage can be checked in the hot spring ♨️ hotel
Just add the address and the luggage 🧳 will automatically pass

It sounds so good that when you take the small train north,
Once suspected to reach Fujisawa Station (Fujisawa Station)
Luggage 🧳 will stay in Hakone forever

Fujisawa

Fortunately, the luggage was not lost

I planned to live in Kamakura
When I had no choice but to book the itinerary, there were no hotels on Booking
I live in nearby Fujisawa

Actually very close to Kamakura
Buy a one-day ticket for Enoshima Electric Railway, and you can get there in 40 minutes
On the way, you can get off the bus and make a round in Enoshima

Facts prove that Fujisawa does not lose
Because after arriving at Shonan Wing International, I got a special access control

The receptionist and the elevator are all in the style of the last century

It feels amazing

Asahaya Main Store

Due to lack of physical fitness, the little mage is close to noon when he goes out every day
So when I got off the bus, I saw an eel rice next to me
In addition, I ate eel rice once in Tokyo before
I heard the news that Japanese eels are going to be eaten up
I went in and took a look

I didn’t expect it to be a century-old shop
Looking back then it was still the Qing Dynasty

Tsurugaoka Hachimangu

There are many Buddha statues inside

then? Happy family 👪? ? ?

Back courtyard



The Great Buddha of Kamakura

At that time the little mage was still in the second year of middle school
See the majestic Buddha
What, the Great Burning Prajna, the Golden Wheel of Compassion, Tianyin Temple, a brain popped out

However, I guess Huigen hasn’t opened yet, and he didn’t hear the sound of heaven floating in the distance.

You will be disillusioned after detouring behind the Buddha
what is this? The tail interface of Gundam

Just when I was about to turn around, I suddenly found a small door on the right side with the words Entrance

Uh okay, this Buddha statue can actually go in

Then the rear wing I just saw was a window when viewed from the inside, and I could climb up and look out ╮(￣ ▽ ￣””)╭

Kamakura High School

Boarding Enoshima Electric Railway

Before going to Kamakura High School

Okay reveal the age
Little mage never saw a slam dunk when he was a kid
So I don’t know what’s going on with those standing on the rails 🛤️ just 🚃 frontally

I heard it’s burning, similar to my hero academia?
Because there is no resonance, I took a picture from a distance and went to the beach in front to soak up the sun and hike to Enoshima.

Yokohama Yokohama City

For a moment the little mage thought he was back in the imperial capital

Because I had survived in the imperial capital for 3.5 years
So I have no interest in Chinatown
Well, even if it’s Japanese, I’m not interested

Never thought
I can see the Beijing Hotel even after flying so far
Ignore it directly. Check in lunch break

Because Monterey is by the sea
I don’t know how long I slept, but I was awakened by the whistle far away
Opened the curtains and looked
I feel that adding a filter is the oil painting seen in the museum

Because it feels great to be woken up by the siren
Just came out and walked by the sea

There are some cute little ducks floating on the water on the shore
When preparing to 📷, Xiao 🦆 plunged into the water to fish 🐟 and went
Uh, so 🦆 can dive 🤿 ah

The sea in Japan is very clean and there is no smell

Hikawamaru

NYK Hikawamaru
NYK Hikawamaru

It turns out that this ship can be visited
It was a cruise ship at first, and later participated in World War II
After retiring, he returned to his hometown

Is this the sound of the siren before?

There will be no women’s toilets from now on
Fortunately, the little mage is male

There are multiple large windows in the first-class cabin where you can eat, read, and even take a shower 🛀

The third-class cabin is like a little mage.

Alas, is there such a big gap in Showa 16?

Elephant nose breakwater

Ohsanbashi Hall

Ever since I watched planes take off and land on the roof of Haneda Airport
Just know 🇯🇵 most large buildings must be sightseeing

But this is just a dock
Frozen, it feels like a theater is also great

You can buy Yokohama sightseeing ferry tickets near Hikawa Maru
1-2 hours at sea, dinner is served on board, you won’t be hungry

Replica of the Statue of Liberty

To commemorate the “Japanese French Year”, from April 1998 to May 1999, the French Statue of Liberty from Cygnes Island came to Odaiba, Tokyo. [3] Due to its popularity, a replica of the French Statue of Liberty was erected in the same place in 2000. Also in Japan, a small Statue of Liberty is in the Amerika-mura (American Village) shopping district in Osaka, Japan. Another replica is in Oirase[71] near Shimoda Town in the southern part of Misawa City, Aomori Prefecture, a US Air Force base with 8,000 people. A replica of the Statue of Liberty in Ishinomaki City, Miyagi Prefecture, was damaged by the 2011 Tohoku earthquake and tsunami. [72] There is also a replica in Oyabe City, Toyama Prefecture. [73]

Bought a  pencil

The taste is much more normal than the stock god likes

National Science Museum

I saw a lot of dinosaurs 🦕 fossils that I saw when I was young
Three of my favorites

Tyrannosaurus 🦖

Tyrannosaurus rex (scientific name: Tyrannosaurus rex), also known as Tyrannosaurus, is currently the only effective species of Tyrannosaurus, a giant theropod dinosaur belonging to the Tyrannosaurus family. The Latin meaning of the name is “in the lizard Tyrant”. It is estimated to be up to 13 meters in length[1], with a hip height of about 4 meters[2], and an average weight of about 9 metric tons. … its bite force is nearly 6 metric tons, equivalent to the weight of an elephant[3]

Triceratops

The genus Triceratops (genus name: Triceratops), commonly known as Triceratops and Triceratops, is a genus of Ornithischian Ceratosaurus, which is a plant-eating dinosaur. Triceratops are medium in size, four-legged, about 7 to 10 meters in length…It is one of the latest dinosaurs of all dinosaurs, and the largest and last ceratopsaurus dinosaur, occupying non-bird-shaped dinosaurs The vast majority of terrestrial ecosystems in the last period on Earth (Late Cretaceous)

Stegosaurus

Stegosaurus is one of the dinosaurs that appear most often in books, comics, TV or movies, and is a very famous representative of plant-eating dinosaurs; but stegosaurus, Tyrannosaurus, and Triceratops do not live in the same era (Stegosaurus In the Jurassic period, Triceratops and Tyrannosaurus were in the Cretaceous period), the main enemies of stegosaurus were Allosaurus, Barbarosaurus and Lizardivorous

Trilobite

It first appeared in the Cambrian, reached its peak in the early Paleozoic, and then gradually decreased to extinction. The latest trilobites (Cenoptera) disappeared in the extinction of the biota at the end of the Permian period 250 million years ago

And whales 🐳
Elephant 🐘 family history

Humanity Pavilion

In this long river of time, I feel that human evolution is not easy
The copy of lucky in the textbook is right in front of you, only about one meter
Live in a house built of bones
Wait until the old man is taller than me

Today, all humans belong to a single group: Homo sapiens sapiens, and there is no species distinction. However, according to the “originating from Africa” model, this is not the first species of the Homo genus: the Homo genus, the first species of the Homo genus, evolved at least two million years ago, and the Homo people live in Africa differently. The region’s time is relatively short. The “Homo erectus” evolved more than 1.8 million years ago, and by 1.5 million years ago, it has spread throughout the old world.

Red giant

Combining the huge diamond just now 💎 will involve a question of whether you should buy a diamond ring
well known

There are three known allotropes of carbon: diamond, graphite, and fullerene. In terms of thermodynamics, diamond is less stable than graphite, and ** can spontaneously transform into graphite**, but the speed of this transformation under normal temperature and pressure is very slow and can be ignored, so diamond 💎 can exist stably. Diamonds formed in nature are generally formed in the high temperature and high pressure environment inside the earth, and later brought to the surface by geological tectonic movements such as volcanic eruptions. Therefore, many diamonds are found near volcanoes. Modern industry can produce diamond under high temperature and high pressure, called synthetic diamond

So the diamond ring has no other use other than the 🦚 function of blinding others’ eyes
Not to mention the magnifying glass on the sun 🌞 🔍 will evaporate

And heavy metals such as gold and platinum

The atomic number of gold is higher among the naturally occurring elements in the universe. It is believed that this heavy element was produced during the supernova nucleosynthesis when two neutron stars collided, [4] existed in the dust before the formation of the solar system. Since the earth was still in a molten state when it was formed, almost all the gold of the early earth has sunk into the core. Therefore, most of the gold in the earth’s crust and mantle is due to the later heavy bombing period (about 4 billion years ago) of the asteroid impact.
Gold was a popular precious metal before it was recorded in history. It was used in currency, value preservation, jewelry and art. In the past, a gold-based gold standard currency system was generally implemented at home and abroad, but gold coins ceased to circulate in the 1930s. In the 1970s, with the end of the Bretton Woods Agreement, the worldwide gold standard finally gave way to the legal tender system. However, because of its rarity, easy smelting, processing and coinage, unique color, corrosion resistance, and resistance to other substances, the value of gold does not decrease.

See you immediately

Of course it’s not bad money or buy it 💎
Of course, the premise is to have a girlfriend who wants to get married 🎎

Gravitational waves

Gravitational-wave observatory (English: Gravitational-wave observatory) is a device used to detect gravitational waves in gravitational wave astronomy. Gravitational waves are ripples caused by accelerating mass in space and time. Albert Einstein first proposed the concept of gravitational waves in 1916. [1] By detecting gravitational waves, general relativity can be experimentally verified. Commonly used detectors include rod detectors and laser interferometers. The main operating principle of these detectors is to measure the influence of gravitational waves on the distance between two distant locations. Since the 1960s, multiple gravitational wave detectors have been built and activated one after another, and there have been continuous improvements in detector sensitivity

And various animal models
There is a huge blue whale outside the pavilion

Ueno Zoo

Every time I went to the zoo before, the tiger pavilion was either undergoing renovation or was about to close.
Finally saw the tiger 🐯
Gorilla wearing a headscarf
I accidentally looked at each other and saw the eyes
Instantly a cold back, thinking of Planet of the Apes

Anteater or?
It turned out that I had seen kangaroos before I went to Australia 🦘

Saw the closing, then go back
Passing by Azuma Bridge
See the yellow dot you saw on the Skytree last time ☁️ or 🍦?

Return

After checkout the next day, go downstairs and take the Narita Airport Line back to the airport
When picking up the ticket, the lady asked if she was alone
Inexplicably why there is still damage to single Wang 🐶

Then the young lady happily informed:
We upgraded you to business class
Welcome to continue flying with JAL in the future

It turned out that the airline randomly selected some customers for upgrades

Lucky

However, this upgrade of the goose is limited to the business class of the aircraft
Unlike the previous self-funded ANA All Nippon Airways
Access to first-class lounge with shower

Of course business class is as comfortable as always
Slept in the plane

entry.title: How to schedule iMessages on Mac
entry.content:
First open Terminal on the Mac, then follow the steps below to copy and paste the following command line:

Send iMessage by Shell

You will see a file opened by the default text editing application, which shows:

Please note that you should replace TEXT with the text to be sent in the Contacts application and replace NAME with the name.
Don’t forget to save the file.

Crontab on mac

You should run this line above because com.vix.cron will check if /etc/crontab exists on macOS.
Enter the Mac password.

Schedule the shell with Crontab

As the Crontab – Quick Reference shows:

This shell means that your Mac will send iMessage at 10:00 on March 25th.

Then modify it to your ideal time.

In the next steps, you are using vim, which I think is the hardest part.

  1. Press i and you will see --INSERT-- in the lower left corner of Terminal.
  2. Paste 00 10 25 3 * zsh ~/Documents/sendiMessage.sh
  3. Press shift + : and enter wq, enter

Check Crontab

crontab -l

You can see 00 10 25 3 * zsh ~/Documents/sendiMessage.sh if everything is correct.
