entry.title: Meet Rama
entry.content:
I have admired the base series for a long time. This is the first Clark novel to be read completely.

translation

Let me talk about translation

About two years ago, I had the original version and decided not to read the translation
I haven’t read it. Another earlier version met with Rama, so I didn’t post a comparison.
As far as this version is concerned, there is no imaginary sense of violation
As far as the name is concerned, Rama must be wrong, because the original text contains:

now they were working through the Gindu pantheon. And so 31/439 was christened Rama.

Cover

And I like this cover
When I first got the book, I thought it was something like a gravitational lens. I was completely misled. I didn’t expect it to be Rama.

Technology

On the whole, the only thing that feels wrong is the interstellar spacecraft, and the chimpanzee who does chores
Judging from the current level of technology, those doing these things should be more like robots in Interstellar (you see, Rama civilization is also made by Jiangzi)
The human physiology described in the book has not improved much compared to now
It’s hard to imagine that humans are still like this when they move as far as Pluto (in the book, Pluto is still a planet rather than a dwarf planet).

You know, I felt like I was going to die when I went to Europe for an 11-hour flight. When I did this kind of interstellar travel, it was not a corpse anymore.

So if humans don’t iteratively upgrade as described in “Life 3.0”
Compared to humans, the humanoid robots in nier automata are more suitable for interstellar travel

Others are great
For example, although Rama’s intelligent life did not show up at the end, it is inferred that it should be similar to humans.
The mainstream view of science until now is that carbon-based life is because:

  1. Macromolecules need carbon and silicon to be linkers
  2. Silicon needs extremely high temperatures to become active
  3. The carbon in the entire universe is 10 times that of silicon

Then Rama is the robot, which has specific functions, weak artificial intelligence, and does not need to be conscious

Rama people

The book is only in Liuli Shrine (I’m sorry I saw the glass and the temple is turned into a shrine ⛩️) That chapter describes the creatures in the crystal, why guess that this is Rama’s advanced intelligent creature?

Because if you see a 📱 in the universe, you will definitely not think that it was formed naturally, it must be created by some kind of intelligent life

Nuclear bomb from Mercury

When I saw it, I was worried about Rama being destroyed.
But to me, the Mercury people are not wrong, their speeches also make sense

If we pause here, treat it as a thought experiment
In the end, Rama really occupied the near-solar orbit. Originally, he had this opportunity to preserve human civilization. As a result, human civilization disappeared because of a person’s hypocrisy. The person who detonated the nuclear bomb was not a hero but a sinner.

Survival is the first need of civilization

In addition, for the human beings who have just stepped out of the solar system, there is no difference from the situation when they stepped out of Africa that year. When facing a dangerous environment again, how can they treat space in the way of modern civilization on Earth?

do not go gentle into that good night

However, from the perspective of Rama, where the sun is only 5 million kilometers behind, it opens the protective cover, draws energy, and violates Newton’s third law of movement. It is not important whether the nuclear bomb is or not, but it highlights that it is actually a human species-level struggle

civilization

Human evolution has led to no conception of unusual sizes that cross daily levels

According to the description in the book, it is 50 kilometers long and 20 kilometers in diameter, so the circumference is 62.8 kilometers, so it seems that the entire inner wall area is 3,140 kilometers. What is the concept?

  • Three ten thousandths of our country
  • Beijing Sixth Ring Road 2,267 km²
  • Shanghai 6,340 km²
  • Shenzhen 2,050 km²
  • Hong Kong 2,754 km²

Feel it for yourself

Think about the current population of these cities, so such an area can fully carry the population base required by a human civilization
Not to mention the low gravity in the middle of Rama. Now the city skyscrapers are only a few hundred meters away. Rama is 10 kilometers away, which is two orders of magnitude worse, so the actual capacity
Not surface area but volume
Moreover, Rama should be just one of them, after all

Rama is the seventh avatar of the god Vishnu

The List that Avatars in the Dashavatara Waris by Reason: Matsya, Kurma, Varaha, Narasimha, Vamana, Parashurama, Rama, Krishna, Balarama and Kalki

entry.title: How to download videos from Toutube at the same time and embed their subtitles in batch
entry.content:
All I have to do is to download some courses, which are very helpful to me on youtube, and embed Zh-Hans subtitles in the video, and then submit them to a Chinese website that does not support external subtitles.

This tool can help Chinese students who don’t speak English well and cannot access YouTube.

Youtube-dl config

The file path is ~/.config/youtube-dl/config

Simultaneous download

Batch translate file names

After downloading all the videos in the list, use

ls | grep mkv | sed "s/\.mkv//"

Then copy and paste to Google to get the translated text, then save it to zh.txt

Embed subtitles in batch

On Intel Core i7, I usually spend an entire night recording 20 videos, and an hour of video takes 20 minutes to embed its subtitles.

entry.title: CUDA GPU with Staxrip accelerates h264 / h265 / HEVC video encoding
entry.content:
Games have changed my life.

I have been to cities for many years. These cities have had travels in the Assassin’s Creed series, including “Sleeping Dog 2”, “GTA” and so on.
When I actually enter the real world, it will have a big impact. Therefore, every time I go back, I always want to experience it in the game.

However, as I get older and older 👴, I spend less and less time playing games 👱.

I am recording 🎮 while playing 📹, this might be a good idea.

ShadowPlay

Since I have a Gigabyte Geforce GTX 1080 to train deep learning models, the only thing I need is Nvidia ShadowPlay, which is very suitable for recording games.

But the minimum bit rate is 10Mbps, I want to reduce it below 6kbps, so compression is involved 🗜️.

Staxrip

I always use FFmpeg before, but every time I hear the sound of a Macbook, I feel panic. I usually spend an entire night to convert the batch video.

Fortunately, this time I saw the Cuda logo, which reminded of the acceleration of the GPU.

Then I found staxrip, which is incredible.

  1. Click x264, select NVIDIA H.265 (I tested on my 1080, its speed is similar to NVIDIA H.264, I used to think 264 should be much faster than 265), and then it You can use GPU acceleration.
  2. Click Encoder Options, change the mode to VBR, and then “Video Bit Rate” appears.

It can reach 250 frames per second when CPU is 40% and GPU is 35%.

entry.title: React Native & Flutter
entry.content:
There are already many pros and cons.

Pros Cons
React Native Hot Reloading
Online Hot Fixing
Front-End friendly
Cross platform
Fix once
 JavaScript
Native UI knowledge on both platform
Debugging
Flutter Flutter Engine
Cross platform
Same UX & UI
 Learn Dart
Unstable (1.0 released)
Ugly Code Style
iOS 13?
Debugging
Native iOS Part
Much easier
AutoLayout, Storyboard
Swift, write less and do more
SpriteKit, UIDynamic		 Three developers(fontend, iOS, android) triple budgets

As an iOS developer who happily follows the  steps, when I first set foot in iOS developers, I used Swift, Storyboard and AutoLayout.

I think this is why most native developers are not even willing to learn React Native.

Two years ago, I established Mattermost and made some changes in the previous company to replace Slack. This was the first React Native project I came into contact with.

Unfortunately, it’s very easy to lose code, and every time I want to change something, I have to search the entire project. There is no Storyboard to let me know who told who.

I chatted with my former colleague, who was an advanced front end. He helped me start the update server, which was also written in Node.js. I handed over this project to him when I left.

According to him, this is because he doesn’t know how to write native code, just like React React is similar to React.js, why not use it to try both iOS and Android. Then I asked him if he knew how to develop quickly and what kind of technology he would like. You can guess the answer 😄.

Because from my point of view, it is sometimes difficult to implement functions even in fast code, which is definitely a long way to go for another technology to achieve.

Then, these days, I have the opportunity to conduct a demo with nested magnet scroll views, buttons and navigation. Instead of using native code, I stepped out of my comfort zone and tried React Native and Flutter.

  • Views
    • ListView, ScrollView, Labels, Texts, TextFields
  • Actions
    • Drag, Click, Scroll
    • Callback Block or Delegate on view events

Therefore, if you are proficient in any of them, all that remains is how Google implements it in the framework or read its manual.

React Native

The impressive thing about React Native is state

It can be achieved by the didSet of variables in Swift, and there are many frameworks that can do it, such as RxSwift, PromiseKit

Flutter

I used to be curious about certain applications that UX is very similar to those developed by this machine, but it feels weird in some way. Now I know it is shaking.

  • This is my first time to write and get two apps (I have a lot of trouble setting up React Native with Android)
  • 0.9 There is an error on the hot install
  • The development on Visual Studio Code is quite good, which reminds me of the past of Golang
  • Ugly code style (Are they serious about it? This is an official example)

In any case, I was really impressed by it, it skipped the native components and wrote its own 2D rendering engine. Much more talented than React Native.

Therefore, personally, I think Flutter has more potential than React Native. And there are many companies rolling back to local.

entry.title: Uber booking animation
entry.content:
In June of this year, I joined WWDC in San Jose. It was the waiting animation I saw when I met my friends at the Cupertino Library using Uber.

The animation is awesome!

I was curious how they did it, so I did some exploration.

Preview

Well, the polyline animation is still not smooth enough. Does anyone have a better idea?

Step by step

Rotate the map

I chose Map as the default map to demonstrate for the following two reasons:

  • After WWDC19, Simulator is built on the Meta and Core layers of all Apple frameworks included in MapKit, and Metal uses the GPU of the underlying Mac system.
  • Google Map requires a developer key to access, which means that after forking the repository from GitHub, you cannot run it directly on the emulator

 Map transactions can be adjusted by embedding in the UIView.animate block

Google Map must use CATransaction

Fixed animation

We need two CAShapeLayer to make the animation, one for the circle and the other for the pushpin.
Note that the circle disappears after reaching the maximum value, and the pin has an easyIn curve.

Draw a polyline on the map

 The map uses MKMapViewDelegate to handle the drawing.

This is how to add polyline

Animated polyline

That is the tricky part.

When we see that Uber’s animation is close enough, the polyline will rotate with the map to draw on the map.

What I want to do is continue to add and delete polylines on the map to pretend it is an animation.
Likewise, when it appears at the beginning and end of the pushpin, the line has a title and a tail.

Here is repository, if you have a better idea, please let me know :)

Updates

Well, since the screen refresh rate is 60 fps, it should make the total steps/duration ≈ 60

entry.title: How to reduce iCloud storage by shrinking videos
entry.content:
In fact, subtracting unnecessary clips from 4k video can save space more effectively

When I gallery videos in “Photos”, it will show when and where I took them

This is a great feature that can help me recall my memories
But the original 4k takes up too much space in iCloud

For example, even with HEVC (High Efficiency Video Coding), a 2:30 video will occupy 1GB of space
My 200G iCloud plan is almost full ​​

Therefore, I plan to compress the video a bit to save some space.

but,

FFmpeg converts video, even if there is metadata, GPS will be lost

Fortunately, I found a way

Tools

  • FFmpeg
  • Exiftool

Export original video to folder

The common way to drag a video from “Photo” to a folder is to let “Photo” convert the video

Therefore, you must select all the videos you want to export,

File -> Export -> Export Unmodified Original For...

Shrink each video

iPhone default stream is

# 0: 0 (and): Video: hevc (Main) (hvc1 / 0x31637668), yuv420p (tv, bt709)

So using -pix_fmt yuv420p10le to re-encode to 10bit does not help

Then, you can copy and paste these codes into Terminal and cd VideoFolder, then shrinkVideos

Shrinking will take a long time

On my MacBook Pro (15 inches, 2018), it’s only 0.3 times
But usually, the video will be reduced by 5 times without losing too much quality

When all is done, the reduced video will be located under the shrunk/ folder

You can then compare them and delete the original video before importing the reduced video

Okay, in the end I can’t stand the extremely slow speed, so I use Nvidia 1080 GPU for acceleration to learn more: [CUDA GPU Accelerated h264/h265/HEVC Video Encoding with Staxrip](https://leihao0.github.io /CUDA-GPU-Accelerated-h264-h265-HEVC-Video-Encoding-with-Staxrip/)

The next step is to mark the converted video as hvc1, otherwise, an error will occur when importing photos:

Invalid: The operation couldn’t be completed. (PHPhotosErrorDomain error -1.)

So the whole step is

hope it helps you

entry.title: Cemetery Book
entry.content:
Amusement Park 🎠 Book

Children have no concept of life and death, and the cemetery is more like an amusement park for them

Thank you 🙏 🐼 reader for sending another book

Ashamed, the number of readings plummeted after going abroad
From hundreds of books per year before suddenly to single digits now

Think about the boastful saying that reading should not be utilitarian, but should be driven by interest
Now it’s really slap in the face

But there are also objective reasons:

One is that most of the books I want to read now have original editions
Since there is the original version, I don’t really want to see the translated version

Secondly, I was on a phone call and was heard by a friend from the National University of Singapore
After that, she repeatedly despised “Your Plastic English”

But I have my stubbornness, slow is slow, but I stick to the original version
There should be one day I can get up as fast as Chinese books

The third is that Po County is an island, and there is no such thing as the good mountains and rivers abroad, so lonely as the gods say
And at the beginning of this epidemic, I once thought that this place was a developed country in a mess
In addition, it is summer all year round, except for the hotter, other things are quite comfortable
The blue sky and white clouds, heavy rain and thunder, feel like time is frozen, it’s good

Without utilitarianism, naturally there is no motivation to read

Circuit Breaker is now, so I have some time and mood

I got this book first
I thought it was science fiction at the beginning
I heard that I could be invisible and thought it was fantasy
I thought it was love when I met sister paper
Went to school and thought it was a campus
Dad came to the game and thought it was a parent-child
The whole family was killed and thought it was suspense
In the end, I was talking about growth

As the last author wrote:

I finished the sixth chapter, “Bertie’s School Days” in a shabby hotel in New Orleans. I finished the last page in the gazebo in my garden, holding back tears while writing. Only at that moment, I understood why I didn’t write this book when I was a father. Because before creating, I have to accompany my children through their growth process, nurture them, love them, and finally learn to let go

In addition, it’s hard to get involved in the reading process
The whole book keeps giving me the feeling of a Harry Potter copy

But there is a significant difference in reading this time
In the past, when reading such novels, I often entered the book from the perspective of the protagonist
With age
This time it’s more from Silas’ perspective

If this book is a common fantasy routine in China
Bod will definitely pick up sister Scarlett, tame Sleer, become Master, tear Jack, sit as Brotherhood boss

However, none of this happened in Neil, who wrote about the American Gods.
After Bod played the monster 👾, the sister paper was scared away. Bod is just an ordinary The world is so big, I want to see

As a father, do you want to see your Bod become the one in the country or the one in the book 📖?

There are sometimes stupid things done during the rebellious period that require parents to pay for it
Now that I’m older, I understand the difficulties of the parents’ various prohibitions.

But I can’t help thinking about it
I didn’t know what I knew now

I have imagined that if the self now and the self then
I would definitely not be obedient at that time
You must be hammered in the face by the iron fist of society to wake up
Do something resolutely

After dealing with the general affairs, one day he will step out of the fairy tale world and enter life

“Good-bye, then, Silas.” Bod held out his hand, as he had when he was a small boy, and Silas took it, in a cold hand the color of old ivory, and shook it gravely.
“Good-bye, Nobody Owens.”
Bod picked up the little suitcase. He opened the door to let himself out of the crypt, walked back up the gentle slope to the path without looking back.”

I was miserable when I came out, no one gave me away, no goodbye
The rent in Beijing was refunded and I bought a one-way ticket
All the belongings are packed in three suitcases
Take a taxi to the airport at 4 in the morning
After finishing the consignment, boarding, and then leaving

without looking back

How I wish I also heard Bod’s auditory hallucinations:

He took a step forward … a voice said, “I am so proud of you, my son.”

entry.title: Python vs Java for children
entry.content:
The Article _ originally appeared in_ junilearning.com

Python and Java: usage, performance, learning

In the field of computer science, there are many programming languages, and no one language is superior to another. In other words, each language is best for solving certain problems. In fact, for a given programming project, there is usually no one best language to choose from. Therefore, for students who want to develop software or solve interesting problems through code, it is very important to have a strong foundation in computer science ** applicable to any programming language**.

Programming languages tend to share certain characteristics in the way they work, for example, they deal with memory usage or the intensity of using objects. As students become exposed to more languages, they will begin to see these patterns. This article will focus on Python and Java, the two most widely used programming languages in the world. Although it is difficult to accurately measure the growth rate of each programming language, They are the two most popular programming languages used in industry today.

The main difference between Python and Java is that Python is dynamically typed, while Java is statically typed. Loosely speaking, this means that Java is stricter on how to define and use variables in the code. *As a result, the syntax of Java tends to be verbose, which is one of the reasons why we recommend that beginners learn Python before Java. *For example, this is how numbers creates a name variable in Python that holds the numbers 0 to 9:

Here’s how you would do the same thing in Java:

Another major difference is that Java is a compiled language, so it usually runs programs faster than Python. This means that the compiler converts Java code into machine-level code before actually running the program. In contrast, Python is an interpreted language, which means there are no compilation steps.

Usage and practicality

Historically, Java has become a more popular language, partly because of its long history. However, Python is rapidly gaining popularity. According to Github’s October Status Report, it has recently surpassed Java as the most widely used programming language. According to the 2018 Developer Survey, Python is now the fastest growing computer programming language.

Both Python and Java have a large developer community, and you can answer questions on Stack Overflow websites. From Stack Overflow Trends, it can be seen that the percentage of questions asked by Python on Stack Overflow in 2017 exceeds that of Java**. At the time of writing, about 13% of questions on Stack Overflow are marked with Python, and about 8% are marked with Java!

Web development

** Both Python and Java can be used for back-end web development**. Typically, developers will use the Django and Flask framework for Python and Spring for Java. Python is known for the readability of its code, which means that Python code is clean, easy to read and concise. Python also has a large number of comprehensive modules, packages, and libraries. These modules, packages, and libraries are developed by the Python enthusiast community, in addition to its standard library. Java has a similar ecosystem, although to a lesser extent.

Mobile application development

When it comes to mobile application development, Java has a dominant position because Java is the main language used to build Android applications and games. With the above-mentioned tailor-made libraries, developers can choose to write Android applications using powerful frameworks and development tools built specifically for the operating system. Currently, although there are tools such as Kivy and BeeWare 之 that allow you to write code once and run it on Windows, OS X, iOS and Deploy applications on Android, but Python is not often used for mobile development.

Machine learning and big data

In contrast, in machine learning and data science, Python is the most popular language. Python is commonly used in big data, scientific computing, and artificial intelligence (AI) projects. When working on projects involving sentiment analysis, most data scientists and machine learning programmers choose to use Python instead of Java. At the same time, it is worth noting that many machine learning programmers may choose to use Java when working on projects related to network security, network attack prevention, and fraud detection.

Where to start

When learning the basics of programming, many studies have reached the conclusion, because of the simple and intuitive syntax of Python, it is easier than Java **[Learn Python](https ://junilearning.com/coding), as shown in the previous example. Compared with Python, Java programs usually have more boilerplate code-they must contain parts of the code with little or no changes in many places. Having said that, Java has some significant advantages, especially its speed as a compiled language. *Learning Python and Java will expose students to two languages, which are based on similar computer science concepts but differ in education. *\

Overall, it is clear that Python and Java are both powerful programming languages in practice, so for any aspiring software developer, it is best to learn both languages proficiently. Programmers should compare Python and Java according to the specific needs of each software development project, rather than simply learning a language they like. In short, no one language is superior to another, so programmers should strive to have both languages in both codings**.

Python Java
Runtime Performance Winner
Ease of Learning Winner
Practical Agility Tie Tie
Mobile App Development Winner
Big Data Winner

entry.title: How to clean MacBook dust and fans
entry.content:
If kernel_task is using a large percentage of your Mac CPU

I have noticed before that kernel_task will be 100% stuck at every turn, but it is a System process, there is no way

根据  的文档 If kernel_task is using a large percentage of your Mac CPU

In other words, kernel_task responds to conditions that cause your CPU to become too hot, even if your Mac doesn’t feel hot to you. It does not itself cause those conditions. When the CPU temperature decreases, kernel_task automatically reduces its activity.

This is because the CPU is too hot 🔥 even if you think it’s not hot 🥶…

In addition, kernel_task is not the culprit. When the CPU is not hot, its occupancy rate will automatically go down…

I found that it shouldn’t be on the left 👈 charging 🔋, I believe it

Here’s why you shouldn’t charge your MacBook Pro on the left side

While charging the MacBook Pro and having peripherals plugged in to the left-hand ports, the device’s ports can get hot; for some reason, this can result in kernel_task going a bit haywire and using up a whole boatload of system resources.

But after switching to the right 👉 charging 🔋 after a few days, it still got 100% after a while

despair…

Suddenly wondered if it was because of the need to clean up

How to Clean MacBook Dust & Fan

It took Google to know that you can disassemble it yourself
Mine is a 16-year-old book, which has been guaranteed
不然根据 Mac Warranty
If you dismantle it yourself, you should lose

This Warranty does not apply:

  • (c) to damage caused by use a third party component or product that does not meet the Apple Product’s specifications

Tools 🔧

  • Penta screw 🔩 knife
  • Soot ball, small brush
  • Abandoned credit card 💳

step

  1. Unscrew
  2. Make a small slit on the side
  3. Insert the unused credit card 💳 and slide it in the direction of the blue arrow
    1. You will hear a click
    2. In Figure 2 you can see that there are four buckles in the middle horizontal line
    3. Instead of breaking something (I hope so 😓)
  4. Use symmetrically on the right 💳 to slide
  5. Then press the red arrow to pull it horizontally
    1. Figure 2 The card slot can be seen above the fan
    2. So force horizontally, pull left and right ↔️ a little bit symmetrically
  6. The back cover is opened

Really dirty

After cleaning up the ash, kernel_task does not appear much, and 💻 is also resurrected
I instantly feel that the notebook for 16 years 💻 can be used for 5 years 👨‍💻

entry.title: What is the purpose of Python
entry.content:
How to use Python in the real world

Python is one of the most popular coding languages in the world.

Most of the top American universities even use Python in their introductory coding courses: teach students to use Python to build simple games, parse information from web pages, and even perform language processing!

Nevertheless, many parents and students often want to know-how is Python actually used in the company or in various fields?

Read on to learn how Python drives** today’s leading industry and plays an important role in many computer science disciplines. **

Why choose Python?

[Python](https://junilearning.com/blog/guide/what-is-python-101-for-students/?fbclid=IwAR2B-DsUCsJJo8_VkKQ87k0iyQeXJhBUcllDiUMXX9ACqjMEHBXfCjJMxTc?utm_source=gout_mxTc?utm_source=goutus=ed is a high-level camign_m_source=gf&utium) ** and Universal Coding Language-This means it is easier to understand and can be used to solve a variety of problems!

With its simple syntax, high readability, and use on the entire operating system, Python is a valuable language that can be used for learning and use in various applications.

Python code example on the engineer’s screen.

Therefore, it is not surprising that Python is not only prevalent in today’s job market, but also in the common technologies we use every day.

Python programming is a skill that can be used in almost any industry, and its role goes far beyond software development. From industries like finance, healthcare, *and *insurance, like field aerospace to entertainment-[Python-based technology](https://appdevelopermagazine.com/ten -industries-using-python-programming/) is to promote ** innovation and new solutions**.

In the “What is Python 101” guide, we introduced Python and some areas used by Python, such as technology, finance and biotechnology. But in this article, we will delve deeper into the wide range of uses of Python-especially in the following areas:

  • Web Development
  • Data Science
  • Machine Learning
  • artificial intelligence

Python applications

Web development

Although HTML, CSS and Javascript may be common tools for Web development, Python is also a good choice.

[Web Development](https://careerfoundry.com/en/blog/web-development/what-does-it-take-to-become-a-web-developer-everything-you-need-to-know-before -getting-started/) refers to building websites on the Internet from static plain text pages to dynamic e-commerce websites and interactive Internet applications.

Coding is essential for Web development to build site functionality, optimize user experience, and ensure that information is properly organized. Web frameworks such as Python’s Django and Flask have become popular choices for website development.

Python is an excellent choice for back-end web development and is now used by many companies.

These open source frameworks enable users to build Web applications more efficiently because Python has the ability to process large amounts of data and automate tasks. In fact, Instagram, Pinterest and Google are all in their [back-end web development](https://learn.onemonth.com/10-famous-websites-built -using-python/) uses Python.

Data science

In [Data Science](https://junilearning.com/blog/guide/coding-and-data-science/?fbclid=IwAR2B-DsUCsJJo8_VkKQ87k0iyQeXJhBUcllDiUMXX9ACqjMEHBXfCjJMxTc?utm_source=gf&utm_reach=[campaign]** data analysis and data analysis ](https://junilearning.com/blog/guide/coding-and-data-science/?fbclid=IwAR2B-DsUCsJJo8_VkKQ87k0iyQeXJhBUcllDiUMXX9ACqjMEHBXfCjJMxTc?utm_source=gf&utm_outm_reach_campaign=Python or the main language choice)

In the era of big data, we frequently come into contact with data in daily life through navigation (GPS), online shopping, energy usage, and wearable devices such as smart watches.

On average, each household has about [11 devices,](https://variety.com/2019/digital/news/us-households-have-an-average-of-11-connected-devices-and-5g-should -push-that-even-higher-1203431225/) And this number may increase in the future! With so many devices, companies need to process large amounts of data to provide services.

Python-based tools are often used to visualize, process, and analyze large amounts of data.

Data Science involves processing data and inferring trends-Python is very useful in this field because it contains dense packages such as scipy, numpy and pandas.

In addition, the matplotlib software package can be used to build data visualizations. This makes Python a popular choice in fields such as bioinformatics, which also involves large amounts of data and modeling.

These Python-based tools have become popular because of their ease of use and scalability. For example, Netflix uses scipy and numpy for numerical calculations to manage cross-platform users flow.

▶ Try: [Advanced Data Science and Python Tutorial](https://junilearning.com/blog/coding-projects/python-data-science-monte-carlo-simulations/?fbclid=IwAR2B-DsUCsJJo8_VkKQ87k0iyQeXJhBUcllDiUMT9Cutj_HBXf =gf&utm_medium=what_is_python_used_for&utm_campaign=outreach)

Machine learning

By analyzing a large amount of data, Machine Learning [Algorithm](https://junilearning.com/blog/guide/what-are-algorithms/?fbclid=IwAR2B-DsUCsJJo8_VkKQ87k0iyQeXJhBUcllDiUMXX9ACqjMEHBXfCjJMxTium can be found? Pattern and apply it to future behavior.

The most obvious use of machine learning in products is recommendation systems. Companies such as Netflix, Spotify, and Youtube collect user behavior to predict and suggest playlists and videos.

Scikit-learn and tensorflow are Python libraries that can be used for algorithms for classification, clustering and regression of large data sets. The high performance and wide range of functions of these libraries make them essential in any machine learning exploration.

▶ Learn more: [Importance of Children’s Algorithms](https://junilearning.com/blog/guide/importance-of-algorithms-for-kids/?fbclid=IwAR2B-DsUCsJJo8_VkKQ87k0iyQeXJhBUcllDiUMXX9ACqjMEHBXfCjJMxTcium what_is_python_used_for&utm_campaign=outreach)

artificial intelligence

Machine learning is actually just one aspect of artificial intelligence. AI refers to the intelligence of machines and the development of computer systems to perform human-oriented tasks such as perception or decision-making.

An outstanding example of artificial intelligence is ride-hailing applications such as Uber and Lyft.

Python is used in artificial intelligence for applications such as Lyft or Uber. The AI system can then predict things such as user needs and estimated time of arrival.

Uber uses AI to predict user needs and estimated arrival time (and other features), most of which are through [Python](https://eng.uber.com/uber-ai-blog -2019/) completed.

In addition to some of the aforementioned Python libraries, other libraries such as keras and pytorch can also be used to create AI functions (such as predictive models and neural networks).

Python is everywhere!

Among popular programming languages, Python is one of the most diverse languages in its applications. In addition, it has been deeply integrated with us and today’s leading companies.

Occupations involving Python include software engineer, web developer, data scientist, product manager, business analyst, etc. Regardless of the industry, companies in this technological age rely on data-driven decision making, and Python is the perfect tool to do this.

If you or your child is interested in the fields or roles listed above, then learning Python is a good choice!

Want to become a Python programmer?

One of the biggest advantages of Python is to help new coders learn basic concepts and become familiar with programming! For new programmers of all ages, there are also many resources for learning Python extensively.

Python classes for children

! A Juni instructor using Python.

Instructor Juni teaches basic Python to a young student.

In Juni Learning, with the help of experienced coding teachers, we will teach young coders [teaching Python](https://junilearning.com/coding/?fbclid=IwAR2B-DsUCsJJo8_VkKQ87k0iyQeXJhBUcllDiUMXX9ACutjMEHBXfCjJMxT=c gf&utm_medium=what_is_python_used_for&utm_campaign=outreach). From consolidating coding foundations to building algorithms and analyzing data sets, these courses explore many different applications of Python and teach students how to build their own coding projects.

Read more about our [coding course](https://junilearning.com/coding/?fbclid=IwAR2B-DsUCsJJo8_VkKQ87k0iyQeXJhBUcllDiUMXX9ACqjMEHBXfCjJMxTc?utm_source=gf&utm_medium=ed_is&out&out[https://campaign][More information on the course and[https://junilearning.com/coding/?fbclid=IwAR2B-DsUCsJJo8] join.junilearning.com/) Learn which course is best for your child’s coding journey with our admissions team.

This article originally appeared on junilearning.com.

entry.title: How to open an account in US stocks
entry.content:
refer code 0CM1QE

US elections these two days
As leeks, don’t share it because of the time difference.
Woke up in the middle of the night and cut the meat
Now seeing the 🚀 generally rising, but not dare to enter the market embarrassment

Just share the sad journey of opening an account at that time

U.S. brokerage

Because many U.S. brokerages are exempt from commissions, so look first

  • Robinhood (better user interface)
  • TD Ameritrade (old brand)
  • Firstrade (Chinese customer service)

Robinhood Because both parties can send stocks when invited, I asked my friends in the United States to get the code, and then I went to the official website and found that it can only be submitted within the United States…
TD Ameritrade does have SG and website, but I don’t know how to get stuck in the last step after submitting the information. No one has reviewed the email in the past.
Firstrade, non-Americans automatically helped to submit the tax exemption form. After submitting the information, the account was finally opened after a few working days, and then found that the deposit can only be ACH, Check, Wire Trannsfer

Both ACH and Check need to transfer money to my U.S. bank account, so definitely not
Wire Trannsfer has another fee

Singapore Brokerage

Then I researched Singapore and found that these people actually went to UOB or DBS Bank’s Trading Account
I only heard that the handling fee is too expensive, not worth it

Domestic brokerage

Okay, I went around and came back…

  • Xiaomi’s Tiger
  • Tencent’s Futu
  • Snowball

I’m happy 🐯 support Singapore account opening, yes

  • US stocks, Hong Kong stocks, Singapore stocks, Australian stocks…
  • Support pre post market, futures
  • lever

I originally planned to upload passport and other information, anyway I prepared it before
It turns out that Singpass authentication is supported, and I clicked and jumped back and forth, and it was authenticated…

God knew it was so easy
Did I open it last year?

Otherwise, this time has already doubled
Or have jumped off the rooftop

transaction fee

Because I don’t (dare) buy options
There are three additional expenses for normal trading

  • Buy 2$
  • 0.1% of total stock
  • Sell 2$

So even if you accompany all your underwear, 🐯 will be full

Refer code

You can use my code 0CM1QE

I think the current activity is both sides

  • Free 5 commissions
  • Charge 2000SGD to get 30SGD, 3W to get 100SGD

Well, there is no desire to refer at all
I remember that I used to give away a share of Ali’s stock. Could it be too high now?

Transcript

Let’s take a look at the global stock market boom in the past two days. I was scared at night for fear of being unable to sleep. I had a report card after the fierce operation.

So what are you waiting for, sign up

I’m waiting for you on the rooftop~

entry.title: Fly back to China in the shadow of the coronavirus
entry.content:
The global epidemic situation in new museums does not improve at the end of 2020
And with the advent of winter, there are gradually signs of another outbreak
But recently the little mage needs to go home
Although various vaccines have been vaccinated globally

Company Type Dosage Effectiveness Storage ℃
BioNTech/Pfizer mRNA x2 95% -70
Modern mRNA x2 95% -20
Oxford/AstraZeneca Adenovirus vector x2 62-90% 0

But it still requires 14 days of isolation to return home

ready

Visit the local embassy to obtain entry information
Taking Singapore as an example, according to Embassy in New Zealand

Boarding after October will probably go through several stages, tightening step by step

  1. Nucleic acid amplification testing
  2. Nucleic acid + serum IgM double negative certificate
  3. You must apply for the epidemic prevention health code in the WeChat mini program

Nucleic acid amplification testing

You need to make an appointment for testing in November, and you don’t need to make an appointment in December. You can do the test directly when you find an approved hospital
There is a clinic right next to the apartment where the little mage lives. Walk for 5 minutes
Because there are no appointments, there are too many people, and I waited for about an hour
Drew blood and stabbed his nose
I’ve been afraid of this test before, but the Singaporean doctors are more gentle and not too uncomfortable

Here is a reminder that you must press for a while after the blood is drawn. The little brother in front of the blood drawn the blood and did not use the band-aid carefully 🩹 hold it down
As a result, the blood flowed into a river, and the clothes on the ground were covered with blood, it was terrible

Health code

Double-yin proof received by SMS and email the next morning
But the WeChat applet cannot submit documents
As a mage, the little mage boldly guessed that it was a DNS resolution problem
Cloudflare did not correctly return the server IP of the applet.
Change the phone 📱 DNS to 114.114.114.114 and it will be amazing
Not only sigh what to do with Muggles

I received the health code after about an hour
Save screenshots just in case

Biochemical suit

I was scared by the people returning home in the biochemical suits at the airport.
The little mage was shaking and bought a set of + adult diapers
It was uncomfortable to try it on secretly
Considering that the northern hemisphere is in winter at the end of the year, getting on the plane in a tropical T-shirt and getting off the plane without clothes will definitely catch a bad cold on the spot.

Wearing biochemical suits and adding clothes becomes a big problem

After repeatedly reading CDC’s Domestic Travel During the COVID-19 Epidemic, the little master concluded

  • Airplane has fresh air
  • Wear a mask
  • Not soft eyes and nose

The main route of infection of the new crown is the respiratory system. The little mage feels that wearing N95+surgical mask+goggles should be at ease

Return flight

There are currently no direct flights from Singapore to Beijing
You can only choose to go to Shanghai first, and then transfer after 14 isolation

There are only three direct flights from Singapore to Shanghai a week
Singapore Airlines on Monday, Eastern Airlines on Thursday, Juneyao Airlines on Friday night

Eastern Airlines can only check one piece of baggage, and the excess amount needs to be purchased extra, one piece is 500 RMB
20% discount for advance purchase on the app

In addition to the health code just before boarding, you also need to use the Customs Passenger Mini Program to fill in an entry information

Eastern Airlines

3:00 pm

Waiting for the boarding gate, about half of the people wore biochemical suits and covered them tightly.
In fact, during the front security check, it was extremely embarrassing, because some people had to take half of the biochemical service because of a belt and other reasons.
In this case, won’t the work break? What protective effect is there?

The crew also wears double-layer masks + goggles

After the plane climbed up, the little wizard connected to the satellite Wi-Fi and continued to update his family with news updates so that they don’t have to worry.

Although there is an epidemic, there are still meals provided
There are not many passengers, the little wizard is in the middle, and there is no one on either side.
So I didn’t wait for the wrong peak to eat, I couldn’t wait to eat it after receiving the snack.

An older sister on the left by the window wrapped it up tightly. She did not eat, drink, or go to the bathroom during the whole trip
Also great

Hard Nucleic Acid Detection

21:30 p.m.

Check the QR code before disembarking
Then poke his nostrils again for nucleic acid testing
The little mage said that he already has experience.
Miss sister said that China is stricter, I try to be lighter

Then I stabbed it deeper than Singapore, and then turned the cotton swab a few times
The little mage thought it was over and made an OK gesture
Unexpectedly, after waiting for a few seconds, Miss Sister turned back a few times
Then break the cotton swab and put it in the test tube
The little mage was about to talk, the little sister took out another cotton swab
Face the right nostril clockwise, stop, counterclockwise, do the same

The little mage held back tears and said thank you 🙏
After all, it’s late at night, everyone is working hard

Entry

22:10 p.m.

Check entry form, passport

The little brother at the border flipped through the visas of the little mage and changed a chapter.
Then we remind you not to put your ID card together with your passport because it may be demagnetized

22:20 p.m.

Don’t forget the trolley during security check

22:30 in the evening

Shanghai local and foreign diversion and isolation

Nightmare

This is the nightmare of the whole trip
Because there are too many flights today, the bus is isolated 🚌 insufficient preparation
Started a long wait ⌛️

00:40 AM
Passport registration

Wait and wait, Shanghai is very cold late at night
Fortunately, the friend from the National University of Singapore before leaving helped buy a set of warm equipment
The little mage put on a warm one and fell asleep standing up

2:33 AM
Wait, get on the bus, the staff reminds that the passport will be returned to you at the hotel

Shaking and shaking in the car, on the high speed
Fell asleep with the heater
I got off the high-speed car and stopped. I woke up and found that it was 10,000 red lights that I had to wait for late at night.

Stop and go, suffering

Because the isolation hotel is randomly assigned, the good expensive ones are cheap
But this time the little mage can no longer save money, just thinking

God, please assign me a better hotel 🏨

International Spa

4:50 am

Finally arrived at the isolation hotel
The little mage looked up and saw that it was a tall building. Intuitively this hotel is good.

I opened the map and found it was a five-star
An international spa in Shanghai

Secretly happy
No pole tail

But the goose still can’t get off
Need to wait for the first few buses to check in

5:50 am

Finally get off
Register passport ID

  • Hotel 350 a day, you can use Alipay, WeChat, UnionPay and other methods to transfer money
  • Three meals 100 days a day, but it’s not a hotel’s catering, but an outsourced box lunch
  • You can also order take-out by yourself, and deliver food at 12 o’clock and 6 o’clock every day.
  • Courier can only receive but not mail
  • Take temperature twice a day
  • Trash bags are sealed and placed outside the door, and staff with full-body biochemical suits clean up regularly

Check in

6:10 am

Then the little mage started a 14-day quarantine life
Mom was worried that the little mage would be bored if he couldn’t go out
However, the little mage was originally a house, and now he doesn’t have to meet people in accordance with the law, so he is very happy
In addition, it seems like the M hotel I stayed in when I first went to Singapore

14 days quarantine

Of course you can’t take it lightly during isolation
Compared with tourists who came from the same country along the way with a double-yin certificate
In the isolated hotel, people from various countries will be encountered

  • For example, on December 20th 13 people were admitted to isolation and confirmed coronary disease
  • There are also 14 who get sick on the 16th day after the isolation
  • Beijing 14+7 Medical Observation
  • 70% increase in infectiousness of new variants of British coronavirus
  • …

So on the one hand open windows 🪟 ventilation to ensure air circulation and reduce virus concentration
On the other hand, wash your hands frequently 🧽, not soft your eyes and nose 👀👃, wear a mask honestly 😷

entry.title: The principle conjecture and realization of Everything
entry.content:
research content

  1. Read NTFS MFT
  2. Construction of the hash table
  3. System path of the file
  4. GUI and worker threads
  5. Multiple search methods
  6. MFC interface

research plan

  • Early-April-Mid-April to determine the research direction
  • From the end of April to the end of April. Preparation for each knowledge point, simple test
  • At the beginning of May, program design and development debugging and operation
  • Mid-May-End of May Writing graduation design thesis

Features and innovation

  1. CPU and memory usage are within a reasonable range
  2. The software is stable and provides different search options
  3. Compared with the search function of windows, the file location speed is super fast

Fast location of NTFS disk files

Summary

This article introduces how to enumerate the names of all files and folders on the hard disk under the Windows NTFS disk format, and use the STL of C++ to construct a hash table, as well as the GUI and worker threads of MFC, and finally realize the implementation based on the keywords entered by the user Search as simple as google keyword search, and then instantly return all matching files/folders and recursively get the system path of the file/folder.

Keywords: NTFS, fast, keyword, search, file path

1 Introduction

The directory structure of Windows. In NTFS volumes, files are
Arranged in the form of B+ tree, press when searching for files in the directory
The B+ tree search method first searches the root node (starting from the root directory), and then compares the file name to be found with the file name corresponding to the child node in the root node to determine which child node corresponds to the storage area to search, and then Use the child node as the current root node and search again until the file is found. ^[1]^

Although the search provided by the Microsoft system can search text content, the speed is very unsatisfactory. In most cases, we just want to know which folder on the computer the file is stored in, and this program solves this very well.

2 Brief introduction to NTFS

2.1 NTFS

NTFS(New Technology File System)是 Windows
The standard file system of NT and later Windows. NTFS replaces the file allocation table (FAT) file system and provides a file system for Microsoft’s Windows series operating systems. NTFS has made several improvements to FAT and HPFS (High-Performance File System), for example, it supports metadata and uses advanced data structures to improve performance, reliability, and disk space utilization. ^[2]^

2.2 Current situation

With NT-based Windows
With the popularity of 2000/XP, many individual users have begun to use NTFS. NTFS also uses clusters as a unit to store data files, but the cluster size in NTFS does not depend on the disk or partition size. Shrinking the cluster size not only reduces the waste of disk space, but also reduces the possibility of disk fragmentation. NTFS supports file encryption management function, which can provide users with a higher level of security assurance. ^[3]^

3 Preparation

3.1 Design ideas

Read all file names of the disk as data, and match in the data according to the keywords entered by the user. The correct path is returned to the user together with the path to facilitate opening the file.

The specific design idea is shown in Figure 3-1.

The biggest advantage of a hash table is that it greatly reduces the time consumed for data storage and search, which can almost be regarded as a constant time; the cost is only to consume more memory. However, with more and more available memory, it is worthwhile to trade space for time. In addition, easier coding is also one of its characteristics.

3.2 What is USN

The top priority of the program is to read the USN.

USN 是 Update Service Number Journal or Change
The abbreviation of Journal, the function of recording the modified information in the NTFS volume, you can set the number of files and directories to be monitored in the partition, and record the modification time and content of the monitored object.

When the USN log is enabled, for each NTFS volume, when there is information about adding, deleting, and modifying files, NTFS uses the USN log to record and store it as
The format of USN_RECORD.

3.3 Why is it fast

The USN log is equivalent to the WORD directory and provides an index. Of course, when the content of the article changes, the USN log will record when the modification is made, but it does not record what is modified in it, so the index file is very small. And when you want to find the specific paragraph of the article, you don’t need to turn the mouse wheel wildly, just look at the table of contents directly, and you only need to hold down ctrl+mouse click to locate.

In the same way, when you want to find a certain file, you can find out whether the file exists directly by searching the USN log (that is, the established index).

PS: Although windows is not “everything is a file” (Unix/Linux
One of the basic philosophy of ), but the folder also exists in the form of a file, so you can also find the location through USN.

3.4 Environment

Since the NTFS format is originally a patent of Microsoft, a series of API functions are provided for our convenient access.

As an old but classic Visual C++ 6.0
Programming tool, but there was no NTFS format at that time, so VC2005 was chosen as the integrated development environment, and it can only run on Windows systems after 2000.

4 Implementation of the program

4.1 Read USN

The following are all API functions provided by Microsoft^[4]^, which are included in the <Winioctl.h> header file.

4.1.1 Determine the disk format

Call the following function to find out the disk in NTFS format

The lpFileSystemNameBuffer, which is what we want, will return strings such as “FAT32” and “NTFS”.

Then use a loop to count A-Z drive letters in NTFS format, and then initialize

4.1.2 Get drive disk handle

Points to note:

  1. CreateFile returns a handle, which will be used below;
  2. Since the drive letter must be in the form of \\.\C:, the backslash “//“ in the C++ language represents “/“;
  3. Administrator rights are required (vista, UAC will pop up in win7)

If hVol != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE, it means that the handle is successfully obtained and you can continue to the next step.

4.1.3 Initialize USN log

Use FSCTL_CREATE_USN_JOURNAL as the control code of DeviceIoControl.

Cujd is a pointer to the input buffer, pointing to the CREATE_USN_JOURNAL_DATA structure.

4.1.4 Get USN log information

Use FSCTL_QUERY_USN_JOURNAL as the control code of DeviceIoControl.

lpOutBuffer returns a USN_JOURNAL_DATA, which is a structure

UsnJournalID, FirstUsn, NextUsn will be used in the next step

4.1.5 Obtaining USN Journal file information

Since USN is stored in the form of USN_RECORD, its structure is:

Note the FileReferenceNumber, ParentFileReferenceNumber, FileNameLength, FileName

These variables are very important

DeviceIoControl() cooperates with FSCTL_ENUM_USN_DATA

Among them, Med is:

After testing here, it is found that if the use of FirstUsn is sometimes incorrect, resulting in incomplete data being obtained, it is better to write 0 directly.

med.HighUsn = UsnInfo.NextUsn;

In this loop, the file name obtained each time is inserted into the vector and hash table respectively (described below).

4.1.6 Delete USN log file

4.1.7 Results of enumerating all files

Save the data as Allfile.txt for analysis, as shown in Figure 4-1.

I used the D drive on my computer as a test and enumerated all the files. As shown in the figure, there are about 40W files, a total of more than 100W data, and the file size is about 20MB. This has a vague estimate of the amount of memory occupied by subsequent programs, which is about 50M. For even only 1G of memory, it is within a reasonable range. With the original data, the analysis is as follows:

For example, Linux programming practice.isz file, its system path is: D:\Ghost\Linux\Linux programming practice.isz, look at the result in the file:

So using a recursive function (directly or indirectly calling its own function), you can get the complete path.

4.2 Build search data

4.2.1 Construct Vector

Vector：

A sequential container. The elements in the vector are accessed via their position index. You can call push_back or
The insert function adds elements to the vector. In vector
Adding elements to the container may cause the re-allocation of memory space for the container, and may also invalidate all iterators. in
vector
Adding (or deleting) elements in the middle of the container will invalidate all iterators pointing to elements after the insertion (or deletion) point.

Use Vector to store <file name, current directory>. Due to the requirements of fuzzy search, fast search methods such as binary search are not applicable here, and the linear traversal method of Vector from begin to end meets this requirement. .

4.2.2 Building a hash table

Here we use the map library function ^[5]^ provided by STL, map is a collection of key-value pairs. map
The type can usually be understood as an associative array (associative
array): You can use the key as a subscript to get a value, just like the built-in array type. The essence of association is that the value of an element is associated with a specific key, rather than obtained by the position of the element in the array.

  1. Considering that if you implement the hash function yourself, there may be several bugs that affect the progress, it is better to use the stable map provided by STL to implement it.
  2. “Don’t Reinvent the Wheel” Don’t reinvent the wheel^[6]^
    1. For example, Google’s Android, is Google’s inability to develop a system kernel alone, so it uses a very mature Linux kernel? I think it’s impossible for a world giant like Google to be without this ability. Instead, it respects the principle of not reinventing the wheel.

4.2.3 Insert data:

This is used here in Section 4.1.5, Get USN Journal
In the loop of file information, the USN_RECORD information obtained each time, the filename,
pfrn, frn are inserted into the vector and hash table respectively.

4.3 Interface

When starting a project, VC2005 provides command line (console) projects and GUI projects. Command line programming is very convenient, fast, practical, and relatively simple. If the console can meet the requirements, the interface is not necessary. Or sometimes the target platform cannot display the graphical user interface. but,
GUI has more obvious advantages, such as menu system and better interactivity. In addition, in the process of menu selection and moving data between fields,
The mouse is very useful, and the GUI is the way to go. Therefore, when writing the program, I first tested some intermediate data under the console, and then switched to the GUI interface when it was over.

MFC: Microsoft Foundation Classes, also known as MFC
, Is Microsoft’s response to “lowering Windows
The greatest contribution made by programming is bored, bored and difficult. MFC
Makes the generation of dialog boxes extremely simple. It also implements a message delivery system (message
dispatching), dealing with the easy mistakes of WPARAM and LP ARAM. MFC
It is even the driving force to lure some people into C++.
This program is implemented by MFC provided by Microsoft, as shown in Figure 4-2:

4.3.1 KISS principle

The KISS principle is “Keep It Sample And
The abbreviation of “Stupid”, simplicity and ease of operation are the most important principles of design.

The KISS principle is probably the most respected in design, home improvement design, interface design
In terms of operational design, complex things are becoming more and more popular, while simple things are becoming more and more recognized. For example, these UI designs and our Chinese web pages are negative examples. “IKEA” (IKEA) simple and efficient home design and production ideas; “Microsoft” (Microsoft) “what you see is what you get” concept; “Google” (Google) simple and direct business style, without exception, follow The “kiss” principle. ^[7]^

4.3.2 Function

Under the kiss principle, be as concise as possible. Add Editbox button listbox
menu^[8]^The functions of these controls are as follows:

  • Editbox
    • Get the string that needs to be searched by the user
  • Button
    1. Get the string in EditBox
    2. The character is too short to pop up a prompt
    3. Add a magnifying glass picture, the function is clear at a glance
  • Listbox
    1. Display the matching file name and path, double-click to open the file
    2. Since the path may be relatively long, add a horizontal scroll bar
    3. Double-click the result file path in Listbox to open the file selected by double-click
  • Menu
    • Menu, you can select case, search order

4.4 Join thread

4.4.1 Why join threads

The benefits of threads: threads are cheap. Thread starts faster, exits faster, and has less impact on system resources.

Also consider:

  1. Due to the limitation of io, it doesn’t make much sense to use multiple threads to read MFT at the same time on the same hard disk.
  2. Disk access to MFT located in different partitions of the same hard disk may affect the speed instead. For computers with multiple hard disks, efficiency should be greatly improved. However, users of multiple hard drives may form a RAID array. The best solution should be to read A-Z disks sequentially.
  3. When the MFC was first created, it was executed sequentially. As a result, the interface could not be displayed until all data statistics were completed. During this process, users would easily lose patience.
  4. Finally decide a UI thread, a worker thread background statistics.

4.4.2 Start a Worker thread in MFC

MFC has long added support for multithreading. In a typical MFC
In the program, the support of multithreading is hidden behind a lot of amazing work. MFC
Even attempts to strengthen certain Win32 concepts related to multithreading.

Both GUI and worker threads are started with AfxBeginThread(), but MFC uses the overloading nature of C++ functions to provide two different declarations for this function. The compiler will automatically select the correct one to use based on the parameters you provide. ^[9]^

Use AfxBeginThread to start the thread.
pParam Any 4-byte value, used to pass to the new thread. It can be an integer, or a pointer, or just a zero.

Only the first two parameters are used here, the thread function in the object, and the object pointer

You can see two threads in the task manager, as shown in Figure 4-3

When the worker thread completes its task, it will automatically end and return to a thread.

4.4.3 Minimize to the notification area

Now more and more programs click close in the upper right corner, which is actually minimized to the tray icon. To exit the program, you need to right-click on the tray icon to exit.

Realize minimization without exiting the program, you can find files conveniently.

1) Minimize the display on the taskbar.

2) Click Close to exit to the tray icon without displaying it in the taskbar; double-click to reply to the display window.

3) Add menu to tray icon.

4.5 Find

4.5.1 Wildcard

In actual applications, it’s impossible to remember the file name clearly, such as test.2012-5-14.txt, which often means “test
.txt”, so fuzzy search is needed. Because under the console, the file name is <filename,
pfrn> Create a hash table. If you want to implement fuzzy search, the hash table becomes unnecessary. You can directly use the container vector.

According to the actual situation, no strict wildcard is required, “*?”
Can solve most of the search problems, plus users generally may not know the use of wildcards, let alone regular expressions. So start with “space”
Instead of “*?”, implement Baidu
Google’s search method of separating keywords with spaces is a good solution. ****

4.5.2 Case, order

There are generally the following two situations:

  1. The user may not remember the case of the file name or path
  2. Sometimes there are too many files, and strict capitalization may be required to filter the correct files
  3. Can’t remember the order of keywords

So provide the following two options:

  1. Strict case
  2. No order

According to the general situation, the default is: case-insensitive, sequential search

4.5.3 User privacy and system path

  1. Consider that some folders are used to store users’ private files.
  2. System folders, for example: c:\windows\* General users will not use it. The same search will only increase unnecessary files and burden the system.

So it is necessary to add an exclude folder option, as shown in Figure 4-4

The corresponding function is:

4.5.4 Implementation

New matching string class

Traverse the VecNameCur in 4.2.1, pass the cmpStrFilename matching function, and get the matching filename

You can easily rewrite the string matching algorithm in the infilename function to achieve some extensions

4.5.5 Path output

After getting the matching file name, the next step is to get the system path of the file. Pass the full name of the matching file name obtained above into the frnPfrnNameMap hash table constructed in 4.2.2, and get the path recursively.

5 Complexity analysis

5.1 Time complexity

In theory, the time complexity is:

On the AMD Athlon(tm) II X2 245 2.9GHz processor, the result is almost instantaneous.

5.2 Space complexity

Due to the huge number of computer files-usually 10W-100W, the memory usage of the program itself can be ignored.

234,708 files about 43M.

For systems with at least 2G of memory today, it is not a burden.

6 Problems encountered

6.1 Unable to initialize USN file

The O disk on the computer cannot initialize the USN log file. Through debugging, it is found that:

DeviceIoControl returns 0, GetLastError 0x70

Check msdn, the reason is ERROR_SHARING_PAUSED

It turns out that I forgot to initialize and add the following code, the program can access the O disk normally

6.2 The problem of wchar and char under unicode

Initially, in terms of string processing, the standard library function string was used as the processing method, but in unicode
The following is a double-byte wchar, which has gotten into a lot of trouble in string conversion. Finally, CString is used as the default string, and _T(“”) is used to initialize the string.

6.3 #ifdef position problem

#ifdef, no breakpoints can be set in it, and then I noticed that #define was written in front of include.

6.4 Parameter transfer

I started to design with a process-oriented thinking, and got into the trouble of passing the same handle by passing parameters. Later, I changed to a class method to improve a lot.

7 small optimizations

7.1 Reading speed

When constructing the hash function, three methods were thought of, and experiments were performed respectively, and the time function was used to count the time spent. The results are as follows:

1) After modifying the code, read the usn once, save it in a temporary file, read and build the hash table

Each run, the average time is about 27s

2) Use vector to store data in memory, after release,

The result is gratifying, and the time has been increased by nearly 10 times! ! ! As shown in Figure 7-1:

It is completely within the acceptable range.

The first run was obviously time-consuming, and then the file was pre-read from the disk cache, and the speed soared. The analysis hotspot should lie in the disk seek time and file reading.

7.2 Open file method

In 4.3.2, double-click the file path in the ListBox to open the response file. At the beginning, the system() system function was used, but a black console window will pop up, and the main window will be locked, etc. Execution can only be continued after the file is closed, which is very detrimental to user experience. Call the ShellExecute function instead to open up a new process and the main window can continue to execute.

7.3 Progress bar

After the V1.0 version was released, there was no prompt when some students reported the background statistics file, so I don’t know when it will be completed. So a progress bar is added at the bottom of the main interface to enhance interactivity, as shown in the figure
7-2:

Of course, the thread function has also made necessary changes:

8 Conclusion

At this point, the basic functions of the program are completed. Tests on multiple computers and different systems (XP and later windows series) have basically no suspended animations and program hangs.

Due to time and other reasons, there are still many functions that have not been implemented, such as the interface cannot be extended, and the file data cannot be dynamically collected.

Rapid positioning of the NTFS disk files

LE IH Austria

Abstract：This article describes on windows NTFS disk, the
enumeration all the names of the files and folders on the hard disk ,
and to build a hash table by using C++ STL, MFC GUI and worker thread.
Ultimately the user to enter keywords , as a simple search like google
keyword search , and then instantly return all matching files / folders
and their system path.

Key words : NTFS, Fast, Search, Keywords, File Path
